1196  9694                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 9694              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 9694              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 9694              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 9694              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 9694
   6+ 9694              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 9694              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 9694
   9+ 9694 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 9695 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 9698 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 9699 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 969B 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 969C E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 969E 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 969F 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 96A0 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 96A1 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 96A4 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 96A5 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 96A6 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 96A8 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 96A9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 96AA 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 96AB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 96AC CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  27+ 96AF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 96B0 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 96B2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 96B3 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 96B4 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 96B6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 96B7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 96B8 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  35+ 96BB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 96BC 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 96BD E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 96BF B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 96C0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 96C1 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 96C2 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 96C3 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  43+ 96C6 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 96C7 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 96C9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 96CA 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 96CB F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 96CD E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 96CF 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 96D0 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 96D1 C9                                   ret
  52+ 96D2
  53+ 96D2 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 96D3 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  55+ 96D6 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 96D8 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 96DA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 96DB E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 96DD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 96DE E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 96E0 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 96E1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 96E2 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 96E3 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  65+ 96E6 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 96E7 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 96E8 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 96EA B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 96EB 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 96EC 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 96ED EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 96EE CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  73+ 96F1 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 96F3 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 96F5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 96F6 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 96F8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 96F9 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 96FA E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 96FC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 96FD EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 96FE CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  83+ 9701 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 9702 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 9703 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 9705 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 9706 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  89+ 9708 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 9709 CD 79 A3                             call    doRND
  91+ 970C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 970D F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 970F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 9710 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 9711 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 9713 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 9715 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 9716 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 9717 C9                                   ret
 100+ 9718
 101+ 9718              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 9718 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 9719 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 971B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 971C AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 971D                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 971D FA 4B 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 9720 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 9721 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 9722                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 9722 FA 2C 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 9725 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 9726 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 9728                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 9728 FA 3F 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 972B C9                                   ret
 114+ 972C 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 972D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 972F 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 9730 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 9731 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 9733 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 9734 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 9735 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 9737                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 9737 FA 3F 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 973A 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 973B F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 973D 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 973E C9                                   ret
 127+ 973F              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 973F AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 9740 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 9741 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 9742 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 9743 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 9744 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 9745 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 9746 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 9748 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 9749 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 974A C9                                   ret
 133+ 974B B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 974C 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 974D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 974F 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 9750 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 9751 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 9753 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 9754 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 9755 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 9756 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 9757 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 9758 C9                                   ret
 145+ 9759
 146+ 9759 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 975A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 975C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 975D AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 975E                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 975E FA 76 97    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 9761 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 9762 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 9763                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 9763 FA 68 97    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9766 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 9767 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9768 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 9769 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 976B 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 976C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 976D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 976F 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 9770 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 9771 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 9773 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 9774 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 9775 C9                                   ret
 167+ 9776 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 9777 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 9779 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 977A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 977B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 977D 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 977E B7                                   or      a
 174+ 977F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 9781 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 9783 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 9784 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 9785 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9786 C9                                   ret
 180+ 9787              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 9787 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 9788 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 9789 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 978A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 978B 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 978C 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 978D 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 978E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 9790 B4                                   or      h
 184+ 9791 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 9792 C9                                   ret
 186+ 9793              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 9793 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 9795 21 33 A0                             ld      hl,varDust
 189+ 9798 CD 94 96     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 190+ 979B 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 191+ 979D C9                                   ret
 192+ 979E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 193+ 979E 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 194+ 97A0 21 33 A0                             ld      hl,varDust
 195+ 97A3 CD D2 96     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 196+ 97A6 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 197+ 97A8 C9                                   ret
 198+ 97A9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ 97A9 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 200+ 97AB FD 21 33 A0                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 201+ 97AF C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 202+ 97B0 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 203+ 97B3 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 204+ 97B4 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 205+ 97B6 3A D5 9D                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 206+ 97B9                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 206+ 97B9 A7          >                        and     a
 206+ 97BA C2 BE 97    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 207+ 97BD 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 208+ 97BE 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 209+ 97BF 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 210+ 97C1 CD B0 B1                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 211+ 97C4                                      ShiftHLRight1
 211+ 97C4 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 211+ 97C6 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 212+ 97C8                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 212+ 97C8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 212+ 97CA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 213+ 97CC 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 214+ 97CD F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 215+ 97CF DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 216+ 97D1 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 216+ 97D5 66 05
 217+ 97D7 ED 5B D6 9D                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 218+ 97DB CD 18 97                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 219+ 97DE                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 219+ 97DE CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 219+ 97E0 C2 35 99    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 220+ 97E3 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 220+ 97E7 74 05
 221+ 97E9 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 221+ 97ED 66 01
 222+ 97EF 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 223+ 97F0 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 224+ 97F2 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 225+ 97F3 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 226+ 97F5 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 227+ 97F7 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 228+ 97F8 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 229+ 97FA B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 230+ 97FB 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 231+ 97FC CD 59 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 232+ 97FF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 233+ 9800 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 234+ 9802                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 234+ 9802 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 234+ 9804 D2 35 99    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 235+ 9807 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 235+ 980B 74 01
 236+ 980D FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 236+ 9811 66 03
 237+ 9813 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 238+ 9814 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 239+ 9816 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 240+ 9817 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 241+ 9819 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 242+ 981B 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 243+ 981C E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 244+ 981E B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 245+ 981F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 246+ 9820 CD 59 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 247+ 9823 7C                                   ld      a,h
 248+ 9824 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 9826                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 249+ 9826 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 249+ 9828 D2 35 99    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 250+ 982B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 251+ 982C E6 80                                and     $80
 252+ 982E 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 253+ 9830 7C                                   ld      a,h
 254+ 9831                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 254+ 9831 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 254+ 9833 D2 35 99    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 255+ 9836 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 255+ 983A 74 03
 256+ 983C              ; Now roll
 257+ 983C              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 258+ 983C 2A F0 9C     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 259+ 983F 7D                                   ld      a,l
 260+ 9840 FE 00                                cp      0
 261+ 9842 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 262+ 9844                                      ;break
 263+ 9844                                      ;ld      a,$80
 264+ 9844                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 265+ 9844 E5                                   push    hl
 266+ 9845 7C                                   ld      a,h
 267+ 9846 E6 80                                and     $80
 268+ 9848 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 269+ 9849 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 270+ 984A FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 271+ 984D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 272+ 984E E6 80                                and     $80
 273+ 9850 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 274+ 9851 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 275+ 9852 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 276+ 9854 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 277+ 9855 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 278+ 9857 79                                   ld      a,c
 279+ 9858 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 280+ 9859 B2                                   or      d
 281+ 985A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 282+ 985B FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 282+ 985F 66 01
 283+ 9861 CD 18 97                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 284+ 9864 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 284+ 9868 74 01
 285+ 986A              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 286+ 986A              .YRoll:                 ;break
 287+ 986A E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 288+ 986B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 289+ 986C E6 80                                and     $80
 290+ 986E 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 291+ 986F 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 292+ 9870 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 293+ 9873 5F                                   ld      e,a
 294+ 9874 E6 80                                and     $80
 295+ 9876 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 296+ 9877 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 297+ 9878 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 298+ 987A 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 299+ 987B ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 300+ 987D 79                                   ld      a,c
 301+ 987E A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 302+ 987F B2                                   or      d
 303+ 9880 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 304+ 9881 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 304+ 9885 66 03
 305+ 9887 CD 59 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 306+ 988A FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 306+ 988E 74 03
 307+ 9890 3A E3 9C     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 308+ 9893 FE 00                                cp      0
 309+ 9895 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 310+ 9897              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 311+ 9897 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 312+ 9898 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 313+ 989B 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 314+ 989C ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 315+ 989E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 316+ 989F ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 317+ 98A1                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 317+ 98A1 CB 23       >			   sla e
 317+ 98A3 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 318+ 98A5 3A E5 9C                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 319+ 98A8 B2                                   or      d
 320+ 98A9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 321+ 98AA FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 321+ 98AE 66 03
 322+ 98B0 CD 59 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 323+ 98B3 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 323+ 98B7 74 03
 324+ 98B9              ; now work out screen pos
 325+ 98B9              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 326+ 98B9              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 327+ 98B9              ;        pop     de
 328+ 98B9               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 329+ 98B9                                      ;pop     de
 330+ 98B9              .NoPitch:
 331+ 98B9 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 332+ 98BC 6F                                   ld      l,a
 333+ 98BD E6 7F                                and     $7F
 334+ 98BF                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 334+ 98BF CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 334+ 98C1 C2 CA 98    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 335+ 98C4 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 336+ 98C6 4F                                   ld      c,a
 337+ 98C7 C3 CF 98                             jp      StarDoneX
 338+ 98CA 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 339+ 98CB 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 340+ 98CD 90                                   sub     b
 341+ 98CE 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 98CF FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 343+ 98D2 6F                                   ld      l,a
 344+ 98D3 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 345+ 98D5                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 345+ 98D5 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 345+ 98D7 C2 E0 98    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 346+ 98DA C6 60                                add     a,$60
 347+ 98DC 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 98DD C3 E5 98                             jp      StarDoneY
 349+ 98E0 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 350+ 98E1 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 351+ 98E3 90                                   sub     b
 352+ 98E4 47                                   ld      b,a
 353+ 98E5 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 354+ 98E7 C5                                   push    bc
 355+ 98E8              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 355+ 98E8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 355+ 98EC CD 37 E1       call    l2_plot_pixel
 356+ 98EF FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 357+ 98F2 C1                                   pop    bc
 358+ 98F3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 358+ 98F3 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 358+ 98F5 D2 25 99    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 359+ 98F8 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 360+ 98FA 0C                                   inc     c
 361+ 98FB C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 98FC                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 98FC ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 9900 CD 37 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 9903 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 9906 C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 9907                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 9907 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 366+ 9909 D2 25 99    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 990C 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 990E 04                                   inc     b
 369+ 990F C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 9910                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 9910 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 370+ 9914 CD 37 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 371+ 9917 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 372+ 991A C1                                   pop    bc
 373+ 991B 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 374+ 991D 0D                                   dec     c
 375+ 991E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 375+ 991E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 375+ 9922 CD 37 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 376+ 9925 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 377+ 9926 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 378+ 9928 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 379+ 9929 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 380+ 992D E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 381+ 992E FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 382+ 9930 05                                   dec     b
 383+ 9931 C2 AF 97                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 384+ 9934 C9                                   ret
 385+ 9935 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 386+ 9936 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 387+ 9938 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 388+ 9939 CD 94 96                             call    InitStarAtHL
 389+ 993C C3 26 99                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 390+ 993F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391+ 993F FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 392+ 9942 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 393+ 9945 6F                                   ld      l,a
 394+ 9946 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 395+ 9948 47                                   ld      b,a
 396+ 9949 CD 15 B1                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 397+ 994C 7D                                   ld      a,l
 398+ 994D                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 398+ 994D CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 398+ 994F C2 5A 99    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 399+ 9952              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 400+ 9952 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 401+ 9954 26 00                                ld          h,0
 402+ 9956 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 403+ 9957 C3 61 99                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 404+ 995A              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 405+ 995A 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 406+ 995C 26 00                                ld          h,0
 407+ 995E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 407+ 995E B7          >                        or a
 408+ 995F ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 409+ 9961              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 410+ 9961 7D                                   ld          a,l
 411+ 9962 32 8B A0                             ld          (varStarX),a
 412+ 9965 C9                                   ret
 413+ 9966
 414+ 9966 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 415+ 9969 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 416+ 996C 6F                                   ld          l,a
 417+ 996D E6 7F                                and         $7F
 418+ 996F 47                                   ld          b,a
 419+ 9970 CD 15 B1                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 420+ 9973 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 421+ 9974                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 421+ 9974 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 421+ 9976 C2 81 99    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 422+ 9979                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 423+ 9979 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 424+ 997B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 997B B7          >                        or a
 425+ 997C ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 426+ 997E C3 86 99                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 427+ 9981              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 428+ 9981 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 429+ 9983 26 00                                ld          h,0
 430+ 9985 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 431+ 9986              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 432+ 9986 7D                                   ld          a,l
 433+ 9987 32 8C A0                             ld          (varStarY),a
 434+ 998A C9                                   ret
 435+ 998B
 436+ 998B
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

1203  998B                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 998B
   2+ 998B 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 998C 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9990 7D
   4+ 9991 8B 99        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9993 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 9995 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 9998 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 999A 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 999E              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 999E
  11+ 999E              memfill_dma:
  12+ 999E              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 999E              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 999E 32 8B 99     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 99A1              .set_target:
  16+ 99A1 22 98 99     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 99A4              .set_length:
  18+ 99A4 ED 53 93 99  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 99A8              .write_dma:
  20+ 99A8 21 8C 99     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 99AB 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 99AD 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 99AF ED B3        	otir
  24+ 99B1 C9           	ret
  25+ 99B2
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1204  99B2                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 99B2
   2+ 99B2 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 99B6 7D
   3+ 99B7 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 99B9 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 99BB 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 99BE 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 99C0 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 99C4              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 99C4
  10+ 99C4              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 99C4              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 99C4              .set_target:
  13+ 99C4 22 BE 99     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 99C7              .set_source:
  15+ 99C7 ED 53 B7 99  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 99CB              .set_length:
  17+ 99CB ED 43 B9 99  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 99CF              .write_dma:
  19+ 99CF 21 B2 99     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 99D2 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 99D4 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 99D6 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 99D8 C9           	ret
  24+ 99D9

   1+ 99E8              ;

   3+ 99E8              ; $FDFE;65022 G, F, D, S, A                 9  8  7  6  5
   4+ 99E8              ; $FBFE;64510 T, R, E, W, Q                14 13 12 11 10
   5+ 99E8              ; $F7FE;63486 5, 4, 3, 2, 1                19 18 17 16 15
   6+ 99E8              ; $EFFE;61438 6, 7, 8, 9, 0                24 23 22 23 20
   7+ 99E8              ; $DFFE;57342 Y, U, I, O, P                29 28 27 26 25

  35+ 99E8              ;   EscapePod  Inventory   Status        MarketPrices   LocalChart  RollRight   RolLLeft                EnergyBomb  Quit

  40+ 99E8              ;              Launch                    Distance       Hyperspace  Laser                               DockComp    BuyCargo
  41+ 99E8              ;              ResumeGame
  42+ 99E8

  44+ 99E8

  46+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Aft           equ 1  * 2
  47+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Left          equ 2  * 2
  48+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Right         equ 3  * 2
  49+ 99E8              c_Pressed_RollLeft      equ 4  * 2
  50+ 99E8              c_Pressed_RollRight     equ 5  * 2
  51+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Dive          equ 6  * 2
  52+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Climb         equ 7  * 2
  53+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Accellerate   equ 8  * 2
  54+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Decellerate   equ 9  * 2

  56+ 99E8              c_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ 11 * 2
  57+ 99E8              c_Pressed_FireMissile   equ 12 * 2

  59+ 99E8              c_Pressed_ECM           equ 14 * 2
  60+ 99E8              c_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ 15 * 2
  61+ 99E8              c_Pressed_EscapePod     equ 16 * 2
  62+ 99E8              c_Pressed_DockingComp   equ 17 * 2

  67+ 99E8              c_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ 22 * 2

  70+ 99E8              c_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ 25 * 2

  72+ 99E8              c_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ 27 * 2

  75+ 99E8              c_Pressed_GameSkip      equ 30 * 2
  76+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Save          equ 31 * 2
  77+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Freeze        equ 32 * 2
  78+ 99E8              c_Pressed_Resume        equ 33 * 2

  90+ 99E8              VK_CAPS  				equ 0
  91+ 99E8              VK_Z  					equ 1
  92+ 99E8              VK_X  					equ 2
  93+ 99E8              VK_C  					equ 3
  94+ 99E8              VK_V  					equ 4
  95+ 99E8              ; half row 2
  96+ 99E8              VK_A  					equ 5
  97+ 99E8              VK_S  					equ 6
  98+ 99E8              VK_D  					equ 7
  99+ 99E8              VK_F  					equ 8

 103+ 99E8              VK_W  					equ 11

 106+ 99E8              VK_T  					equ 14
 107+ 99E8              ; half row 4
 108+ 99E8              VK_1  					equ 15
 109+ 99E8              VK_2  					equ 16

 112+ 99E8              VK_5  					equ 19
 113+ 99E8              ; half row 5

 116+ 99E8              VK_8 					equ 22
 117+ 99E8              VK_7 					equ 23
 118+ 99E8              VK_6 					equ 24
 119+ 99E8              ; half row 6
 120+ 99E8              VK_P  					equ 25
 121+ 99E8              VK_O  					equ 26
 122+ 99E8              VK_I  					equ 27
 123+ 99E8              VK_U  					equ 28
 124+ 99E8              VK_Y  					equ 29
 125+ 99E8              ; half row 7
 126+ 99E8              VK_ENTER 				equ 30
 127+ 99E8              VK_L  					equ 31
 128+ 99E8              VK_K  					equ 32
 129+ 99E8              VK_J  					equ 33
 130+ 99E8              VK_H  					equ 34
 131+ 99E8              ; half row 8
 132+ 99E8              VK_SPACE 				equ 35
 133+ 99E8              VK_SYM  				equ 36
 134+ 99E8              VK_M  					equ 37
 135+ 99E8              VK_N  					equ 38
 136+ 99E8              VK_B  					equ 39
 137+ 99E8
 138+ 99E8              ;KeyboardMapping
 139+ 99E8              KeyCode_Front        	equ VK_1
 140+ 99E8              KeyCode_Aft          	equ VK_2
 141+ 99E8              KeyCode_Left         	equ VK_3
 142+ 99E8              KeyCode_Right        	equ VK_4
 143+ 99E8              KeyCode_RollLeft     	equ VK_O
 144+ 99E8              KeyCode_RollRight    	equ VK_P
 145+ 99E8              KeyCode_Dive         	equ VK_Q
 146+ 99E8              KeyCode_Climb        	equ VK_A
 147+ 99E8              KeyCode_Accellerate  	equ VK_W
 148+ 99E8              KeyCode_Decellerate  	equ VK_S
 149+ 99E8              KeyCode_FireLaser    	equ VK_SPACE
 150+ 99E8              KeyCode_TargetMissle 	equ VK_T
 151+ 99E8              KeyCode_FireMissile  	equ VK_F
 152+ 99E8              KeyCode_Find        	equ VK_F
 153+ 99E8              KeyCode_UnarmMissile 	equ VK_R
 154+ 99E8              KeyCode_ECM          	equ VK_E
 155+ 99E8              KeyCode_EnergyBomb   	equ VK_U
 156+ 99E8              KeyCode_EscapePod    	equ VK_CAPS
 157+ 99E8              KeyCode_DockingComp  	equ VK_N
 158+ 99E8              KeyCode_Hyperspace   	equ VK_H
 159+ 99E8              KeyCode_Distance     	equ VK_J
 160+ 99E8              KeyCode_HomeCursor   	equ VK_G
 161+ 99E8              KeyCode_Launch       	equ VK_L
 162+ 99E8              KeyCode_BuyCargo     	equ VK_B
 163+ 99E8              KeyCode_SellCargo    	equ VK_V
 164+ 99E8              KeyCode_Equip        	equ VK_C
 165+ 99E8              KeyCode_GalacticChrt 	equ VK_5
 166+ 99E8              KeyCode_LocalChart   	equ VK_6
 167+ 99E8              KeyCode_MarketPrices 	equ VK_7
 168+ 99E8              KeyCode_Status       	equ VK_8
 169+ 99E8              KeyCode_Inventory    	equ VK_9
 170+ 99E8              KeyCode_GameSkip     	equ VK_Z
 171+ 99E8              KeyCode_Save         	equ VK_O
 172+ 99E8              KeyCode_Freeze       	equ VK_B
 173+ 99E8              KeyCode_Resume       	equ VK_L
 174+ 99E8              KeyCode_Recentre     	equ VK_D
 175+ 99E8              KeyCode_Quit         	equ VK_Y
 176+ 99E8              KeyCode_PlanetData   	equ VK_0
 177+ 99E8              KeyCode_CursorUp        equ VK_Q
 178+ 99E8              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A
 179+ 99E8              KeyCode_PressedYes      equ VK_Y
 180+ 99E8              KeyCode_PressedNo       equ VK_N
 181+ 99E8
 182+ 99E8 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 9A10              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 9A10 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 9A18 FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 9A1C EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 9A20              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 9A20              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 9A20              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 9A20 F7 99 F8 99  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 9A24 F9 99 FA 99
 189+ 9A28 02 9A
 190+ 9A2A 01 9A F2 99                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 9A2E ED 99 F3 99
 190+ 9A32 EE 99
 191+ 9A34 0B 9A F6 99                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 9A38 F0 99 F5 99
 191+ 9A3C F4 99
 192+ 9A3E 04 9A E8 99                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 9A42 0E 9A 0A 9A
 192+ 9A46 09 9A
 193+ 9A48 F1 99 07 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 193+ 9A4C 0F 9A EC 99
 193+ 9A50 EB 99
 194+ 9A52 FB 99 00 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 194+ 9A56 FF 99 FE 99
 194+ 9A5A FD 99
 195+ 9A5C E9 99 02 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 195+ 9A60 0F 9A 07 9A
 195+ 9A64 EF 99
 196+ 9A66 05 9A FC 99                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 196+ 9A6A F2 99 ED 99
 196+ 9A6E F0 99
 197+ 9A70 05 9A 0E 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_PressedYes   ,Keys+KeyCode_PressedNo
 198+ 9A74
 199+ 9A74 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 199+ 9A78 56
 200+ 9A79 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 200+ 9A7D 47
 201+ 9A7E 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 201+ 9A82 54
 202+ 9A83 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 202+ 9A87 35
 203+ 9A88 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 203+ 9A8C 36
 204+ 9A8D 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 204+ 9A91 59
 205+ 9A92 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 205+ 9A96 48
 206+ 9A97 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 206+ 9A9B 42
 207+ 9A9C
 208+ 9A9C              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 9A9C              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 219+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 220+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 221+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 222+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 224+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 225+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 226+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod
 227+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 228+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 229+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 230+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 231+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 242+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 243+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 244+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 245+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 246+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 247+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 248+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 249+ 9A9C              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
