 169+ AC3F              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ AC3F              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ AC3F              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ AC3F              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ AC3F              ;
 174+ AC3F              ;
 175+ AC3F              ;
 176+ AC3F              ;
 177+ AC3F              ;
 178+ AC3F              ;
 179+ AC3F              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ AC3F              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ AC3F              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ AC3F              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ AC3F              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ AC3F              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ AC3F              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ AC3F              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ AC3F              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ AC3F              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ AC3F              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ AC3F              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ AC3F              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ AC3F              ;60                      RTS
 199+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ AC3F              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ AC3F              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ AC3F              ;60                      RTS
 204+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ AC3F              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ AC3F              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ AC3F              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ AC3F              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ AC3F              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ AC3F              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ AC3F              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ AC3F              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ AC3F              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ AC3F              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ AC3F              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ AC3F              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ AC3F              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ AC3F              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ AC3F              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ AC3F              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ AC3F              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ AC3F              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ AC3F              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ AC3F              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ AC3F              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ AC3F              ;
 227+ AC3F              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ AC3F              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ AC3F              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ AC3F              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ AC3F              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ AC3F              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ AC3F              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ AC3F              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ AC3F              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ AC3F              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ AC3F              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ AC3F              ;
 239+ AC3F              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ AC3F              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ AC3F              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ AC3F              ;
 243+ AC3F              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ AC3F              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ AC3F              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ AC3F              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ AC3F              ;
 248+ AC3F              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ AC3F              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ AC3F              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ AC3F              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ AC3F              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ AC3F              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ AC3F              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ AC3F              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ AC3F              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ AC3F              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ AC3F              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ AC3F              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ AC3F              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ AC3F              ;
 262+ AC3F              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ AC3F              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ AC3F              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ AC3F              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ AC3F              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ AC3F              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ AC3F              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ AC3F              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ AC3F              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ AC3F              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ AC3F              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ AC3F              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ AC3F              ;
 275+ AC3F              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ AC3F              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ AC3F              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ AC3F              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ AC3F              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ AC3F              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ AC3F              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ AC3F              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ AC3F              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ AC3F              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ AC3F              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ AC3F              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ AC3F              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ AC3F              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ AC3F              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ AC3F              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ AC3F              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ AC3F              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ AC3F              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ AC3F              ;C8                      INY
 295+ AC3F              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ AC3F              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ AC3F              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ AC3F              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ AC3F              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ AC3F              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ AC3F              ;98                      TYA
 302+ AC3F              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ AC3F              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ AC3F              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ AC3F              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ AC3F              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ AC3F              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ AC3F              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ AC3F              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ AC3F              ;68                      PLA
 311+ AC3F              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ AC3F              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ AC3F              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ AC3F              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ AC3F              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ AC3F              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ AC3F              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ AC3F              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ AC3F              ;
 320+ AC3F              ;
 321+ AC3F              ;

1234  AC58                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_add.asm"

   1+ AC58
   2+ AC58              ; HL(2sc) = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   3+ AC58 16 00        HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:  ld      d,0
   4+ AC5A 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; set up DE = A
   5+ AC5B 7C                                   ld      a,h
   6+ AC5C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   7+ AC5E 28 07                                jr      z,.HLPositive               ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
   8+ AC60 67           .HLNegative:            ld      h,a                         ; hl = ABS (HL)
   9+ AC61                                      NegHL                               ; hl = - hl
   9+ AC61 AF          >                    xor a
   9+ AC62 95          >                    sub l
   9+ AC63 6F          >                    ld l,a
   9+ AC64 9F          >                    sbc a,a
   9+ AC65 94          >                    sub h
   9+ AC66 67          >                    ld h,a
  10+ AC67              .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de
  10+ AC67 B7          >                        or a
  11+ AC68 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; aftert his hl will be 2's c
  12+ AC6A C9                                   ret
  13+ AC6B
  14+ AC6B 5F           HLEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:    ld      e,a
  15+ AC6C 7C                                   ld      a,h
  16+ AC6D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  17+ AC6F 20 04                                jr      nz,.HLNegative              ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
  18+ AC71 7B           .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
  19+ AC72 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  20+ AC74 C9                                   ret
  21+ AC75              .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
  21+ AC75 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  21+ AC76 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  21+ AC78 67          >                        ld      h,a
  22+ AC79                                      NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C
  22+ AC79 AF          >                    xor a
  22+ AC7A 95          >                    sub l
  22+ AC7B 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ AC7C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ AC7D 94          >                    sub h
  22+ AC7E 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ AC7F 16 00                                ld      d,0
  24+ AC81                                      ClearCarryFlag
  24+ AC81 B7          >                        or a
  25+ AC82 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now add a to -ve HL , add does not do 2's c
  26+ AC84 FA 8C AC                             jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
  27+ AC87                                      SetSignBit      h
  27+ AC87 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  27+ AC88 F6 80       >                        or      SignOnly8Bit
  27+ AC8A 67          >                        ld      h,a
  28+ AC8B C9                                   ret
  29+ AC8C              .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
  29+ AC8C AF          >                    xor a
  29+ AC8D 95          >                    sub l
  29+ AC8E 6F          >                    ld l,a
  29+ AC8F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  29+ AC90 94          >                    sub h
  29+ AC91 67          >                    ld h,a
  30+ AC92 C9                                   ret

  34+ AC93              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
  35+ AC93 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
  36+ AC94 5C                                   ld      e,h
  37+ AC95 7C                                   ld      a,h
  38+ AC96 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ AC98 67                                   ld      h,a
  40+ AC99 7A                                   ld      a,d
  41+ AC9A ED 31                                add     hl,a
  42+ AC9C 7B                                   ld      a,e
  43+ AC9D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ AC9F B4                                   or      h
  45+ ACA0 C9                                   ret
  46+ ACA1              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  47+ ACA1 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  48+ ACA2 4F                                   ld      c,a
  49+ ACA3 78                                   ld      a,b
  50+ ACA4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  51+ ACA6 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  52+ ACA8 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  53+ ACA9 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  54+ ACAB 69                                   ld      l,c
  55+ ACAC                                      ClearCarryFlag
  55+ ACAC B7          >                        or a
  56+ ACAD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  57+ ACAF C9                                   ret
  58+ ACB0 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  59+ ACB1 ED 31                                add hl,a
  60+ ACB3 C9                                   ret
  61+ ACB4              ;tested mathstestsun2
  62+ ACB4              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  63+ ACB4 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  64+ ACB5 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  65+ ACB6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  66+ ACB8 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  67+ ACBA 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  68+ ACBB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  69+ ACBD FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  70+ ACBF 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  71+ ACC0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  72+ ACC2 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  73+ ACC3 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  74+ ACC4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  75+ ACC6 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  76+ ACC7 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  77+ ACC8 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  78+ ACC9 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  79+ ACCA 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  80+ ACCB 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  81+ ACCC 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  82+ ACCD 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  83+ ACCE 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  84+ ACCF FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  85+ ACD1 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  86+ ACD2 C9                                   ret                         ; done
  87+ ACD3 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  88+ ACD4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  89+ ACD6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  90+ ACD8 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  91+ ACD9 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  92+ ACDA FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  93+ ACDC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  94+ ACDE 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  95+ ACDF E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
  96+ ACE0 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
  97+ ACE2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  98+ ACE4 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  99+ ACE5 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 100+ ACE7 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 101+ ACE9 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 102+ ACEA                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 102+ ACEA BD          >                        cp      l
 102+ ACEB DA F5 AC    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 103+ ACEE 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 104+ ACF0              ; The same so its just zero
 105+ ACF0 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 106+ ACF1 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 107+ ACF2 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 108+ ACF3 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 109+ ACF4 C9                                   ret                        ; .
 110+ ACF5              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 111+ ACF5 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 112+ ACF6 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 113+ ACF7 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 114+ ACF8 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 115+ ACF9 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 116+ ACFA 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 117+ ACFB 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 118+ ACFC 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 119+ ACFD 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 120+ ACFE FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 121+ AD00 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 122+ AD02 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 123+ AD03 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 124+ AD04 C9                                   ret
 125+ AD05 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 126+ AD06 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 127+ AD07 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 128+ AD08 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 129+ AD09 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 130+ AD0A 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 131+ AD0B 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 132+ AD0C 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 133+ AD0D 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 134+ AD0E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 135+ AD10 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 136+ AD12 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 137+ AD13 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 138+ AD14 C9                                   ret
 139+ AD15
 140+ AD15
 141+ AD15              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 142+ AD15 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 143+ AD16 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 144+ AD17 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 145+ AD18 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 146+ AD1A 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 147+ AD1C 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 148+ AD1D C9                                   ret                             ; return
 149+ AD1E ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 150+ AD20 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 151+ AD21 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 152+ AD22 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 153+ AD23 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 154+ AD24 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 155+ AD26 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 156+ AD27 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 157+ AD28
 158+ AD28
 159+ AD28
 160+ AD28              ; a = value to add
 161+ AD28              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 162+ AD28              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 163+ AD28              addINWKbasigned:
 164+ AD28 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 165+ AD2B 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 166+ AD2C 78           		ld		a,b
 167+ AD2D ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 168+ AD2F 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 169+ AD30 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 170+ AD32 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 171+ AD33 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 172+ AD34 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 173+ AD36              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 174+ AD36              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 175+ AD36              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 176+ AD36              addhlcsigned:
 177+ AD36 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 178+ AD37 23                   inc     hl
 179+ AD38 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 180+ AD39 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 181+ AD3A 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 182+ AD3B EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 183+ AD3C A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 184+ AD3D CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 185+ AD3F 28 2B                jr      z,.postivecalc
 186+ AD41              .negativecalc:
 187+ AD41 7C                   ld      a,h
 188+ AD42 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 189+ AD44 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 190+ AD45 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 191+ AD47 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 192+ AD49 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 193+ AD4B DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 194+ AD4D EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 195+ AD4E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 196+ AD4F E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 197+ AD51 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 198+ AD53 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 199+ AD55 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 200+ AD56 77                   ld      (hl),a
 201+ AD57 2B                   dec     hl
 202+ AD58 72                   ld      (hl),d
 203+ AD59 2B                   dec     hl
 204+ AD5A 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 205+ AD5B EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 206+ AD5C D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 207+ AD5D              .nocarry:
 208+ AD5D                      NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 208+ AD5D AF          >                    xor a
 208+ AD5E 95          >                    sub l
 208+ AD5F 6F          >                    ld l,a
 208+ AD60 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 208+ AD61 94          >                    sub h
 208+ AD62 67          >                    ld h,a
 209+ AD63 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 210+ AD64 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 211+ AD65 73                   ld      (hl),e
 212+ AD66 23                   inc     hl
 213+ AD67 72                   ld      (hl),d
 214+ AD68 23                   inc     hl
 215+ AD69 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 216+ AD6A EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 217+ AD6B C9                   ret
 218+ AD6C              .postivecalc:
 219+ AD6C DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 220+ AD6E 06 00                ld      b,0
 221+ AD70 19                   add     hl,de
 222+ AD71 EB                   ex      de,hl
 223+ AD72 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 224+ AD74 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 225+ AD75 2B                   dec     hl
 226+ AD76 72                   ld      (hl),d
 227+ AD77 2B                   dec     hl
 228+ AD78 73                   ld      (hl),e
 229+ AD79 C9                   ret
 230+ AD7A
 231+ AD7A              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 232+ AD7A              ;MVT1
 233+ AD7A              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 234+ AD7A              ;    A = sign bit => T
 235+ AD7A              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 236+ AD7A              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 237+ AD7A              ;
 238+ AD7A              ;        and h, 7F
 239+ AD7A              ;        b = 0
 240+ AD7A              ;        c = varS
 241+ AD7A              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 242+ AD7A              ;        retain carry
 243+ AD7A              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 244+ AD7A              ;        and 7F
 245+ AD7A              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 246+ AD7A              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 247+ AD7A              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 248+ AD7A              ;
 249+ AD7A              ;    else
 250+ AD7A              ;MV10.
 251+ AD7A              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 252+ AD7A              ;        or      sign bit
 253+ AD7A
 254+ AD7A
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
1235  AD7A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ AD7A              ; Note its big endian
   2+ AD7A 2A 3E A3     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ AD7D 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ AD7E 22 3E A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ AD81 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ AD84 2A 40 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ AD87 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ AD89 22 40 A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ AD8C C9                                   ret
  10+ AD8D
  11+ AD8D 2A 3E A3     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ AD90 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ AD91 B5                                   or      l
  14+ AD92 2A 40 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ AD95 B4                                   or      h
  16+ AD96 B5                                   or      l
  17+ AD97 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ AD98 B7                                   or      a
  19+ AD99 2A 3E A3                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ AD9C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ AD9E 22 3E A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ ADA1 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ ADA4 2A 40 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ ADA7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ ADA9 22 40 A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ ADAC                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ ADAC CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ ADAE C2 B2 AD    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ ADB1 C9                                   ret
  28+ ADB2 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ ADB5 22 3E A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ ADB8 22 40 A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ ADBB C9                                   ret
  32+ ADBC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
1236  ADBC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ ADBC              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ ADBC              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ ADBC 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ ADBD E5                                   push hl
   5+ ADBE DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ ADC0 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ ADC2 E5                                   push hl
   8+ ADC3 AF                                   xor a
   9+ ADC4 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ ADC5 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ ADC6 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ ADC8 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ ADCA ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ ADCC 17                                   rla
  15+ ADCD B9                                   cp c
  16+ ADCE 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ ADD0 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ ADD2 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ ADD4 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ ADD5 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ ADD7 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ ADD9 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ ADDA DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ ADDC E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ ADDD 2D                                   dec l
  26+ ADDE E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ ADDF 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ ADE1 D1                                   pop de
  29+ ADE2 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ ADE3 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ ADE5 D1                                   pop de
  32+ ADE6 C9                                   ret
  33+ ADE7
  34+ ADE7 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ ADE9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ ADEB CD BC AD                             call    Div24by24
  37+ ADEE F5                                   push    af
  38+ ADEF FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ ADF1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ ADF3 B1                                   or      c
  41+ ADF4 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ ADF5 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ ADF6 C9                                   ret
  44+ ADF7
  45+ ADF7                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ ADF7 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ ADF9 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ ADFA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ ADFC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ ADFE 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ ADFF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ AE01 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ AE02 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ AE04 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ AE06 CD BC AD                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ AE09 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ AE0B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ AE0D 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ AE0E FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ AE10 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ AE11 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ AE13 C9                                   ret
  63+ AE14
  64+ AE14              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ AE14              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ AE14              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ AE14              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ AE14 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ AE15 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ AE17 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ AE19 3A D9 9D                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ AE1C 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ AE1D 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ AE20 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ AE21 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ AE23 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ AE25 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ AE26 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ AE28 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ AE2A 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ AE2C 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ AE2D 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ AE2E 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ AE30 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ AE31 32 DA 9D                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ AE34 C9                                   ret
  87+ AE35
  88+ AE35
  89+ AE35
  90+ AE35

   1+ AE35              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ AE35 2A DA 9D                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ AE38 3A D9 9D                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ AE3B C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ AE3D 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ AE40 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ AE41                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ AE41 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ AE43 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ AE45 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ AE47 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ AE49 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ AE4A 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ AE4B EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ AE4C              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ AE4C CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ AE4E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ AE50 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ AE52 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ AE54 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ AE56 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ AE57 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ AE59 C9                                   ret
  20+ AE5A
  21+ AE5A
  22+ AE5A              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ AE5A ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ AE5A ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ AE5A ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ AE5A ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ AE5A ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ AE5A ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ AE5A ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ AE5A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ AE5A ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ AE5A ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ AE5A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ AE5A ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ AE5A ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ AE5A ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ AE5A ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ AE5A ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ AE5A                                      ENDM
  40+ AE5A
  41+ AE5A
  42+ AE5A
  43+ AE5A                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ AE5A              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ AE5A 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ AE5B 3A D9 9D    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ AE5E 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AE5F AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ AE60 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ AE62 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ AE63 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ AE64 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AE66 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ AE67 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ AE68 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit

  44+ AE6B ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ AE6D 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ AE6E B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ AE6F 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ AE70 2A DA 9D     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ AE73 CD 7C AE                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ AE76 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ AE77                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ AE77 B7          >                        or a
  49+ AE78 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ AE7A 7A                                   ld      a,d
