  54+ AE7C 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ AE7D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ AE7F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ AE80 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ AE81                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ AE81 FA 99 AE    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ AE84 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ AE85 B2                                   or      d
  61+ AE86                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ AE86 FA 8B AE    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ AE89 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ AE8A C9                                   ret
  64+ AE8B 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ AE8C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ AE8E 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ AE8F 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ AE90 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ AE92 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ AE93 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ AE94 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ AE96 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ AE97 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ AE98 C9                                   ret
  75+ AE99 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ AE9A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ AE9C 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ AE9D 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ AE9E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ AEA0 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ AEA1 B7                                   or      a
  82+ AEA2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ AEA4 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ AEA6 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ AEA7 B4                                   or      h
  86+ AEA8 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ AEA9 C9                                   ret
  88+ AEAA              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ AEAA AF          >                    xor a
  88+ AEAB 95          >                    sub l
  88+ AEAC 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ AEAD 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ AEAE 94          >                    sub h
  88+ AEAF 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ AEB0 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ AEB1 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ AEB3 B4                                   or      h
  92+ AEB4 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ AEB5 C9                                   ret
  94+ AEB6
  95+ AEB6
  96+ AEB6                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ AEB6                  ;
  98+ AEB6                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ AEB6                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ AEB6                  ;
 101+ AEB6                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ AEB6                  ;         carry reset
 103+ AEB6                  ;
 104+ AEB6                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ AEB6 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ AEB7 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ AEB8 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ AEBA EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ AEBB ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ AEBD
 111+ AEBD 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ AEBE 85                                   add a,l
 113+ AEBF 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ AEC0 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ AEC1
 116+ AEC1 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ AEC2 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ AEC4 C9                                   ret
 119+ AEC5
 120+ AEC5
 121+ AEC5
 122+ AEC5                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ AEC5                 ;
 124+ AEC5                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ AEC5                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ AEC5                 ;
 127+ AEC5                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ AEC5                 ;         carry reset
 129+ AEC5                 ;
 130+ AEC5                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ AEC5
 132+ AEC5
 133+ AEC5
 134+ AEC5 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ AEC6 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ AEC7 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ AEC8 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ AEC9 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ AECA 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ AECB              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ AECB ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ AECD EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ AECE ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ AED0
 145+ AED0 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ AED1 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ AED2 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ AED3
 149+ AED3 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ AED4 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ AED5 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ AED7
 153+ AED7 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ AED8 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ AED9
 156+ AED9 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ AEDA 85                                   add a,l
 158+ AEDB 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ AEDC 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ AEDD
 161+ AEDD D1                                   pop de
 162+ AEDE ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ AEE0
 164+ AEE0 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ AEE1 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ AEE3 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ AEE4
 168+ AEE4 C9                                   ret
 169+ AEE5
 170+ AEE5              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ AEE5              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ AEE5              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ AEE5              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ AEE5              ;         carry reset
 175+ AEE5              ; maths is
 176+ AEE5              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ AEE5              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ AEE5              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ AEE5              ;
 180+ AEE5              ;
 181+ AEE5              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ AEE5 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ AEE6 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ AEE7 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ AEE8 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ AEE9 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ AEEA 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ AEEB ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ AEED EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ AEEE ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ AEF0 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ AEF1 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ AEF2 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ AEF3 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ AEF5 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ AEF6 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ AEF7 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ AEF8 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ AEF9                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ AEF9 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ AEFA C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ AEFB C9                                   ret
 203+ AEFC
 204+ AEFC
 205+ AEFC              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 206+ AEFC              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 207+ AEFC 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 208+ AEFD AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 209+ AEFE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 210+ AF00 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 211+ AF02 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 212+ AF03 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ AF05 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 214+ AF06 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 215+ AF07 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 216+ AF09              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 217+ AF09 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 218+ AF0A 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 219+ AF0B ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 220+ AF0D 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 221+ AF0E 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 222+ AF0F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 223+ AF10 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 224+ AF11 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 225+ AF12 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 226+ AF13 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 227+ AF15 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 228+ AF16 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 229+ AF17 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 230+ AF18 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 231+ AF19 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 232+ AF1A 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 233+ AF1B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 234+ AF1C ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 235+ AF1E 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 236+ AF1F 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 237+ AF20 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 238+ AF22 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 239+ AF23 C9                                   ret
 240+ AF24
 241+ AF24              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 242+ AF24              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 243+ AF24              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 244+ AF24              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 245+ AF24              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 246+ AF24              ;mult3
 247+ AF24              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 248+ AF24              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 249+ AF24              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 250+ AF24              ; Algorithm
 251+ AF24              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 252+ AF24              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 253+ AF24              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 254+ AF24              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 255+ AF24              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 256+ AF24              ;
 257+ AF24              ;
 258+ AF24 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 259+ AF25 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 260+ AF26 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 261+ AF28 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 262+ AF2A 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 263+ AF2B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 264+ AF2D 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 265+ AF2E 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 266+ AF2F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 267+ AF31 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 268+ AF32 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 269+ AF33 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 270+ AF35 7C                                   ld      a,h
 271+ AF36 B5                                   or      l
 272+ AF37 B3                                   or      e
 273+ AF38 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 274+ AF3A              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 275+ AF3A 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 276+ AF3B ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 277+ AF3D 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 278+ AF3E FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 279+ AF40 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 280+ AF41 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 281+ AF42 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 282+ AF44 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 283+ AF46 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 284+ AF47 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 285+ AF48 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 286+ AF4A 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 287+ AF4B 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 288+ AF4C ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 289+ AF4E FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 290+ AF50 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 291+ AF51 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 292+ AF52 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 293+ AF53 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 294+ AF55 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 295+ AF57 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 296+ AF58 C9                                   ret
 297+ AF59 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 298+ AF5C                                      ZeroA
 298+ AF5C AF          >                        xor a
 299+ AF5D 4F                                   ld      c,a
 300+ AF5E 6F                                   ld      l,a
 301+ AF5F C9                                   ret
 302+ AF60
 303+ AF60              ;;;
 304+ AF60              ;;;
 305+ AF60              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 306+ AF60              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 307+ AF60              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 308+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 309+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 310+ AF60              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 311+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 312+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 313+ AF60              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 314+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 315+ AF60              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 316+ AF60              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 317+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 318+ AF60              ;;;                        or      l
 319+ AF60              ;;;                        or      e
 320+ AF60              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 321+ AF60              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 322+ AF60              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 323+ AF60              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 324+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 325+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 326+ AF60              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 327+ AF60              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 328+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 329+ AF60              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 330+ AF60              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 331+ AF60              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 332+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 333+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 334+ AF60              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 335+ AF60              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 336+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 337+ AF60              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 338+ AF60              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 339+ AF60              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 340+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 341+ AF60              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 342+ AF60              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 343+ AF60              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 344+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 345+ AF60              ;;;                        ret
 346+ AF60              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 347+ AF60              ;;;                        ZeroA
 348+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 349+ AF60              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 350+ AF60              ;;;                        ret
 351+ AF60
 352+ AF60              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 353+ AF60              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 354+ AF60              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 355+ AF60              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 356+ AF60              ;         carry reset
 357+ AF60              ;
 358+ AF60              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 359+ AF60 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 360+ AF61 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 361+ AF62 32 60 AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 362+ AF65 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 363+ AF66 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 364+ AF69 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 365+ AF6B E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 366+ AF6D 57                                   ld      d,a
 367+ AF6E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 368+ AF70 32 60 AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 369+ AF73 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 370+ AF74 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 371+ AF77 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 372+ AF79 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 373+ AF7B 67                                   ld      h,a
 374+ AF7C 3A 60 AF                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 375+ AF7F EE 80                                xor     $80
 376+ AF81 32 60 AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 377+ AF84 CD E5 AE     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 378+ AF87 3A 60 AF     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 379+ AF8A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 380+ AF8D C8                                   ret     z
 381+ AF8E AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 382+ AF8F 95                                   sub 	l
 383+ AF90 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 384+ AF91 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 385+ AF92 94                                   sub 	h
 386+ AF93 67                                   ld 		h,a
 387+ AF94 C9                                   ret
 388+ AF95
 389+ AF95 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 390+ AF96 32 60 AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 391+ AF99 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 392+ AF9A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 393+ AF9D 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 394+ AF9F E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 395+ AFA1 57                                   ld      d,a
 396+ AFA2 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 397+ AFA4 32 60 AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 398+ AFA7 CD E5 AE     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 399+ AFAA 3A 60 AF     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 400+ AFAD ED 27 80                             test    $80
 401+ AFB0 C8                                   ret     z
 402+ AFB1 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 403+ AFB2 95                                   sub 	l
 404+ AFB3 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 405+ AFB4 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 406+ AFB5 94                                   sub 	h
 407+ AFB6 67                                   ld 		h,a
 408+ AFB7 C9                                   ret
 409+ AFB8
 410+ AFB8
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1238  AFB8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ AFB8              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ AFB8              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ AFB8
   4+ AFB8              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ AFB8 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ AFB8 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ AFB8 ~            			mul
   8+ AFB8              			ENDM
   9+ AFB8
  10+ AFB8              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ AFB8 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ AFB8 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ AFB8 ~            			mul
  14+ AFB8 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ AFB8              			ENDM
  16+ AFB8
  17+ AFB8
  18+ AFB8              asm_squa:
  19+ AFB8 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ AFBA              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ AFBA              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ AFBA              asm_squa2:
  23+ AFBA 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ AFBB 57           	ld d,a
  25+ AFBC ED 30        	mul
  26+ AFBE ED 53 D6 9C  	ld (varP),de
  27+ AFC2 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ AFC3 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1239  AFC4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ AFC4              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ AFC4              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ AFC4              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ AFC4              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ AFC4              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ AFC4              asm_sqrt:
   7+ AFC4 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ AFC7 61           	ld h,c
   9+ AFC8 69           	ld l,c
  10+ AFC9              .sqrloop:
  11+ AFC9 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ AFCB CB 19        	rr c
  13+ AFCD 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ AFCE EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ AFCF ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ AFD1 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ AFD3 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ AFD4 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ AFD5 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ AFD7              .sqrbit:
  21+ AFD7 19           	add hl,de
  22+ AFD8 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ AFD9 B7           	or a
  24+ AFDA ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ AFDC              .sqrfi:
  26+ AFDC CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ AFDE CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ AFE0 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ AFE2 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ AFE4 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ AFE6 C9           	ret
  32+ AFE7
  33+ AFE7
  34+ AFE7              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ AFE7 3A D9 9D     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ AFEA 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ AFEB 3A DA 9D     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ AFEE 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ AFEF CD C4 AF     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ AFF2 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ AFF3 32 D9 9D     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ AFF6 C9           	ret
  43+ AFF7
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1240  AFF7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ AFF7              ;
   2+ AFF7              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ AFF7              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ AFF7              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ AFF7              ;               if a >= D
   6+ AFF7              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ AFF7              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ AFF7              ;           else
   9+ AFF7
  10+ AFF7              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ AFF7              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ AFF7              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ AFF7              ;
  14+ AFF7              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  15+ AFF7              ;
  16+ AFF7              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  17+ AFF7              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  18+ AFF7 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
  19+ AFF8 15                                   dec     d
  20+ AFF9 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
  21+ AFFB 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
  22+ AFFD 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
  23+ AFFF 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
  24+ B000 B3                                   or      e
  25+ B001 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
  26+ B003 14                                   inc     d
  27+ B004 15                                   dec     d
  28+ B005 CD B0 B1                             call    BC_Div_DE
  29+ B008                                      ZeroA
  29+ B008 AF          >                        xor a
  30+ B009 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
  31+ B00A 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
  32+ B00C 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
  33+ B00D C9                                   ret
  34+ B00E AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
  35+ B00F 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
  36+ B010 67                                   ld      h,a
  37+ B011 6F                                   ld      l,a
  38+ B012 C9                                   ret
  39+ B013 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
  40+ B015 67                                   ld      h,a
  41+ B016 6F                                   ld      l,a
  42+ B017                                      SetCarryFlag
  42+ B017 37          >                        scf
  43+ B018 C9                                   ret
  44+ B019
  45+ B019              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  46+ B019 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
  47+ B01B CB 27                                sla		a							;
  48+ B01D 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
  49+ B01E CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
  50+ B020 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
  51+ B022 BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
  52+ B023 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
  53+ B025              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
  53+ B025 B7          >                        or a
  54+ B026 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
  55+ B027                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
  55+ B027 B7          >                        or a
  56+ B028 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
  57+ B029 CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
  58+ B02B 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
  59+ B02D BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
  60+ B02E 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
  61+ B030                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
  61+ B030 B7          >                        or a
  62+ B031 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
  63+ B033 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
  64+ B034 CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
  65+ B036 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
  66+ B038 BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
  67+ B039 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
  68+ B03B 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
  69+ B03C 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
  70+ B03D CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
  71+ B03F 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
  72+ B041 C9                                   ret
  73+ B042 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
  74+ B043                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
  74+ B043 37          >                        scf
  75+ B044 CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
  76+ B046 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
  77+ B048 C9                                   ret
  78+ B049 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
  79+ B04B C9                                   ret
  80+ B04C
  81+ B04C BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
  82+ B04D 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
  83+ B04F 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
  84+ B051 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  85+ B053 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  86+ B055 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  87+ B057                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  87+ B057 BA          >                        cp      d
  87+ B058 DA 5D B0    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  88+ B05B 92                                   sub     d
  89+ B05C                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  89+ B05C B7          >                        or a
  90+ B05D              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  90+ B05D 3F          >                        ccf
  91+ B05E CB 13                                rl      e
  92+ B060 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  93+ B062 7B                                   ld      a,e
  94+ B063 C9                                   ret
  95+ B064 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  96+ B065                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  96+ B065 37          >                        scf
  97+ B066 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  98+ B068 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  99+ B06A 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 100+ B06B C9                                   ret
 101+ B06C 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 102+ B06E C9                                   ret
 103+ B06F 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 104+ B071 C9                                   ret
 105+ B072
 106+ B072
 107+ B072              ; Divide 8-bit values
 108+ B072              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 109+ B072              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 110+ B072              ;
 111+ B072              ;;;Div8:
 112+ B072              ;;;    xor a
 113+ B072              ;;;    ld b,8
 114+ B072              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 115+ B072              ;;;    rl e
 116+ B072              ;;;    rla
 117+ B072              ;;;    sub c
 118+ B072              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 119+ B072              ;;;    add a,c
 120+ B072              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 121+ B072              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 122+ B072              ;;;    ld b,a0
 123+ B072              ;;;    ld a,e
 124+ B072              ;;;    rla
 125+ B072              ;;;    cpl
 126+ B072              ;;;    ret
 127+ B072
 128+ B072              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 129+ B072              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 130+ B072              ;;         A is a copy of E
 131+ B072              ;;         HL is the remainder
 132+ B072              ;;         BC is not changed
 133+ B072              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 134+ B072              ;140 bytes
 135+ B072              ;145cc
 136+ B072
 137+ B072              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 138+ B072 ~                                rla
 139+ B072 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 140+ B072 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 141+ B072 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 142+ B072 ~                                add     hl,bc
 143+ B072                                  ENDM
 144+ B072
 145+ B072              DEequDEDivBC:
 146+ B072 AF               xor a
 147+ B073 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
 148+ B075 7A               ld a,d
