 176+ B0FE
 177+ B0FE              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 178+ B0FE              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 179+ B0FE              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 180+ B0FE              ; Our use
 181+ B0FE              ; BC = A0
 182+ B0FE              ; DE = 0C
 183+ B0FE              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 184+ B0FE              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 184+ B0FE B9          >                        cp     c
 184+ B0FF D2 2A B1    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 185+ B102 47                                   ld      b,a
 186+ B103 59                                   ld      e,c
 187+ B104 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 188+ B106 16 00                                ld      d,0
 189+ B108 C3 15 B1                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 190+ B10B 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 191+ B10C 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 192+ B10E 21 D9 9D                             ld      hl,varQ
 193+ B111 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 194+ B112 16 00                                ld      d,0
 195+ B114 5F                                   ld      e,a
 196+ B115              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 197+ B115 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 198+ B118 78                                   ld      a,b
 199+ B119 06 10                                ld      b,16
 200+ B11B CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 201+ B11D 17                                   rla			; ...
 202+ B11E ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 203+ B120 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 204+ B122 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 205+ B124 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 206+ B125 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 207+ B126 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 208+ B128 47                                   ld   b,a
 209+ B129 C9                                   ret
 210+ B12A 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 211+ B12D C9                                   ret
 212+ B12E
 213+ B12E              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 214+ B12E 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 215+ B130 AF                                   xor a
 216+ B131 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 217+ B133 17                                   rla
 218+ B134 BA                                   cp d
 219+ B135 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 219+ B137
 220+ B137 0C                                   inc c
 221+ B138 92                                   sub d
 222+ B139 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 223+ B13B C9                                   ret
 224+ B13C              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 225+ B13C 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 226+ B13E AF                                   xor a
 227+ B13F CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 228+ B141 CB 14                                rl	h
 229+ B143              ;    add hl,hl
 230+ B143 17                                   rla
 231+ B144 B9                                   cp c
 232+ B145 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 233+ B147 2C                                   inc l
 234+ B148 91                                   sub c
 235+ B149 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 236+ B14B C9                                   ret
 237+ B14C              ;
 238+ B14C              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 239+ B14C              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 240+ B14C              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 241+ B14C              ;
 242+ B14C              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 243+ B14C ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 244+ B14C ~            					rla				; ...
 245+ B14C ~            					cp	c			; ...
 246+ B14C ~            					jr	1F
 247+ B14C ~            					sub	c			; ...
 248+ B14C ~            1:
 249+ B14C ~            					inc	l			; ...
 250+ B14C              					ENDM
 251+ B14C
 252+ B14C
 253+ B14C
 254+ B14C              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 255+ B14C 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 256+ B14F 78                               ld a,b
 257+ B150 06 08                            ld b,8
 258+ B152 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 259+ B153 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 260+ B155 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 261+ B157 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 262+ B159 19                               add hl,de
 263+ B15A 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 264+ B15C 17                               rla
 265+ B15D 2F                               cpl
 266+ B15E 47                               ld b,a
 267+ B15F 79                               ld a,c
 268+ B160 48                               ld c,b
 269+ B161 06 08                            ld b,8
 270+ B163 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 271+ B164 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 272+ B166 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 273+ B168 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 274+ B16A 19                               add hl,de
 275+ B16B 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 276+ B16D 17                               rla
 277+ B16E 2F                               cpl
 278+ B16F 41                               ld b,c
 279+ B170 4F                               ld c,a
 280+ B171 C9                               ret
 281+ B172
 282+ B172
 283+ B172              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 284+ B172 ~                                    rl  e
 285+ B172 ~                                    rla
 286+ B172 ~                                    sub c
 287+ B172 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 288+ B172 ~                                    add a,c
 289+ B172 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 290+ B172                                      ENDM
 291+ B172
 292+ B172              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 293+ B172              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 293+ B172 AF          >                        xor a
 294+ B173                                      EDivC_Iteration
 294+ B173 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 294+ B175 17          >                        rla
 294+ B176 91          >                        sub c
 294+ B177 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 294+ B179 81          >                        add a,c
 294+ B17A             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 295+ B17A                                      EDivC_Iteration
 295+ B17A CB 13       >                        rl  e
 295+ B17C 17          >                        rla
 295+ B17D 91          >                        sub c
 295+ B17E 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 295+ B180 81          >                        add a,c
 295+ B181             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 296+ B181                                      EDivC_Iteration
 296+ B181 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 296+ B183 17          >                        rla
 296+ B184 91          >                        sub c
 296+ B185 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 296+ B187 81          >                        add a,c
 296+ B188             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 297+ B188                                      EDivC_Iteration
 297+ B188 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 297+ B18A 17          >                        rla
 297+ B18B 91          >                        sub c
 297+ B18C 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 297+ B18E 81          >                        add a,c
 297+ B18F             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 298+ B18F                                      EDivC_Iteration
 298+ B18F CB 13       >                        rl  e
 298+ B191 17          >                        rla
 298+ B192 91          >                        sub c
 298+ B193 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 298+ B195 81          >                        add a,c
 298+ B196             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 299+ B196                                      EDivC_Iteration
 299+ B196 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 299+ B198 17          >                        rla
 299+ B199 91          >                        sub c
 299+ B19A 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 299+ B19C 81          >                        add a,c
 299+ B19D             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 300+ B19D                                      EDivC_Iteration
 300+ B19D CB 13       >                        rl  e
 300+ B19F 17          >                        rla
 300+ B1A0 91          >                        sub c
 300+ B1A1 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 300+ B1A3 81          >                        add a,c
 300+ B1A4             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 301+ B1A4                                      EDivC_Iteration
 301+ B1A4 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 301+ B1A6 17          >                        rla
 301+ B1A7 91          >                        sub c
 301+ B1A8 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 301+ B1AA 81          >                        add a,c
 301+ B1AB             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 302+ B1AB 47                                   ld      b,a
 303+ B1AC 7B                                   ld      a,e
 304+ B1AD 17                                   rla
 305+ B1AE 2F                                   cpl
 306+ B1AF C9                                   ret
 307+ B1B0
 308+ B1B0
 309+ B1B0              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 310+ B1B0 ~                                    rla
 311+ B1B0 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 312+ B1B0 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 313+ B1B0 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 314+ B1B0 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 315+ B1B0 ~            1:
 316+ B1B0                                      ENDM
 317+ B1B0
 318+ B1B0
 319+ B1B0              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 320+ B1B0              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 321+ B1B0              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 322+ B1B0              ;min: 738cc
 323+ B1B0              ;max: 898cc
 324+ B1B0              ;avg: 818cc
 325+ B1B0              ;144 bytes
 326+ B1B0 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 327+ B1B1 67                                   ld h,a
 328+ B1B2 6F                                   ld l,a
 329+ B1B3 93                                   sub e
 330+ B1B4 5F                                   ld e,a
 331+ B1B5 9F                                   sbc a,a
 332+ B1B6 92                                   sub d
 333+ B1B7 57                                   ld d,a
 334+ B1B8 78                                   ld a,b
 335+ B1B9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 335+ B1B9 17          >                        rla
 335+ B1BA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 335+ B1BC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 335+ B1BD 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 335+ B1BF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 335+ B1C1             >1:
 336+ B1C1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 336+ B1C1 17          >                        rla
 336+ B1C2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 336+ B1C4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 336+ B1C5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 336+ B1C7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 336+ B1C9             >1:
 337+ B1C9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 337+ B1C9 17          >                        rla
 337+ B1CA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 337+ B1CC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 337+ B1CD 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 337+ B1CF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 337+ B1D1             >1:
 338+ B1D1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 338+ B1D1 17          >                        rla
 338+ B1D2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 338+ B1D4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 338+ B1D5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 338+ B1D7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 338+ B1D9             >1:
 339+ B1D9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 339+ B1D9 17          >                        rla
 339+ B1DA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 339+ B1DC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 339+ B1DD 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 339+ B1DF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 339+ B1E1             >1:
 340+ B1E1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 340+ B1E1 17          >                        rla
 340+ B1E2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 340+ B1E4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 340+ B1E5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 340+ B1E7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 340+ B1E9             >1:
 341+ B1E9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 341+ B1E9 17          >                        rla
 341+ B1EA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 341+ B1EC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 341+ B1ED 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 341+ B1EF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 341+ B1F1             >1:
 342+ B1F1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 342+ B1F1 17          >                        rla
 342+ B1F2 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 342+ B1F4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 342+ B1F5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 342+ B1F7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 342+ B1F9             >1:
 343+ B1F9 17                                   rla
 344+ B1FA 47                                   ld b,a
 345+ B1FB
 346+ B1FB 79                                   ld a,c
 347+ B1FC                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 347+ B1FC 17          >                        rla
 347+ B1FD ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 347+ B1FF 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 347+ B200 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 347+ B202 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 347+ B204             >1:
 348+ B204                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 348+ B204 17          >                        rla
 348+ B205 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 348+ B207 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 348+ B208 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 348+ B20A ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 348+ B20C             >1:
 349+ B20C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 349+ B20C 17          >                        rla
 349+ B20D ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 349+ B20F 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 349+ B210 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 349+ B212 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 349+ B214             >1:
 350+ B214                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 350+ B214 17          >                        rla
 350+ B215 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 350+ B217 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 350+ B218 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 350+ B21A ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 350+ B21C             >1:
 351+ B21C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 351+ B21C 17          >                        rla
 351+ B21D ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 351+ B21F 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 351+ B220 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 351+ B222 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 351+ B224             >1:
 352+ B224                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 352+ B224 17          >                        rla
 352+ B225 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 352+ B227 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 352+ B228 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 352+ B22A ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 352+ B22C             >1:
 353+ B22C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 353+ B22C 17          >                        rla
 353+ B22D ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 353+ B22F 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 353+ B230 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 353+ B232 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 353+ B234             >1:
 354+ B234                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 354+ B234 17          >                        rla
 354+ B235 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 354+ B237 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 354+ B238 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 354+ B23A ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 354+ B23C             >1:
 355+ B23C 17                                   rla
 356+ B23D 4F                                   ld c,a
 357+ B23E C9                                   ret
 358+ B23F
 359+ B23F              ;Inputs:
 360+ B23F              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 361+ B23F              ;Outputs:
 362+ B23F              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 363+ B23F              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 364+ B23F              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 365+ B23F              ;Otherwise:
 366+ B23F              ;min: 1107cc
 367+ B23F              ;max: 1319cc
 368+ B23F              ;avg: 1201cc
 369+ B23F 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 370+ B240 AA                                   xor d
 371+ B241 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 372+ B242              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 373+ B242 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 374+ B243 F2 4C B2                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 375+ B246 AF                                   xor a
 376+ B247 91                                   sub c
 377+ B248 4F                                   ld c,a
 378+ B249 9F                                   sbc a,a
 379+ B24A 90                                   sub b
 380+ B24B 47                                   ld b,a
 381+ B24C 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 382+ B24D B2                                   or d
 383+ B24E FA 57 B2                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 384+ B251 AF                                   xor a
 385+ B252 93                                   sub e
 386+ B253 5F                                   ld e,a
 387+ B254 9F                                   sbc a,a
 388+ B255 92                                   sub d
 389+ B256 57                                   ld d,a
 390+ B257 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 391+ B258 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 392+ B25A 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 393+ B25C 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 394+ B25D 83                                   add a,e
 395+ B25E 7A                                   ld a,d
 396+ B25F 8C                                   adc a,h
 397+ B260 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 398+ B262 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 399+ B263 79                                   ld a,c
 400+ B264 CD 7F B2                             call div_fixed88_sub
 401+ B267 4F                                   ld c,a
 402+ B268 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 403+ B269 CD 7F B2                             call div_fixed88_sub
 404+ B26C 51                                   ld d,c
 405+ B26D 5F                                   ld e,a
 406+ B26E F1                                   pop af
 407+ B26F F0                                   ret p
 408+ B270 AF                                   xor a
 409+ B271 93                                   sub e
 410+ B272 5F                                   ld e,a
 411+ B273 9F                                   sbc a,a
 412+ B274 92                                   sub d
 413+ B275 57                                   ld d,a
 414+ B276 C9                                   ret
 415+ B277
 416+ B277 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 417+ B27A F1                                   pop af
 418+ B27B F0                                   ret p
 419+ B27C 13                                   inc de
 420+ B27D 1C                                   inc e
 421+ B27E C9                                   ret
 422+ B27F
 423+ B27F              ;min: 456cc
 424+ B27F              ;max: 536cc
 425+ B27F              ;avg: 496cc
 426+ B27F 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 427+ B281 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 428+ B282 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 429+ B284 19                                   add hl,de
 430+ B285 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 431+ B287 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 432+ B289 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 433+ B28B 8F                                   adc a,a
 434+ B28C C9                                   ret
 435+ B28D
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1241  B28D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ B28D              asm_tis2:
   2+ B28D              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ B28D              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ B28D F5           	push af
   5+ B28E E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ B290 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ B291 3A D9 9D     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ B294 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ B295 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ B296 BB           	cp e
  11+ B297 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ B299 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ B29B ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ B29D EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ B29E 3A D9 9D     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ B2A1 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ B2A2 CD 3C B1     	call asm_div16
  18+ B2A5 F1           	pop af
  19+ B2A6 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ B2A8 B5           	or l
  21+ B2A9 C9           	ret
  22+ B2AA              .tis2_set96:
  23+ B2AA F1           	pop af
  24+ B2AB E6 80        	and $80
  25+ B2AD F6 96        	or $96
  26+ B2AF C9           	ret
  27+ B2B0
  28+ B2B0
  29+ B2B0              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ B2B0              squareregfx:
  31+ B2B0 3A 87 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ B2B3 57           	ld d,a
  33+ B2B4 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ B2B5 ED 30        	mul
  35+ B2B7 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ B2B8              squareregfy:
  37+ B2B8 3A 89 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ B2BB 57           	ld d,a
  39+ B2BC 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ B2BD ED 30        	mul
  41+ B2BF 19           	add hl,de
  42+ B2C0              squareregfz:
  43+ B2C0 3A 8B C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ B2C3 57           	ld d,a
  45+ B2C4 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ B2C5 ED 30        	mul
  47+ B2C7 19           	add hl,de
  48+ B2C8 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ B2C9              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ B2C9 CD C4 AF     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ B2CC E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ B2CD E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ B2CE E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ B2CF              normfx:
  55+ B2CF 3A 87 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ B2D2 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ B2D3 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ B2D4 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ B2D5 CD 8D B2     	call asm_tis2
  60+ B2D8 32 87 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ B2DB              normfy:
  62+ B2DB 3A 89 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ B2DE E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ B2DF 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ B2E0 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ B2E1 CD 8D B2     	call asm_tis2
  67+ B2E4 32 89 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ B2E7              normfz:
  69+ B2E7 3A 8B C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ B2EA E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ B2EB 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ B2EC 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ B2ED CD 8D B2     	call asm_tis2
  74+ B2F0 32 8B C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ B2F3              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ B2F3 C9           	ret
  77+ B2F4
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1242  B2F4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ B2F4              ; Input:
   2+ B2F4              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ B2F4              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ B2F4              ; Output:
   5+ B2F4              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ B2F4              ;
   7+ B2F4              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ B2F4              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ B2F4              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ B2F4              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ B2F4              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ B2F4              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ B2F4              ;
  14+ B2F4
  15+ B2F4 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ B2F5 A7                               and     a
  17+ B2F6 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ B2F8 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ B2F9 C9                               ret
  20+ B2FA
  21+ B2FA              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ B2FA              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ B2FA
  24+ B2FA E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ B2FC 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ B2FD E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ B2FF 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ B300 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ B301 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ B303 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ B304 A7                               and     a
  32+ B305 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ B307 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ B309 C9                               ret
  35+ B30A
  36+ B30A
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1243  B30A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ B30A              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ B30A              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ B30A              negate16:
   4+ B30A              negate16hl:
   5+ B30A                      ; Input:
   6+ B30A                      ;       HL = value
   7+ B30A                      ; Output:
   8+ B30A                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ B30A                      ; Destroys:
  10+ B30A                      ;       AF
  11+ B30A                      ;
  12+ B30A AF           	xor 	a
  13+ B30B 95           	sub 	l
  14+ B30C 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ B30D 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ B30E 94           	sub 	h
  17+ B30F 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ B310 C9           	ret
  19+ B311
  20+ B311              negate16de:
  21+ B311 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ B312 93           	sub 	e
  23+ B313 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ B314 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ B315 92           	sub 	d
  26+ B316 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ B317 C9           	ret
  28+ B318
  29+ B318              negate16bc:
  30+ B318 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ B319 91           	sub 	c
  32+ B31A 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ B31B 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ B31C 90           	sub 	b
  35+ B31D 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ B31E C9           	ret
  37+ B31F
  38+ B31F
  39+ B31F              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ B31F ~            					xor 	a
  41+ B31F ~            					sub 	l
  42+ B31F ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ B31F ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ B31F ~            					sub 	h
  45+ B31F ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ B31F              					ENDM
  47+ B31F
  48+ B31F              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ B31F ~            					xor 	a
  50+ B31F ~                                sub 	e
  51+ B31F ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ B31F ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ B31F ~                                sub 	d
  54+ B31F ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ B31F              					ENDM
  56+ B31F              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ B31F ~            					xor 	a
  58+ B31F ~                                sub 	c
  59+ B31F ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ B31F ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ B31F ~                                sub 	b
  62+ B31F ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ B31F              					ENDM
  64+ B31F
  65+ B31F              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ B31F ~            					xor 	a
  67+ B31F ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ B31F ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ B31F ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ B31F ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ B31F ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ B31F              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1244  B31F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ B31F DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ B321                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ B321 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B322 D2 37 B3    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ B325 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ B326 CD 2E B1                             call		asm_div8
   5+ B329 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ B32A CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ B32C 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ B32D CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ B32F 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ B330 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ B331 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ B333 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ B335 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ B336 C9                                   ret
  15+ B337              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ B337              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ B337 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ B339 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ B33B F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ B33D C9                                   ret
  21+ B33E
  22+ B33E
  23+ B33E
  24+ B33E
  25+ B33E              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ B33E                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ B33E 3A 87 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ B341 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ B343 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ B345              N96SQX:
  31+ B345              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ B345 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ B346 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ B347 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ B349 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ B34A 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ B34B              N96SQY:
  35+ B34B 3A 88 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ B34E DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ B350 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ B352              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ B352 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ B353 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ B354 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ B356 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ B357              N96SQZ:
  41+ B357 3A 89 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ B35A FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ B35C E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ B35E              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ B35E 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ B35F 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ B360 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ B362              N96SQADD:
  46+ B362 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ B363 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ B364              N96SQRT:
  49+ B364 CD C4 AF     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ B367              N96NORMX:
  51+ B367 3A 87 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ B36A E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ B36C 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ B36D 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ B36E CD 95 B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ B371 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ B372 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ B374 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ B376 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ B377 32 87 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ B37A              N96NORMY:
  62+ B37A 3A 88 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ B37D E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ B37F 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ B380 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ B381 CD 95 B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ B384 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ B385 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ B387 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ B389 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ B38A 32 88 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ B38D              N96NORMZ:
  73+ B38D 3A 89 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ B390 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ B392 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ B393 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ B394 CD 95 B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ B397 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ B398 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ B39A E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ B39C B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ B39D 32 89 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ B3A0 C9           	ret
  84+ B3A1
  85+ B3A1              ; Normalise vector
  86+ B3A1              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ B3A1              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ B3A1              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ B3A1              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ B3A1              ;
  91+ B3A1              ;
  92+ B3A1              ;
  93+ B3A1
  94+ B3A1              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ B3A1 3A 87 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ B3A4                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ B3A4 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ B3A5 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ B3A6 ED 30       >			mul
  97+ B3A8 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ B3A9 32 DA 9D                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ B3AC 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ B3AD 32 D9 9D                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ B3B0 32 D6 9C                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ B3B3 3A 88 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ B3B6                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ B3B6 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ B3B7 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ B3B8 ED 30       >			mul
 104+ B3BA 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ B3BB 32 F5 9D                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ B3BE 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ B3BF 32 D6 9C                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ B3C2 21 D9 9D                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ B3C5 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ B3C6 32 D9 9D                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ B3C9 3A F5 9D                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ B3CC 21 DA 9D                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ B3CF 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ B3D0 32 DA 9D                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ B3D3 3A 89 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ B3D6                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ B3D6 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ B3D7 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ B3D8 ED 30       >			mul
 117+ B3DA 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ B3DB 32 F5 9D                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ B3DE 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ B3DF 32 D6 9C                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ B3E2 21 D9 9D                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ B3E5 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ B3E6 32 D9 9D                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ B3E9 3A F5 9D                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ B3EC 21 DA 9D                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ B3EF 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ B3F0 32 DA 9D                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ B3F3 CD E7 AF                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ B3F6 3A 87 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ B3F9 CD 8F B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ B3FC 32 87 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ B3FF 3A 88 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ B402 CD 8F B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ B405 32 88 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ B408 3A 88 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ B40B CD 8F B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ B40E 32 88 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ B411 C9                                   ret
 139+ B412
 140+ B412
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1245  B412                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ B412              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ B412              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ B412              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ B412              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ B412              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ B412              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ B412              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ B412 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ B415 CD 2B B4     	call	Num1
  10+ B418 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ B41B CD 2B B4     	call	Num1
  12+ B41E 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ B421 CD 2B B4     	call	Num1
  14+ B424 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ B426 CD 2B B4     	call	Num1
  16+ B429 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ B42B              Num1:
  18+ B42B 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ B42D              .Num2:
  20+ B42D 3C           	inc	a
  21+ B42E 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ B42F 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ B431 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ B433 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ B434 13           	inc	de
  26+ B435 C9           	ret
  27+ B436
  28+ B436              DispAtoDE:
  29+ B436 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ B438 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ B439 C3 12 B4     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ B43C
  33+ B43C              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ B43C 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ B43E 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ B43F 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ B442 CD 52 B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ B445 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ B447 CD 2B B4     	call	Num1
  40+ B44A 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ B44C 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ B44D 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ B44E 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ B450 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ B452              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ B452 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ B454              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ B454 3C           	inc	a
  49+ B455 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ B456 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ B458 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ B45A 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ B45C              .Blank:
  54+ B45C 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ B45E              .DontBlank:
  56+ B45E ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ B460 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ B461 13           	inc	de
  59+ B462 C9           	ret
  60+ B463
  61+ B463              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ B463 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ B465 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ B467 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ B469 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ B46A 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ B46D CD 79 B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ B470 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ B472 CD 79 B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ B475 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ B477 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ B479              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ B479 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ B47B              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ B47B 3C           	inc	a
  76+ B47C 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ B47D 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ B47F FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ B481 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ B483              .Blank:
  81+ B483 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ B485              .DontBlank:
  83+ B485 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ B487 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ B488 13           	inc	de
  86+ B489 C9           	ret
  87+ B48A              .NoStock:
  88+ B48A 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ B48C 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ B48D 13           	inc	de
  91+ B48E 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ B48F 13           	inc	de
  93+ B490 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ B492 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ B493 13           	inc de
  96+ B494 C9           	ret
  97+ B495
  98+ B495
  99+ B495              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ B495              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ B495              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ B495              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ B495 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ B499 0A 00 00 00
 103+ B49D 64 00 00 00
 103+ B4A1 E8 03 00 00
 103+ B4A5 10 27 00 00
 104+ B4A9 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ B4AD 40 42 0F 00
 104+ B4B1 80 96 98 00
 104+ B4B5 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ B4B9 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ B4BD 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ B4C1
 107+ B4C1              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ B4C1 CD D0 B4     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ B4C4 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ B4C7 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ B4CA 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ B4CC FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ B4CF C9                                   ret
 114+ B4D0
 115+ B4D0 DD 22 BD B4  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ B4D4 ED 53 BF B4                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ B4D8 DD 21 B9 B4                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ B4DC 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ B4DE 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ B4E0 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ B4E2 B7                                   or a
 122+ B4E3 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ B4E6 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ B4E9 2A BD B4                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ B4EC ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ B4EE 22 BD B4                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ B4F1 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ B4F4 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ B4F7 2A BF B4                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ B4FA ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ B4FC 22 BF B4                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ B4FF 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ B501 0C                                   inc c
 134+ B502 3C                                   inc a
 135+ B503 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ B505 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ B508 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ B50B 2A BD B4                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ B50E 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ B50F 22 BD B4                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ B512 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ B515 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ B518 2A BF B4                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ B51B ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ B51D 22 BF B4                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ B520 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ B523 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ B525 0C                                   inc c
 149+ B526 0D                                   dec c
 150+ B527 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ B529 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ B52C FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ B52E 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ B530 3A BD B4                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ B533 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ B535 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ B538 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ B53C C9                                   ret
 159+ B53D
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1246  B53D                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ B53D              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ B53D              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ B53D              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ B53D 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ B53E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ B540 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ B541                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ B541 FA 4F B5    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ B544 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ B545 B1                                   or      c
  10+ B546                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ B546 FA 4B B5    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ B549 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ B54A C9                                   ret
  13+ B54B 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ B54C 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ B54D B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ B54E C9                                   ret
  17+ B54F B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ B550 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ B552 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ B554 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ B555 C9                                   ret
  22+ B556              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ B556 AF          >                    xor a
  22+ B557 95          >                    sub l
  22+ B558 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ B559 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ B55A 94          >                    sub h
  22+ B55B 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ B55C 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ B55D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ B55F C9                                   ret
  26+ B560
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
1247  B560              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
1248  B560              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1249  B560                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ B560              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ B560 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ B561 D2 7C B5    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ B564 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ B566 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ B568                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ B568 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ B569 DA 7F B5    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ B56C 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ B56D 37                                   scf
   7+ B56E CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ B570 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ B572 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ B573 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ B575 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ B577 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ B578 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ B57A 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ B57B C9                                   ret
  16+ B57C 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ B57E C9                                   ret
  18+ B57F B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ B580 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ B582 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ B584 C3 72 B5                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ B587
  23+ B587
  24+ B587              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ B587              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ B587              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ B587 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ B589 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ B58B ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ B58D CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ B58F              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ B58F              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ B58F              TIS2:
  34+ B58F 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ B590 3A D9 9D     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ B593 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ B594 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ B595              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ B595 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ B596 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ B598              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ B598 BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ B599 D2 B9 B5    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ B59C 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ B59E              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ B59E CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ B5A0              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ B5A0 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ B5A1 DA BF B5    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ B5A4 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ B5A5 37           	scf
  48+ B5A6 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ B5A8 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ B5AA              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ B5AA 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ B5AB CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ B5AD CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ B5AF 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ B5B0 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ B5B2 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ B5B3 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ B5B4 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ B5B5 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ B5B7 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ B5B8 C9           	ret
  62+ B5B9              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ B5B9              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ B5B9 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ B5BA E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ B5BC F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ B5BE C9           	ret
  68+ B5BF              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ B5BF B7           	or			a
  70+ B5C0 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ B5C2 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ B5C4 C3 AA B5     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ B5C7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1250  B5C7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ B5C7              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ B5C7              fmltu:
   3+ B5C7 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ B5C8 3A D9 9D                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ B5CB 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ B5CC ED 30                                mul
   7+ B5CE 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ B5CF C9                                   ret
   9+ B5D0
  10+ B5D0 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ B5D1 ED 30                                mul
  12+ B5D3 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ B5D4 C9                                   ret
  14+ B5D5
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1251  B5D5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ B5D5              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ B5D5              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ B5D5 21 B9 A0     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ B5D8 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ B5DA ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ B5DC 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ B5DD C3 E9 B5     		jp		DV41
   8+ B5E0              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ B5E0 21 B9 A0     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ B5E3 3A C0 9C     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ B5E6 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ B5E8 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ B5E9              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ B5E9 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ B5EA 3A D5 9D     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ B5ED              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ B5ED 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ B5EF CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ B5F1 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ B5F2 AF           		xor		a
  21+ B5F3              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ B5F3 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ B5F5 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ B5F7 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ B5F8 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ B5FA              DV8:
  27+ B5FA 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ B5FB 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ B5FC              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ B5FC CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ B5FE 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ B600              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ B600              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ B600 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ B602 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ B603              .RollRemainder:
  37+ B603 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ B605 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ B607 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ B608 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ B60A              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ B60A 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ B60B              .DontSBC:
  44+ B60B CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ B60D 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ B60F 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ B610 32 DA 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ B613 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ B614 32 D6 9C     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ B617 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ B618              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ B618 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ B619 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ B61A CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ B61C 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ B61E 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ B61F 32 DA 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ B622 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ B623 32 D6 9C     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ B626 C9           		ret
  61+ B627              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ B627 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ B629 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ B62A 32 DA 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ B62D 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ B62E 32 D6 9C     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ B631 C9           		ret
  68+ B632
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1252  B632                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ B632
   2+ B632              asm_defmutl:
   3+ B632              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ B632              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ B632 ED 30        	mul
   6+ B634 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ B635 C9           	ret

# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
1253  B636              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1254  B636              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1255  B636              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1256  B636                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ B636              APequQmulA:
   2+ B636              asm_mult1:
   3+ B636              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ B636 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ B638 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ B63A 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B63B 3A D9 9D     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ B63E 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ B63F FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ B641 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ B643 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ B644 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ B646 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ B647 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ B648 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ B64A 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ B64B 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ B64C E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ B64E 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ B64F ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ B651 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ B652 32 D6 9C     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ B655 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ B656 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ B657 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ B658 C9           	ret
  27+ B659              .mul0:
  28+ B659 AF           	xor	a
  29+ B65A 32 D6 9C     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ B65D 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ B65E 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ B65F C9           	ret
  33+ B660
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1257  B660                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ B660              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ B660              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ B660              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ B660              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ B660              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ B660              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ B660              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ B660              LL38:
   9+ B660              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ B660              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ B660              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ B660              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ B660              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ B660              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ B660              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ B660              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ B660              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ B660              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ B660              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ B660              ;	ret
  21+ B660              ; calculation table
  22+ B660              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ B660              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ B660              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ B660              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ B660              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ B660              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ B660              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ B660              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ B660              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ B660
  32+ B660              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ B660              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ B660              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ B660              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ B660
  37+ B660
  38+ B660              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ B660 21 DB 9D     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ B663 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ B664 FA 6F B6     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ B667 3A D9 9D     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ B66A 21 DA 9D     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ B66D 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ B66E C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ B66F              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ B66F 3A DA 9D     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ B672 21 D9 9D     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ B675              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ B675              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ B675 B7          >                        or a
  51+ B676 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ B677 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ B679              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ B679              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ B679              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ B679 C9           	ret
  57+ B67A              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ B67A FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ B67C 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ B67E ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ B680 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ B681 3A DB 9D     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ B684 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ B686 32 DB 9D     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ B689 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ B68A                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ B68A B7          >                        or a
  67+ B68B C9           	ret
  68+ B68C              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ B68C 32 DB 9D         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ B68F                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ B68F B7          >                        or a
  71+ B690 C9               ret
  72+ B691              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ B691              ;--	push	bc
  74+ B691              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ B691              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ B691              ;--	sub		b
  77+ B691              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ B691              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ B691              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ B691              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ B691              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ B691              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ B691              ;--	ret
  84+ B691
  85+ B691              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ B691              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ B691              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ B691              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ B691              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ B691              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ B691              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ B691              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ B691              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ B691              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ B691              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ B691              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ B691              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ B691              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ B691              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ B691              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ B691              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ B691              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ B691              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ B691              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ B691              ;;;;	ret
 109+ B691              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ B691              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ B691              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ B691              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ B691              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ B691              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ B691              ;;;;	ret
 117+ B691              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ B691              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ B691              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ B691              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ B691              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ B691              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ B691              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ B691              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ B691              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ B691              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ B691              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ B691              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ B691              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ B691              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ B691              ;;;;	ret
 134+ B691              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ B691              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ B691              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ B691              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ B691              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ B691              ;;;;	ret
 141+ B691
 142+ B691
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ B691              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ B691              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ B691              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ B691
   5+ B691
   6+ B691              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ B691 3A C0 9C     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ B694 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ B695              moveship4breg:
  10+ B695              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ B695              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ B695              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ B695 3A EF 9C     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ B698 32 D9 9D     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ B69B 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ B69E 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ B69F ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ B6A1 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ B6A2 32 DA 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ B6A5 23           		inc		hl
  21+ B6A6 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ B6A7 32 DB 9D     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ B6AA 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ B6AB 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ B6AC 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ B6AD 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y

  29+ B6B2 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ B6B3 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ B6B5 CD 5A AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ B6B8 23                   inc     hl
  33+ B6B9 23                   inc     hl

  35+ B6BB 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ B6BC 3A BF 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ B6BF 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ B6C0 32 D6 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ B6C3 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ B6C4 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ B6C5 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ B6C6 32 DA 9D             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ B6C9 23                   inc     hl

  47+ B6CF 23                   inc     hl
  48+ B6D0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ B6D1 CD 5A AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ B6D4 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ B6D5 2B                   dec     hl

  53+ B6D7 3A BF 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ B6DA 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ B6DB 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ B6DC 32 D6 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ B6DF 3A E1 9C             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ B6E2 32 D9 9D             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ B6E5 23                   inc     hl
  60+ B6E6 23                   inc     hl
  61+ B6E7 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ B6E8 32 DA 9D             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ B6EB 23                   inc     hl
  64+ B6EC 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ B6ED 32 DB 9D             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ B6F0 23                   inc     hl
  67+ B6F1 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ B6F2 32 D6 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ B6F5 23                   inc     hl
  70+ B6F6 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ B6F7 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ B6F9 CD 5A AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ B6FC 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ B6FD 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ B6FE 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ B6FF 3A BF 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ B702 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ B703 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ B704 32 D6 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ; P

  81+ B708 23                   inc     hl

  84+ B70D 23                   inc     hl

  87+ B712 2B                   dec     hl
