1263  B721                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B721              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B721              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B721              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B721              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B721              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B721              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B721              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B721              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B721              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B721              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B721              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B721              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B721              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B721              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B721              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B721              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B721              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B721              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B721              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B721              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B721              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B721              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B721              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B721              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B721              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B721              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B721              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B721              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B721              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B721              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B721              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B721              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B721              ;;;	ret
  34+ B721              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B721              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B721              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B721              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B721              ;;;	ret
  39+ B721
  40+ B721              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B721 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B722 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B723 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B725              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B725 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B726 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B727 C8             ret z
  48+ B728 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B72B 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B72D              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B72D ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B72F 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B730 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B732 C9             ret
  55+ B733
  56+ B733              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B733              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B733              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B733              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B733 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B735 AF                   xor a
  62+ B736              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B736 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B737 17                   rla
  65+ B738 B9                   cp c
  66+ B739 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B73B 91                   sub c
  68+ B73C 2C                   inc l
  69+ B73D              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B73D 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B73F 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B740 32 DA 9D             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B743 C9                   ret
  74+ B744
  75+ B744
  76+ B744
  77+ B744              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B744              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B744              BFRDIV:
  80+ B744 F5           		push	af
  81+ B745 3A D9 9D     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B748 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B749 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B74A FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B74C CA 63 B7     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B74F              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B74F 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B751 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B752              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B752 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B754 AF           		xor a
  92+ B755              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B755 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B756 17           		rla
  95+ B757 B9           		cp c
  96+ B758 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B75A 2C           		inc l
  98+ B75B 91           		sub c
  99+ B75C              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B75C 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B75E 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B75F 32 DA 9D     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B762 C9           		ret
 104+ B763              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B763 32 DA 9D     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B766 C9           		ret
 107+ B767              ;	push	af
 108+ B767              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B767              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B767              ;	pop		af
 111+ B767              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B767              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B767              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B767              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B767              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B767              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B767              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B767              ;	sla		a
 119+ B767              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B767              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B767              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B767              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B767              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B767              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B767              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B767              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B767              ;	scf
 128+ B767              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B767              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B767              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B767              ;LL2:
 132+ B767              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B767              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B767              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B767              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B767              ;	ret

1264  B767                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B767              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B767              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B767              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B767 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B768 3A D9 9D     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B76B FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B76D 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B76F 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B770 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B772 AF               xor a
  11+ B773              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B773 CB 21            sla c
  13+ B775 17               rla
  14+ B776 BA               cp d
  15+ B777 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B779 0C               inc c
  17+ B77A 92               sub d
  18+ B77B              LL64:
  19+ B77B 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B77D 32 D8 9D     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B780 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B781 32 DA 9D     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B784 C9               ret
  24+ B785              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B785 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B787 32 DA 9D     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B78A 32 D8 9D     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B78D C9           	ret
  29+ B78E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ B78E              asm_mult12:
   2+ B78E              RSequQmulA:
   3+ B78E              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ B78E CD 36 B6     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B791 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ B792 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ B793 32 DB 9D     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B796 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ B797 32 DA 9D     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ B79A 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ B79B C9           	ret
  12+ B79C

  14+ B79C              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22
  15+ B79C              ;rotmat2yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +23
  16+ B79C              ;rotmat2yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +24
  17+ B79C              ;rotmat2zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +25
  18+ B79C              ;rotmat2zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +26

# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotMattoXX15.asm
   1++B79C              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
   2++B79C                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX+1 ,XX15VecX
   2++B79C 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
   2++B79F 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
   3++B7A2                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, XX15VecY
   3++B7A2 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
   3++B7A5 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
   4++B7A8                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
   4++B7A8 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
   4++B7AB 32 89 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
   5++B7AE C9                   ret
   6++B7AF
   7++B7AF              CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15:
   8++B7AF                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1 ,XX15VecX
   8++B7AF 3A 1C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
   8++B7B2 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
   9++B7B5                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1, XX15VecY
   9++B7B5 3A 1E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
   9++B7B8 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
  10++B7BB                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  10++B7BB 3A 20 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
  10++B7BE 32 89 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  11++B7C1 C9                   ret
  12++B7C2
  13++B7C2              CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15:
  14++B7C2                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX+1 ,XX15VecX
  14++B7C2 3A 16 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)
  14++B7C5 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
  15++B7C8                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevY+1, XX15VecY
  15++B7C8 3A 18 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)
  15++B7CB 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a

  30+ B7D5

# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm
   1++B7D5              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
   2++B7D5                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
   2++B7D5 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   2++B7D8 32 22 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
   3++B7DB                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatNosevY+1
   3++B7DB 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)
   3++B7DE 32 24 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
   4++B7E1                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecZ, UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
   4++B7E1 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecZ)
   4++B7E4 32 26 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
   5++B7E7 C9                   ret
   6++B7E8
   7++B7E8              CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV:
   8++B7E8                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
   8++B7E8 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   8++B7EB 32 1C C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
   9++B7EE                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1
   9++B7EE 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)
   9++B7F1 32 1E C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
  10++B7F4                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1
  10++B7F4 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecZ)
  10++B7F7 32 20 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a

  14++B7FE 32 16 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
  15++B801                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatSidevY+1
  15++B801 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)
  15++B804 32 18 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a
  16++B807                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecZ, UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1
  16++B807 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecZ)
  16++B80A 32 1A C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a

  32+ B80E
  33+ B80E              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B80E              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B80E              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B80E 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B80F 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B810 32 D9 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B813 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B814 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B816 CD 5A AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B819              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B819              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B819              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B819 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B81A E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B81C 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B81D 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B81E E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B820 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B822              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B822 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B824              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B824 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B826 DA 33 B8    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B829 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B82B 37           		scf
  56+ B82C CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B82E 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B830              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B830 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B831 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B832 C9           		ret
  62+ B833              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B833 B7           	or			a
  64+ B834 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B836 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B838 C3 30 B8     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B83B
  68+ B83B              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B83B              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B83B
  71+ B83B
  72+ B83B
  73+ B83B
  74+ B83B              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B83B CD 66 B9     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B83E 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B841 C3 77 B8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B844
  79+ B844              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B844 AF           		xor		a
  81+ B845 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B846 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B849 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B84B CA 3B B8     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B84E 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B851 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B852 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B855 CD 2C B9     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B858 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B85B C3 77 B8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B85E              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B85E              TIDY:
  93+ B85E DD 01                break
  94+ B860              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B860              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B860 CD 9C B7     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B863 CD 3E B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B866 CD D5 B7     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B869              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B869 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B86C E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B86E CA 44 B8     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B871              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B871 CD F2 B8             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B874 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B877              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B877 CD AF B7     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B87A CD 3E B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B87D              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B87D CD E8 B7     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B880 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B883 32 D9 9D     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B886 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B889 CD 8E B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B88C 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B88F 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B890 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B893 CD 0E B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B896                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B896 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B897 CA 9C B8    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B89A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B89C              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B89C 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B89F              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B89F 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B8A2 32 D9 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B8A5 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B8A8 CD 8E B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B8AB 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B8AE 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B8AF 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B8B2 CD 0E B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B8B5                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B8B5 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B8B6 CA BB B8    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B8B9 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B8BB              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B8BB 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B8BE              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B8BE 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B8C1 32 D9 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B8C4 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B8C7 CD 8E B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B8CA 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B8CD 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B8CE 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B8D1 CD 0E B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B8D4                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B8D4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B8D5 CA DA B8    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B8D8 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B8DA              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B8DA 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B8DD              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B8DD 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B8E0 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B8E2 AF                   xor     a
 153+ B8E3              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B8E3 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B8E4 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B8E5 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B8E6 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B8E8 CD C2 B7     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B8EB CD 3E B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B8EE              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B8EE CD FB B7     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B8F1
 163+ B8F1 C9           		ret
 164+ B8F2
 165+ B8F2
 166+ B8F2
 167+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B8F2              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B8F2
 239+ B8F2
 240+ B8F2              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B8F2              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B8F2              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B8F2 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B8F5 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B8F8 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B8FB CD 8E B7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B8FE              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B8FE 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B901 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B904 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B907 CD 5A AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B90A 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B90B E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B90D FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B90F              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B90F 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B912 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B913 E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B915 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B917 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B919 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B91A E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B91C 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B91D 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B91E 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B91F 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B921 CD B0 B1     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B924 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B926 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B928 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B92A B0           		or		b
 268+ B92B C9           		ret
 269+ B92C
 270+ B92C
 271+ B92C              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B92C              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B92C              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B92C 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B92F 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B932 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B935 CD 8E B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B938              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B938 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B93B 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B93E 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B941 CD 5A AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B944 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B945 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B947 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B949 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B94C 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B94D E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B94F FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B951 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B953 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B954 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B956 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B957 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B958 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B959 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B95B CD B0 B1     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B95E FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B960 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B962 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B964 B0           		or		b
 298+ B965 C9           		ret
 299+ B966
 300+ B966              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B966              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B966              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B966 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B969 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B96C 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B96F CD 8E B7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B972              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B972 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B975 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B978 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B97B CD 5A AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B97E 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B97F E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B981 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B983 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B986 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B987 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B989 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B98B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B98D 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B98E E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B990 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B991 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B992 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B993 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B995 CD B0 B1     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B998 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B99A EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B99C E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B99E B0           		or		b
 327+ B99F C9           		ret
 328+ B9A0
 329+ B9A0
 330+ B9A0
 331+ B9A0              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B9A0              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B9A0              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B9A0              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B9A0              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B9A0              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B9A0              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B9A0              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B9A0              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B9A0              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B9A0              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B9A0              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B9A0              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B9A0              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B9A0              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B9A0              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B9A0              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B9A0              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B9A0              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B9A0              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B9A0              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B9A0              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B9A0              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B9A0              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B9A0              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B9A0              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B9A0              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B9A0              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B9A0              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B9A0              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B9A0              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B9A0              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B9A0              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B9A0              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B9A0              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B9A0              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX

1269  B9A0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B9A0
   2+ B9A0              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B9A0 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B9A1 D2 BF B9    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B9A4 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B9A6 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B9A8 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B9AA                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B9AA BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B9AB DA B0 B9    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B9AE 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B9AF                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B9AF B7          >                        or a
   9+ B9B0 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B9B1 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B9B3 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B9B5 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B9B6 C9                                   ret
  14+ B9B7 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ B9B8 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ B9B9 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ B9BB 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ B9BD 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ B9BE C9                                   ret
  20+ B9BF 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ B9C1 C9                                   ret
  22+ B9C2
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1270  B9C2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ B9C2              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ B9C2              TIS1:
   3+ B9C2 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ B9C3 3A BF 9C     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ B9C6 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ B9C7 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ B9C8              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ B9C8 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ B9C9 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ B9CA 32 D9 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ B9CD 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ B9CE EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ B9D0 CD 5A AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ B9D3              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ B9D3              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ B9D3              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ B9D3 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ B9D4 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ B9D6 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ B9D7 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ B9D8 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ B9DA 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ B9DC 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ B9DD              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ B9DD CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ B9DF FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ B9E1 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ B9E3 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ B9E5              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ B9E5 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ B9E7 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ B9E9 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ B9EA B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ B9EB C9           		ret
  35+ B9EC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

# file opened: ./Tactics.asm
   1+ B9EC              ;Ship Tactics
   2+ B9EC              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
   3+ B9EC
   4+ B9EC
   5+ B9EC              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
   6+ B9EC 3A 27 C3     MakeAngry:              ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
   7+ B9EF                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbAngry
   7+ B9EF 3A 26 C3    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
   7+ B9F2 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
   7+ B9F4 CA 13 BA    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbAngry
   8+ B9F7 E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
   9+ B9F9 C4 19 BA                             call    nz, SetStationAngry                     ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
  10+ B9FC 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
  11+ B9FF                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
  11+ B9FF CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
  11+ BA01 C8          >                        ret		z
  12+ BA02 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
  13+ BA03                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
  13+ BA03 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
  13+ BA05 32 33 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
  14+ BA08 CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
  15+ BA0A 32 35 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
  16+ BA0D 3A 28 C3                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  17+ BA10                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
  17+ BA10 E6 01       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
  17+ BA12 C8          >                        ret     z
  18+ BA13 CD 32 C5     .SetNewbAngry:          call    SetShipHostile
  19+ BA16 C9                                   ret

  22+ BA18
  23+ BA18 C9           PlayerHitByMissile:     ret; TODO , do hit set up blast radius etc
  24+ BA19

  26+ BA1C D8                                   ret     c
  27+ BA1D 3A 2C C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipUnivBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
  28+ BA20 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  29+ BA22                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
  29+ BA22 ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
  30+ BA26 CD 32 C5                             call    SetShipHostile
  31+ BA29 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
  32+ BA2B                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
  32+ BA2B C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
  32+ BA2D ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  33+ BA30 C9                                   ret
  34+ BA31
  35+ BA31              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
  35+ BA31 AF          >                        xor a
  36+ BA32 32 A8 9E                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
  37+ BA35 21 0C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
  38+ BA38 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
  39+ BA3B 11 76 9E                             ld      de,MissileXPos
  40+ BA3E ED B0                                ldir
  41+ BA40                                      ZeroA                                   ; we have processd enque request
  41+ BA40 AF          >                        xor a
  42+ BA41 32 30 C0                             ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a      ;
  43+ BA44 CD 01 BB                             call    CheckIfBlastHitUs               ; If we are in Range
  44+ BA47 DC 17 BA                             call    c, MissileDidHitUs              ; Then we get hit
  45+ BA4A C9                                   ret
  46+ BA4B
  47+ BA4B              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
  48+ BA4B ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
  49+ BA4B ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
  50+ BA4B ~                                    xor     (hl)
  51+ BA4B ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  52+ BA4B ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
  53+ BA4B ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
  54+ BA4B ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  55+ BA4B ~            .XSame:                 and     a
  56+ BA4B ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  57+ BA4B ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  58+ BA4B ~                                    NegHL
  59+ BA4B ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
  60+ BA4B ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  61+ BA4B ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
  62+ BA4B ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
  63+ BA4B ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
  64+ BA4B ~                                    ld      a,l
  65+ BA4B ~                                    and     a
  66+ BA4B ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
  67+ BA4B                                      ENDM
  68+ BA4B              ;...................................................................
  69+ BA4B              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
  70+ BA4B 3A A8 9E     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
  71+ BA4E                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
  71+ BA4E FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
  71+ BA50 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  72+ BA51 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
  73+ BA53 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
  74+ BA54 32 A8 9E                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
  75+ BA57                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
  75+ BA57 21 AA 9E    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  75+ BA5A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
  75+ BA5C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  75+ BA5D 3C          >                        inc     a
  75+ BA5E C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  75+ BA5F 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  76+ BA60 CD 0A A3                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
  77+ BA63 D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic
  78+ BA64 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; Don't explode a ship twice
  79+ BA67 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ;
  80+ BA69                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
  80+ BA69 C0          >                        ret     nz
  81+ BA6A 3A 97 9E                             ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastRange)
  82+ BA6D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ; iyh = missile blast depending on type
  83+ BA6F FD 7D        .CheckRange:            ld      a,iyl                               ; now page in universe data

   1+ BB9C              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ BB9C              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ BB9C              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ BB9C              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ BB9C              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ BB9C              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ BB9C
   8+ BB9C              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ BB9C              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ BB9C              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ BB9C
  12+ BB9C              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  13+ BB9C              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  14+ BB9C F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  14+ BBA0 DD E5
  15+ BBA2 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  16+ BBA3 CF                                   rst	    $08
  17+ BBA4 89                                   db	    $89
  18+ BBA5 32 AF BB                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  19+ BBA8 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  19+ BBAC C1 F1
  20+ BBAE C9                                   ret
  21+ BBAF 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  22+ BBB0
  23+ BBB0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  24+ BBB0              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  25+ BBB0              ;	In:		ix = filename
  26+ BBB0              ;			b  = Open filemode
  27+ BBB0              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  28+ BBB0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  29+ BBB0 E5           fOpen:	                push	hl
  30+ BBB1 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  31+ BBB4 3A AF BB                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  32+ BBB7 CF                                   rst	    $08
  33+ BBB8 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  34+ BBB9 E1                                   pop	    hl
  35+ BBBA C9                                   ret
  36+ BBBB
  37+ BBBB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  38+ BBBB              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  39+ BBBB              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  40+ BBBB              ;			bc  = amount to read
  41+ BBBB              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  42+ BBBB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  43+ BBBB B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  44+ BBBC C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  45+ BBBD E5                                   push    hl
  46+ BBBE DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  47+ BBC1 CF                                   rst	    $08
  48+ BBC2 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  49+ BBC3 E1                                   pop	    hl
  50+ BBC4 C9                                   ret
  51+ BBC5
  52+ BBC5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  53+ BBC5              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  54+ BBC5              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  55+ BBC5              ;			bc  = amount to read
  56+ BBC5              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  57+ BBC5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  58+ BBC5 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  59+ BBC6 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  60+ BBC7 E5                                   push	hl
  61+ BBC8 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  62+ BBCB CF                                   rst	    $08
  63+ BBCC 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  64+ BBCD E1                                   pop	    hl
  65+ BBCE C9                                   ret
  66+ BBCF
  67+ BBCF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  68+ BBCF              ;	Function:	Close open file
  69+ BBCF              ;	In:		a  = handle
  70+ BBCF              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  71+ BBCF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  72+ BBCF B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  73+ BBD0 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  74+ BBD1 CF                                   rst	    $08
  75+ BBD2 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  76+ BBD3 C9                                   ret
  77+ BBD4
  78+ BBD4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ BBD4              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  80+ BBD4              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  81+ BBD4              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  82+ BBD4              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  83+ BBD4              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  84+ BBD4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  85+ BBD4 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  86+ BBD7 CF                                   rst	    $08
  87+ BBD8 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  88+ BBD9 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  89+ BBDC C9                                   ret
  90+ BBDD
  91+ BBDD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ BBDD              ; Init the file system
  93+ BBDD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  94+ BBDD CD 9C BB     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  95+ BBE0 C9                                   ret
  96+ BBE1
  97+ BBE1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  98+ BBE1              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  99+ BBE1              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 100+ BBE1              ;		    ix = address to load to
 101+ BBE1              ;           bc = filelength
 102+ BBE1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 103+ BBE1 CD 9C BB     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 104+ BBE4 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 105+ BBE7                                      ; get file size
 106+ BBE7 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 107+ BBEA E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 108+ BBED 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 109+ BBEF CD B0 BB                             call    fOpen
 110+ BBF2 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 111+ BBF4 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 112+ BBF6 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 113+ BBF8 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 114+ BBFB F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 115+ BBFC CD BB BB                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 116+ BBFF 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 117+ BC01 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 118+ BC02 CD CF BB                             call	fClose			; close file
 119+ BC05 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 120+ BC07 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 121+ BC0A C9                                   ret
 122+ BC0B              ;
 123+ BC0B              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 124+ BC0B              ;
 125+ BC0B DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 126+ BC0D C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 127+ BC0E
 128+ BC0E              .error_closing:
 129+ BC0E C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 130+ BC0F D1                                   pop	de
 131+ BC10 C1                                   pop	bc
 132+ BC11 C9                                   ret
 133+ BC12
 134+ BC12              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 135+ BC12              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 136+ BC12              ; In:		hl = file name
 137+ BC12              ;		    ix = address to save from
 138+ BC12              ;		    bc = size
 139+ BC12              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 140+ BC12 CD 9C BB     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 141+ BC15 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 142+ BC18 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 143+ BC1B 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 144+ BC1D CD B0 BB                             call    fOpen
 145+ BC20 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 146+ BC22 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 147+ BC24 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 148+ BC26 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 149+ BC29 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 150+ BC2A CD C5 BB                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 151+ BC2D 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 152+ BC2F F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 153+ BC30 CD CF BB                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 154+ BC33 C9           .error:                 ret
 155+ BC34              ;
 156+ BC34              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 157+ BC34              ;
 158+ BC34 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 159+ BC37 C9                                   ret
 160+ BC38
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  18+ BCE5
  19+ BCE5              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ BCE5              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ BCE5              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ BCE5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ BCE6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ BCE7 23           	inc			hl
  25+ BCE8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ BCE9 23           	inc			hl
  27+ BCEA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ BCEB 23           	inc			hl
  29+ BCEC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ BCED 23           	inc			hl
  31+ BCEE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ BCEF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ BCF0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ BCF2                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ BCF2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ BCF6 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ BCF9 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ BCFA C1           	pop			bc
  38+ BCFB 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ BCFD C9           	ret
  40+ BCFE
  41+ BCFE
  42+ BCFE              print_boiler_text:
  43+ BCFE              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ BCFE              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ BCFE C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ BCFF 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ BD00 23           	inc			hl
  48+ BD01 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ BD02 23           	inc			hl
  50+ BD03 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ BD04 23           	inc			hl
  52+ BD05 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ BD06 23           	inc			hl
  54+ BD07 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ BD08 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ BD09 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ BD0B C5           	push		bc
  58+ BD0C D1           	pop			de
  59+ BD0D CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ BD10 E1           	pop			hl
  61+ BD11 C1           	pop			bc
  62+ BD12 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ BD14 C9           	ret

  16++BD2D 91           	sub 	c

  26++BD3A C1           	pop		bc

  71+ BD4D CD D0 B4                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ BD50 FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal

  74+ BD56 21 D5 BC     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ BD59 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ BD5A FE 00                                cp		0

  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B E3 9E                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B E1 9E                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 102+ C16C CD D0 E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 104+ C172 C9                                   ret
 105+ C173
 106+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8
 107+ C175 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 108+ C178 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 109+ C17B E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 110+ C17C D5                                   push    de
 111+ C17D C5                                   push    bc
 112+ C17E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 112+ C17E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 113+ C182 CD B5 E2                             call	l2_draw_horz_line

 115+ C186 D1                                   pop     de
 116+ C187 E1                                   pop     hl
 117+ C188 04                                   inc     b

 119+ C18A 20 EF                                jr      nz,.ClearLoop
 120+ C18C C9                                   ret
 121+ C18D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ C18D 3A CE 9E     src_system_undercursor: ld      a,(Galaxy)
 123+ C190                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 129+ C1A1 CD 0D C1     src_name_current:       call    src_get_name

 138+ C1B1 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 139+ C1B3                                      MMUSelectLayer2

 140+ C1B7 CD 24 E2                             call	l2_print_7at
 141+ C1BA CD CD C1                             call    src_calc_distance
 142+ C1BD 21 1A C0                             ld      hl,src_distance
 143+ C1C0 01 0A B0                             ld      bc,$B00A
 144+ C1C3 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 145+ C1C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 145+ C1C5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 146+ C1C9 CD 24 E2                             call	l2_print_7at
 147+ C1CC C9                                   ret
 148+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 149+ C1CD 3A CE 9E     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B E1 9E                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B E3 9E                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 6A 9E                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD D0 B4                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD F4 B2                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD F4 B2                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD F4 B2                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD FF A3     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A CE 9E                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 256+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed

 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)

 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0

 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work

 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc

 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b

 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0

 316+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)

 362+ C38F 3A E2 9E     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
