 214+ C55A              ; This sets the position of the current ship if its a player launched missile
 215+ C55A CD F9 C7     UnivSetPlayerMissile:   call    InitialiseOrientation           ; Player  facing
 216+ C55D CD 4F C5                             call    ResetUbnkPosition               ; home position
 217+ C560 3E 05                                ld      a,MissileDropHeight
 218+ C562 32 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a
 219+ C565 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ C567 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 221+ C56A                                      MaxUnivSpeed
 221+ C56A 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 221+ C56C 32 32 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKspeed),a

 223+ C570              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 224+ C570              ; this applies blast damage to ship
 225+ C570 3A 98 9E     ShipMissileBlast:       ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastDamage)
 226+ C573 47                                   ld      b,a
 227+ C574 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)                   ; Reduce Energy
 228+ C577 90                                   sub     b
 229+ C578 C3 81 C5                             jp      UnivExplodeShip
 230+ C57B 18 04                                jr      UnivExplodeShip
 231+ C57D 32 3C C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 232+ C580 C9                                   ret
 233+ C581              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 234+ C581              ; This sets the ship as a shower of explosiondwd
 235+ C581 DD 01        UnivExplodeShip:        break
 236+ C583 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 237+ C586 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled      ; Set Exlpoding flag and mark as just been killed
 238+ C588 E6 7F                                and     Bit7Clear                       ; Remove AI
 239+ C58A 32 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 240+ C58D AF                                   xor     a
 241+ C58E 32 3C C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a

 244+ C592
 245+ C592 CD CB C5     UnivSetDemoPostion:     call    UnivSetSpawnPosition
 246+ C595 3E 81                                ld      a,%10000001                     ; AI Enabled has 1 missile
 247+ C597 32 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 248+ C59A 32 27 C3                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 249+ C59D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 250+ C59F 32 35 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 251+ C5A2 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 252+ C5A5                                      ZeroA
 252+ C5A5 AF          >                        xor a
 253+ C5A6 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 254+ C5A9 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 255+ C5AC 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 256+ C5AF 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 257+ C5B2 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 258+ C5B5 22 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 259+ C5B8 3A 26 C3                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 260+ C5BB 21 B0 05                             ld      hl,$05B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 261+ C5BE                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipTypeStation, .SkipFurther
 261+ C5BE FE 02       >                        cp     ShipTypeStation
 261+ C5C0 C2 C7 C5    >                        jp      nz,.SkipFurther
 262+ C5C3 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 263+ C5C5 84                                   add     h
 264+ C5C6 67                                   ld      h,a
 265+ C5C7 22 12 C0     .SkipFurther            ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 266+ C5CA C9                                   ret
 267+ C5CB              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 268+ C5CB              ; This sets the position of the current ship randomly, called after spawing
 269+ C5CB CD F9 C7     UnivSetSpawnPosition:   call    InitialiseOrientation
 270+ C5CE                                      RandomUnivPitchAndRoll
 270+ C5CE CD 79 A3    >                        call    doRandom
 270+ C5D1 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 270+ C5D3 32 34 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 270+ C5D6 CD 79 A3    >                        call    doRandom
 270+ C5D9 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 270+ C5DB 32 35 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 271+ C5DE CD 79 A3                             call    doRandom                        ; set x lo and y lo to random
 272+ C5E1 32 0C C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 273+ C5E4 32 0F C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 274+ C5E7 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 275+ C5E8 47                                   ld      b,a
 276+ C5E9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 277+ C5EB 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 278+ C5EE 78           .setYSign:              ld      a,b                             ; get random back again
 279+ C5EF 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 280+ C5F0 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C5F1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 282+ C5F3 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 283+ C5F6 CB 08        .setYHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 284+ C5F8 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;
 285+ C5F9 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 286+ C5FB 32 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 287+ C5FE CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 288+ C600 78                                   ld      a,b
 289+ C601 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 290+ C603 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 291+ C604 32 0D C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 292+ C607 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 293+ C609 98                                   sbc     b
 294+ C60A 99                                   sbc     c
 295+ C60B 32 13 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a
 296+ C60E 3A 26 C3     .CheckIfBodyOrJunk:     ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 297+ C611                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeJunk
 297+ C611 FE 03       >                        cp      ShipTypeJunk
 297+ C613 C8          >                        ret     z
 298+ C614                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeScoopable
 298+ C614 FE 04       >                        cp      ShipTypeScoopable
 298+ C616 C8          >                        ret     z
 299+ C617 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; its not junk to set z sign
 300+ C618 0F                                   rrca                                    ; as it can jump in
 301+ C619 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 302+ C61B 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 303+ C61E C9                                   ret
 304+ C61F
 305+ C61F              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 306+ C61F              ; This sets the cargo type or carryflag set for not cargo
 307+ C61F              ; Later this will be done via a loadable lookup table
 308+ C61F 3A 26 C3     ShipCargoType:          ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 309+ C622                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_CargoType5, .CargoCanister
 309+ C622 FE 04       >                        cp     ShipID_CargoType5
 309+ C624 CA 3B C6    >                        jp      z,.CargoCanister
 310+ C627              .IsItThargon:           JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Thargon,    .Thargon
 310+ C627 FE 27       >                        cp     ShipID_Thargon
 310+ C629 CA 41 C6    >                        jp      z,.Thargon
 311+ C62C              .IsItAlloy:             JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Plate,      .Plate
 311+ C62C FE 1D       >                        cp     ShipID_Plate
 311+ C62E CA 44 C6    >                        jp      z,.Plate
 312+ C631              .IsItSplinter:          JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Splinter,   .Splinter
 312+ C631 FE 24       >                        cp     ShipID_Splinter
 312+ C633 CA 47 C6    >                        jp      z,.Splinter
 313+ C636              .IsItEscapePod:         JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Escape_Pod, .EscapePod
 313+ C636 FE 11       >                        cp     ShipID_Escape_Pod
 313+ C638 CA 4A C6    >                        jp      z,.EscapePod
 314+ C63B CD 79 A3     .CargoCanister:         call    doRandom
 315+ C63E E6 0F                                and     15                      ; Limit stock from Food to Platinum
 316+ C640 C9                                   ret
 317+ C641 3E 11        .Thargon:               ld      a,AlienItemsIndex
 318+ C643 C9                                   ret
 319+ C644 3E 0A        .Plate:                 ld      a,AlloysIndex
 320+ C646 C9                                   ret
 321+ C647 3E 0D        .Splinter:              ld      a,MineralsIndex
 322+ C649 C9                                   ret
 323+ C64A 3E 04        .EscapePod:             ld      a,SlavesIndex
 324+ C64C C9                                   ret
 325+ C64D
 326+ C64D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 327+ C64D              ; This sets current univrse object to space station
 328+ C64D 3E 81        ResetStationLaunch:     ld  a,%10000001                         ; Has AI and 1 Missile
 329+ C64F 32 38 C0                             ld  (UBnkaiatkecm),a                    ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 330+ C652 AF                                   xor a
 331+ C653 32 35 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 332+ C656 32 27 C3                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 333+ C659 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 334+ C65B 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 335+ C65E 21 00 00     .SetPosBehindUs:        ld      hl,$0000
 336+ C661 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 337+ C664 21 00 00                             ld      hl,$0000
 338+ C667 22 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 339+ C66A 21 B0 01                             ld      hl,$01B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 340+ C66D 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 341+ C670 AF                                   xor     a
 342+ C671 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 343+ C674 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 344+ C677 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 345+ C679 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 346+ C67C CD 1E C8     .SetOrientation:        call    LaunchedOrientation             ; set initial facing
 347+ C67F C9                                   ret
 348+ C680                  ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 349+ C680              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 350+ C680
 351+ C680              ; Initialiase data, iyh must equal slot number
 352+ C680              ;                   iyl must be ship type
 353+ C680              ;                   a  = current bank number
 354+ C680 32 2C C0     UnivInitRuntime:        ld      (UbnKShipUnivBankNbr),a     ; actual bank nmber related to the slot
 355+ C683 01 14 00                             ld      bc,UBnKRuntimeSize
 356+ C686 21 2B C0                             ld      hl,UBnKStartOfRuntimeData
 357+ C689                                      ZeroA
 357+ C689 AF          >                        xor a
 358+ C68A 77           .InitLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 359+ C68B 23                                   inc     hl
 360+ C68C 10 FC                                djnz    .InitLoop
 361+ C68E              .SetEnergy:             ldCopyByte EnergyAddr, UBnKEnergy
 361+ C68E 3A 1E C3    >                        ld       a,(EnergyAddr)
 361+ C691 32 3C C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
 362+ C694 FD 7C        .SetBankData:           ld      a,iyh
 363+ C696 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnKSlotNumber),a
 364+ C699 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 365+ C69B 32 2F C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModeID),a
 366+ C69E CD 0F E0                             call    GetShipBankId                ; this will mostly be debugging info
 367+ C6A1 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkShipModelBank),a        ; this will mostly be debugging info
 368+ C6A4 78                                   ld      a,b                          ; this will mostly be debugging info
 369+ C6A5 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModelNbr),a         ; this will mostly be debugging info
 370+ C6A8 C9                                   ret
 371+ C6A9
 372+ C6A9
 373+ C6A9 7C           ADDHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 374+ C6AA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 375+ C6AC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 376+ C6AD AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 377+ C6AE                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 377+ C6AE FA C6 C6    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEOppSGN
 378+ C6B1 78           ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 379+ C6B2 B2                                   or      d
 380+ C6B3                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 380+ C6B3 FA B8 C6    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDESameNeg
 381+ C6B6 19                                   add     hl,de
 382+ C6B7 C9                                   ret
 383+ C6B8 7C           ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 384+ C6B9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 385+ C6BB 67                                   ld      h,a
 386+ C6BC 7A                                   ld      a,d
 387+ C6BD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 388+ C6BF 57                                   ld      d,a
 389+ C6C0 19                                   add     hl,de
 390+ C6C1 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 391+ C6C3 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 392+ C6C4 67                                   ld      h,a
 393+ C6C5 C9                                   ret
 394+ C6C6 7C           ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 395+ C6C7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 396+ C6C9 67                                   ld      h,a
 397+ C6CA 7A                                   ld      a,d
 398+ C6CB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 399+ C6CD 57                                   ld      d,a
 400+ C6CE B7                                   or      a
 401+ C6CF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 402+ C6D1 38 04                                jr      c,ADDHLDEOppInvert
 403+ C6D3 78           ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 404+ C6D4 B4                                   or      h
 405+ C6D5 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 406+ C6D6 C9                                   ret
 407+ C6D7              ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 407+ C6D7 AF          >                    xor a
 407+ C6D8 95          >                    sub l
 407+ C6D9 6F          >                    ld l,a
 407+ C6DA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 407+ C6DB 94          >                    sub h
 407+ C6DC 67          >                    ld h,a
 408+ C6DD 78                                   ld      a,b
 409+ C6DE EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 410+ C6E0 B4                                   or      h
 411+ C6E1 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 412+ C6E2 C9                                   ret
 413+ C6E3
 414+ C6E3              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 415+ C6E3 7C           SUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 416+ C6E4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 417+ C6E6 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 418+ C6E7 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 419+ C6E8                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 419+ C6E8 FA 16 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDEOppSGN
 420+ C6EB 78           SUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 421+ C6EC B2                                   or      d
 422+ C6ED                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 422+ C6ED FA F7 C6    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameNeg
 423+ C6F0 B7                                   or      a
 424+ C6F1 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 425+ C6F3                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 425+ C6F3 FA 0A C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 426+ C6F6 C9                                   ret
 427+ C6F7 7C           SUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 428+ C6F8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 429+ C6FA 67                                   ld      h,a
 430+ C6FB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 431+ C6FC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 432+ C6FE 57                                   ld      d,a
 433+ C6FF B7                                   or      a
 434+ C700 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 435+ C702                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 435+ C702 FA 0A C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 436+ C705 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 437+ C706 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 438+ C708 67                                   ld      h,a
 439+ C709 C9                                   ret
 440+ C70A              SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 440+ C70A AF          >                    xor a
 440+ C70B 95          >                    sub l
 440+ C70C 6F          >                    ld l,a
 440+ C70D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 440+ C70E 94          >                    sub h
 440+ C70F 67          >                    ld h,a
 441+ C710 78                                   ld      a,b
 442+ C711 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 443+ C713 B4                                   or      h
 444+ C714 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 445+ C715 C9                                   ret
 446+ C716 B7           SUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 447+ C717 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 448+ C718 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 449+ C71A 67                                   ld      h,a
 450+ C71B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 451+ C71C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 452+ C71E 57                                   ld      d,a
 453+ C71F 19                                   add     hl,de
 454+ C720 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 455+ C721 B4                                   or      h
 456+ C722 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 457+ C723 C9                                   ret
 458+ C724
 459+ C724
 460+ C724              SBCHLDESigned:          JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 460+ C724 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 460+ C726 C2 37 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 461+ C729              SBCHLDEhlPos:           JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 461+ C729 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 461+ C72B C2 37 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 462+ C72E ED 52        SBCHLDEhlPosDePos:      sbc     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 463+ C730 C9                                   ret
 464+ C731 CB BA        SBCHLDEhlPosDeNeg:      res     7,d
 465+ C733 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 466+ C734 CB FA                                set     7,d
 467+ C736 C9                                   ret
 468+ C737 CB BC        SBCHLDEhlNeg:           res     7,h
 469+ C739                                      JumpOnBitSet d,7,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 469+ C739 CB 7A       >                        bit 	7,d
 469+ C73B C2 43 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 470+ C73E ED 52        SBCHLDEhlNegdePos:      sbc     hl,de                       ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 471+ C740 CB FC                                set     7,h
 472+ C742 C9                                   ret
 473+ C743 CB BA        SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg:      res     7,d
 474+ C745 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 475+ C746 CB FA                                set     7,d
 476+ C748 CB FC                                set     7,h
 477+ C74A C9                                   ret
 478+ C74B
 479+ C74B              ; Roate around axis
 480+ C74B              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
 481+ C74B              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
 482+ C74B              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
 483+ C74B              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
 484+ C74B              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
 485+ C74B              ; var RAT2 gives direction
 486+ C74B              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
 487+ C74B              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
 488+ C74B              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
 489+ C74B 2A BB 9C     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
 490+ C74E 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 491+ C74F 23                                   inc     hl
 492+ C750 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 493+ C751 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 494+ C752 7C                                   ld      a,h
 495+ C753 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 496+ C755 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 497+ C757 7C                                   ld      a,h
 498+ C758 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 499+ C75A CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 500+ C75C 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 501+ C75D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 502+ C75F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 503+ C760 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 504+ C761 CD E3 C6                             call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 505+ C764              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 506+ C764 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 507+ C765 7D                                   ld      a,l
 508+ C766 32 DA 9D                             ld      (varR),a
 509+ C769 7C                                   ld      a,h
 510+ C76A 32 DB 9D                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 511+ C76D              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 512+ C76D 2A BD 9C                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 513+ C770 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 514+ C771 23                                   inc     hl
 515+ C772 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 516+ C773 7A                                   ld      a,d
 517+ C774 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 518+ C776 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 519+ C778 7A                                   ld      a,d
 520+ C779 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 521+ C77B 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 522+ C77C                                      ShiftDERight1
 522+ C77C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 522+ C77E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 523+ C780                                      ShiftDERight1
 523+ C780 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 523+ C782 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 524+ C784                                      ShiftDERight1
 524+ C784 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 524+ C786 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 525+ C788                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 525+ C788 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 525+ C78A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 526+ C78C 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 527+ C78F FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 528+ C791 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 529+ C793 B2                                   or      d
 530+ C794 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 531+ C795              ;;; ld      a,e
 532+ C795              ;;;     or      iyh
 533+ C795              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 534+ C795              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 535+ C795 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 536+ C796                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 537+ C796              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 538+ C796 CD A9 C6                             call    ADDHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 539+ C799 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 540+ C79A              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 541+ C79A              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 542+ C79A 2A BD 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 543+ C79D 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 544+ C79E 23                               inc     hl
 545+ C79F 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 546+ C7A0 EB                               ex      de,hl
 547+ C7A1 7C                               ld      a,h
 548+ C7A2 E6 80                            and     $80
 549+ C7A4 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a
 550+ C7A6 7C                               ld      a,h
 551+ C7A7 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 552+ C7A9 CB 3F                            srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 553+ C7AB 5F                               ld      e,a
 554+ C7AC FD 7C                            ld      a,iyh
 555+ C7AE 57                               ld      d,a
 556+ C7AF B7                               or      a               ; clear carry
 557+ C7B0 CD E3 C6                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3
 558+ C7B3              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 559+ C7B3 E5                               push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 560+ C7B4 7D                               ld      a,l
 561+ C7B5 32 D6 9C                         ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 562+ C7B8 7C                               ld      a,h
 563+ C7B9 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 564+ C7BB 32 F5 9D                         ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 565+ C7BE              ;-- Set up TQ
 566+ C7BE 2A BB 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 567+ C7C1              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 568+ C7C1 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 569+ C7C2 23                               inc     hl
 570+ C7C3 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 571+ C7C4 7A                               ld      a,d
 572+ C7C5 E6 80                            and     $80
 573+ C7C7 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 574+ C7C9 7A                               ld      a,d
 575+ C7CA E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 576+ C7CC 57                               ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 577+ C7CD                                  ShiftDERight1
 577+ C7CD CB 3A       >			   srl d
 577+ C7CF CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 578+ C7D1                                  ShiftDERight1
 578+ C7D1 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 578+ C7D3 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 579+ C7D5                                  ShiftDERight1
 579+ C7D5 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 579+ C7D7 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 580+ C7D9                                  ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 580+ C7D9 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 580+ C7DB CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 581+ C7DD 3A 40 C0                         ld      a,(univRAT2)
 582+ C7E0 FD AC                            xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 583+ C7E2 E6 80                            and     $80
 584+ C7E4 B2                               or      d
 585+ C7E5 57                               ld      d,a
 586+ C7E6              ;;; ld      a,e
 587+ C7E6              ;;;     or      iyh
 588+ C7E6              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 589+ C7E6 E1                               pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 590+ C7E7              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 591+ C7E7 CD E3 C6                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 592+ C7EA              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 593+ C7EA EB                               ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 594+ C7EB 2A BD 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 595+ C7EE 73                               ld      (hl),e
 596+ C7EF 23                               inc     hl
 597+ C7F0 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 598+ C7F1              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 599+ C7F1 D1                               pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 600+ C7F2 2A BB 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 601+ C7F5 73                               ld      (hl),e
 602+ C7F6 23                               inc     hl
 603+ C7F7 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 604+ C7F8 C9                               ret
 605+ C7F9
 606+ C7F9                                  include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++C7F9              InitialiseOrientation:
   2++C7F9              ZI1:
   3++C7F9              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   4++C7F9              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   5++C7F9              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   6++C7F9 21 00 00         ld      hl, 0
   7++C7FC 22 17 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++C7FF 22 19 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++C802 22 1B C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++C805 22 1F C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++C808 22 21 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++C80B 22 23 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  13++C80E 21 00 60         ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  14++C811                  ;ld      hl,1
  15++C811 22 15 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++C814 22 1D C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++C817 21 00 E0         ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  18++C81A 22 25 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  19++C81D C9               ret
  20++C81E
  21++C81E              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  22++C81E              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  23++C81E              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  24++C81E
  25++C81E              LaunchedOrientation:
  26++C81E CD F9 C7         call    InitialiseOrientation
  27++C821                  FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  27++C821 3A 22 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  27++C824 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  27++C826 32 22 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  28++C829                  FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  28++C829 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  28++C82C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  28++C82E 32 24 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  29++C831                  FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  29++C831 3A 26 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  29++C834 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  29++C836 32 26 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  30++C839 C9               ret
  31++C83A
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 607+ C83A
 608+ C83A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 609+ C83A              OrientateVertex:
 610+ C83A
 611+ C83A              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 612+ C83A              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 613+ C83A              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 614+ C83A              ;
 615+ C83A
 616+ C83A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 617+ C83A              TransposeVertex:
 618+ C83A              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 619+ C83A              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 620+ C83A              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 621+ C83A              VectorToVertex:
 622+ C83A              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 623+ C83A              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 624+ C83A              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 625+ C83A              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 626+ C83A              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 627+ C83A 32 D8 9C     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
 628+ C83D                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
 628+ C83D 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
 628+ C840 22 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
 629+ C843 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
 630+ C846 32 DB 9D                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
 631+ C849 ED 5B D6 9C  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
 632+ C84D 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
 633+ C84E F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
 634+ C850 32 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
 635+ C853 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
 636+ C854 3A D8 9C                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 637+ C857 21 DB 9D                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 638+ C85A AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 639+ C85B E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 640+ C85D 32 F5 9D                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 641+ C860 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 642+ C863 3A D8 9C                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 643+ C866 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 644+ C868              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 644+ C868 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 644+ C86A D2 78 C8    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 645+ C86D                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 645+ C86D CB 23       >			   sla e
 645+ C86F CB 12       >			   rl  d
 646+ C871 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 647+ C873 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 648+ C875 C2 68 C8                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 649+ C878 32 D8 9C     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 650+ C87B ED 53 D6 9C                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 651+ C87F 3A DB 9D                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 652+ C882 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 653+ C884                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 654+ C884 2A D9 9D                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 655+ C887 FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 656+ C889                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 656+ C889 CB 25       >			   sla l
 656+ C88B CB 14       >			   rl  h
 657+ C88D CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 658+ C88F F2 87 C8                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 659+ C892 22 D9 9D     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 660+ C895 32 D9 9D                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 661+ C898 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 662+ C89A 32 DA 9D                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 663+ C89D 3A D8 9C                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 664+ C8A0 CD 14 AE                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 665+ C8A3 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 666+ C8A5 32 ED 9D                             ld      (varKp1),a
 667+ C8A8 32 EE 9D                             ld      (varKp2),a
 668+ C8AB 32 EF 9D                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 669+ C8AE FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 670+ C8B0                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 670+ C8B0 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 670+ C8B2 CA DD C8    >                        jp      z,DV12
 671+ C8B5 3A DA 9D                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 672+ C8B8 ED 5B EC 9D                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 673+ C8BC 2A F0 9D                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 674+ C8BF 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 675+ C8C0 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 676+ C8C2 CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 677+ C8C4 CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 678+ C8C6 CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 679+ C8C8 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 680+ C8CA 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 681+ C8CC ED 53 EC 9D  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 682+ C8D0 22 F0 9D                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 683+ C8D3 3A F5 9D                             ld      a,(varT)
 684+ C8D6 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 685+ C8D7 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 686+ C8D8 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 687+ C8D9 32 FF 9D                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 688+ C8DC C9                                   ret
 689+ C8DD              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 689+ C8DD A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 689+ C8DE CA F5 C8    >                        jp	    z, DV13
 690+ C8E1 3A DA 9D                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 691+ C8E4 CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 692+ C8E6 FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 693+ C8E8 C2 E4 C8                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 694+ C8EB 32 EC 9D                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 695+ C8EE                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 695+ C8EE 3A F5 9D    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 695+ C8F1 32 EF 9D    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 696+ C8F4 C9                                   ret
 697+ C8F5              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 697+ C8F5 3A DA 9D    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 697+ C8F8 32 EC 9D    >                        ld       (varK),a
 698+ C8FB                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 698+ C8FB 3A F5 9D    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 698+ C8FE 32 EF 9D    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 699+ C901 C9                                   ret
 700+ C902
 701+ C902 CD 3A C8     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 702+ C905 3A EF 9D                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 703+ C908 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 704+ C90A 21 EE 9D                             ld      hl,varKp2
 705+ C90D B6                                   or      (hl)
 706+ C90E C2 23 C9                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 707+ C911 3A ED 9D                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 708+ C914 FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 709+ C916 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 710+ C918                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 710+ C918 B7          >                        or a
 711+ C919 2A EC 9D                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 712+ C91C 3A EF 9D                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 713+ C91F CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 714+ C921 C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 715+ C922 C9           PL44:                   ret
 716+ C923 37           PL44TooBig:             scf
 717+ C924 C9                                   ret
 718+ C925              Project:
 719+ C925 2A 0C C0     PROJ:                   ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                    ; Project K+INWK(x,y)/z to K3,K4 for center to screen
 720+ C928 22 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),hl
 721+ C92B 3A 0E C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 722+ C92E CD 02 C9                             call    PLS6                            ; returns result in K (0 1) (unsigned) and K (3) = sign note to no longer does 2's C
 723+ C931 D8                                   ret     c                               ; carry means don't print
 724+ C932 2A EC 9D                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 725+ C935                                      ; Now the question is as hl is the fractional part, should this be multiplied by 127 to get the actual range
 726+ C935 3E 80                                ld      a,ViewCenterX
 727+ C937 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 728+ C939 22 FF 9D                             ld      (varK3),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 729+ C93C 2A 0F C0     ProjectY:               ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 730+ C93F 22 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),hl
 731+ C942 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 732+ C945 CD 02 C9                             call    PLS6
 733+ C948 D8                                   ret     c
 734+ C949 2A EC 9D                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 735+ C94C 3E 40                                ld      a,ViewCenterY
 736+ C94E ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 737+ C950 22 05 9E                             ld      (varK4),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 738+ C953 C9                                   ret
