  13++CEA2 3A 80 C0             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
  14++CEA5 B4                   or  h
  15++CEA6 67                   ld  h,a
  16++CEA7 22 89 C0             ld  (UBnkYScaled),hl
  17++CEAA 2A 81 C0             ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  18++CEAD 3A 83 C0             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)
  19++CEB0 B4                   or  h
  20++CEB1 67                   ld  h,a
  21++CEB2 22 8B C0             ld  (UBnkZScaled),hl
  22++CEB5 C9                   ret
  23++CEB6
  24++CEB6              CopyXX18ScaledToXX15:
  25++CEB6              CopyDrawCamToScaledMatrix:
  26++CEB6                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zSgn, UBnkZScaledSign   ; XX18+8 => XX15+5
  26++CEB6 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)
  26++CEB9 32 8C C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
  27++CEBC                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo,  UBnkXScaled       ; XX18+0 => XX15+0
  27++CEBC 3A 7B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  27++CEBF 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
  28++CEC2                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xSgn, UBnkXScaledSign   ; XX18+2 => XX15+1
  28++CEC2 3A 7D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
  28++CEC5 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
  29++CEC8                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo,  UBnkYScaled       ; XX18+3 => XX15+2
  29++CEC8 3A 7E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  29++CECB 32 89 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
  30++CECE                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0ySgn, UBnkYScaledSign   ; XX18+5 => XX15+3
  30++CECE 3A 80 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
  30++CED1 32 8A C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
  31++CED4                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo,  UBnkZScaled       ; XX18+6 => XX15+4
  31++CED4 3A 81 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  31++CED7 32 8B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
  32++CEDA C9                   ret
  33++CEDB
  34++CEDB              CopyXX15ToXX18Scaled:
  35++CEDB              CopyScaledMatrixToDrawCam:
  36++CEDB                      ldCopyByte UBnkZScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0zSgn  ; XX15+5 => XX18+8
  36++CEDB 3A 8C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  36++CEDE 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0zSgn),a
  37++CEE1                      ldCopyByte UBnkXScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0xLo   ; XX15+0 => XX18+0
  37++CEE1 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
  37++CEE4 32 7B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a
  38++CEE7                      ldCopyByte UBnkXScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0xSgn  ; XX15+1 => XX18+2
  38++CEE7 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
  38++CEEA 32 7D C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0xSgn),a
  39++CEED                      ldCopyByte UBnkYScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0yLo   ; XX15+2 => XX18+3
  39++CEED 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
  39++CEF0 32 7E C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a
  40++CEF3                      ldCopyByte UBnkYScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0ySgn  ; XX15+3 => XX18+5
  40++CEF3 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
  40++CEF6 32 80 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0ySgn),a
  41++CEF9                      ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0zLo   ; XX15+4 => XX18+6
  41++CEF9 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
  41++CEFC 32 81 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a
  42++CEFF C9                   ret
  43++CF00
  44++CF00
  45++CF00              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  46++CF00              LL94Z:
  47++CF00 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  48++CF02 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  49++CF04 3A 8B C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  50++CF07 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  51++CF08 3A 8C C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  52++CF0B 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  53++CF0C 3A 81 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  54++CF0F 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  55++CF10 3A 83 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  56++CF13 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  57++CF14 CD 3D B5             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  58++CF17 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  59++CF18 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  60++CF19 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  61++CF1A 32 8C C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  62++CF1D 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  63++CF1E 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  64++CF21              LL94X:
  65++CF21 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  66++CF23 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  67++CF25 3A 87 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  68++CF28 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  69++CF29 3A 88 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  70++CF2C 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  71++CF2D 3A 7B C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  72++CF30 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  73++CF31 3A 7D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  74++CF34 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  75++CF35 CD 3D B5             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  76++CF38 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  77++CF39 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  78++CF3A 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  79++CF3B 32 88 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  80++CF3E 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  81++CF3F 32 87 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  82++CF42              LL94Y:
  83++CF42 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  84++CF44 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  85++CF46 3A 89 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  86++CF49 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  87++CF4A 3A 8A C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  88++CF4D 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  89++CF4E 3A 7E C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
  90++CF51 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  91++CF52 3A 80 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
  92++CF55 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  93++CF56 CD 3D B5             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  94++CF59 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  95++CF5A 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  96++CF5B 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  97++CF5C 32 8A C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
  98++CF5F 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  99++CF60 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 100++CF63 C9                   ret
 101++CF64
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 904+ CF64                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++CF64              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++CF64              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++CF64                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++CF64 3A 8D C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++CF67 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++CF6A                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++CF6A 3A 8F C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++CF6D 32 89 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++CF70                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++CF70 3A 91 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++CF73 32 8B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++CF76 C9                   ret
   7++CF77
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 905+ CF77              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 906+ CF77                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++CF77              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++CF77              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++CF77              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++CF77              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++CF77              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++CF77              ;;; R = T
   7++CF77              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++CF77              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++CF77              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++CF77              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++CF77              ;;; R = T
  12++CF77              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++CF77
  14++CF77
  15++CF77
  16++CF77
  17++CF77
  18++CF77              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++CF77 ~            						mul
  20++CF77 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++CF77              						ENDM
  22++CF77              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++CF77 3A 8D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++CF7A                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++CF7A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++CF7B CA 98 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++CF7E 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++CF7F 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++CF82 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++CF83                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++CF83 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++CF84 CA 98 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++CF87 ED 30        		mul
  30++CF89 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++CF8A 3A 8E C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++CF8D 21 88 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++CF90 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++CF91 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++CF93 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++CF95 C3 9C CF             jp          dotmuly
  37++CF98              dotxskipzero:
  38++CF98 AF                   xor         a
  39++CF99 47                   ld          b,a
  40++CF9A FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++CF9C              dotmuly:
  42++CF9C              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++CF9C 3A 8F C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++CF9F                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++CF9F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++CFA0 CA BF CF    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++CFA3 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++CFA4 3A 89 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++CFA7                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++CFA7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++CFA8 CA BF CF    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++CFAB 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++CFAC ED 30                mul
  50++CFAE 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++CFAF DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++CFB1 3A 90 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++CFB4 21 8A C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++CFB7 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++CFB8 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++CFBA DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++CFBC C3 C3 CF             jp          dotaddxy
  58++CFBF              dotyskipzero:
  59++CFBF AF                   xor         a
  60++CFC0 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++CFC1 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++CFC3              dotaddxy:
  63++CFC3              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++CFC3 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++CFC5 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++CFC6 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++CFC8 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++CFC9 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++CFCB 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++CFCC CD 3D B5             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++CFCF 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++CFD0 3A 91 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++CFD3                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++CFD3 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++CFD4 CA F9 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++CFD7 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++CFD8 3A 8B C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++CFDB                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++CFDB A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++CFDC CA F9 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++CFDF 57                   ld          d,a
  78++CFE0 ED 30                mul
  79++CFE2 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++CFE3 3A 8C C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++CFE6 21 92 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++CFE9 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++CFEA E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++CFEC 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++CFED E1                   pop         hl
  86++CFEE 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++CFEF 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++CFF1 CD 3D B5             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++CFF4 32 DB 9D             ld          (varS),a
  90++CFF7 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++CFF8 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++CFF9              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++CFF9 78                   ld          a,b
  94++CFFA 32 DB 9D             ld          (varS),a
  95++CFFD 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++CFFE C9                   ret
  97++CFFF              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++CFFF              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++CFFF              ;;;;		mul
 104++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++CFFF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++CFFF              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++CFFF              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++CFFF              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++CFFF              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++CFFF              ;;;;       mul
 117++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++CFFF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++CFFF              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++CFFF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++CFFF              ;;;;       mul
 132++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++CFFF              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++CFFF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++CFFF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++CFFF              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++CFFF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++CFFF              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++CFFF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 907+ CFFF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 908+ CFFF              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 909+ CFFF                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++CFFF              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++CFFF              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++CFFF              ScaleNormal:
   4++CFFF              LL93:
   5++CFFF 3A E0 9D             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D002 DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D004 3A 8B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D007 DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D009 F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D00A              ScaleLoop:
  11++D00A              LL933:
  12++D00A 21 87 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D00D CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D00F 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D010 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D011 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D013 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D014 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D015 CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D017 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D018 DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D01A F2 0A D0             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D01D C9                   ret
  24++D01E
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 910+ D01E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 911+ D01E                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D01E              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D01E              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D01E 3A 22 C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D021 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D022              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D022 3A 82 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D025 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D026                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D026 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D027 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D028              LL90Loop:
  10++D028              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D028 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D029                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D029 2A 7E C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D02C CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D02E CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D030 22 7E C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D033                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D033 2A 7B C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D036 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D038 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D03A 22 7B C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D03D                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D03D 2A 81 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D040 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D042 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D044 22 81 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D047 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D048                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D048 A7          >                        and     a
  16++D049 C2 28 D0    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D04C C9                   ret
  18++D04D
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 912+ D04D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 913+ D04D
 914+ D04D              ; Backface cull
 915+ D04D              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 916+ D04D              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 917+ D04D              ;
 918+ D04D
 919+ D04D                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"

   1++D04D 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D04E 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D04F E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D051 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D054 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D055 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D057 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D058 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D05A 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;

  12++D060 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D062 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D065 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D066 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
