 920+ D075                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D075 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D076 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D077 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D079 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D07C 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D07D CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D07F 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D080 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D082 32 90 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D085 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D086 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D088 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D08A 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D08D 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D08E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D08F 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D092 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D093 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D094 32 8F C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D097 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D098 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D099 32 91 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D09C C9                                   ret
  24++D09D
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 921+ D09D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 922+ D09D              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 923+ D09D              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 924+ D09D              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 925+ D09D              ; return if no faces
 926+ D09D              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 927+ D09D              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 928+ D09D              ; While Z hi <> 0
 929+ D09D              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 930+ D09D              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 931+ D09D              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 932+ D09D              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 933+ D09D              ; Loop
 934+ D09D              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 935+ D09D              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 936+ D09D              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 937+ D09D              ; For each face
 938+ D09D              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 939+ D09D              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 940+ D09D              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 941+ D09D              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 942+ D09D              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 943+ D09D              ;        else
 944+ D09D              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 945+ D09D              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 946+ D09D              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 947+ D09D              ;           While X >= 0
 948+ D09D              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 949+ D09D              ;              if  x >= 0
 950+ D09D              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 951+ D09D              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 952+ D09D              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 953+ D09D              ;           loop
 954+ D09D              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 955+ D09D              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 956+ D09D              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 957+ D09D              ;               X = 1
 958+ D09D              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 959+ D09D              ;           else
 960+ D09D              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 961+ D09D              ;           endif
 962+ D09D              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 963+ D09D              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 964+ D09D              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 965+ D09D              ;               X = 1
 966+ D09D              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 967+ D09D              ;           else
 968+ D09D              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 969+ D09D              ;           endif
 970+ D09D              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 971+ D09D              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 972+ D09D              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 973+ D09D              ;               X = 1
 974+ D09D              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 975+ D09D              ;           else
 976+ D09D              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 977+ D09D              ;           endif
 978+ D09D              ;        endif
 979+ D09D              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 980+ D09D              ;        if dot product < 0
 981+ D09D              ;           set face visible
 982+ D09D              ;        else
 983+ D09D              ;           set face invisible
 984+ D09D              ;        end if
 985+ D09D              ;     else
 986+ D09D              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 987+ D09D              ;     end if
 988+ D09D              ; Next Face
 989+ D09D
 990+ D09D DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
 991+ D09F F8                                   ret     m
 992+ D0A0 21 87 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
 993+ D0A3 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 994+ D0A5 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
 995+ D0A6 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
 996+ D0A7 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 997+ D0A9 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
 998+ D0AA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
 999+ D0AB CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
1000+ D0AD C3 9D D0                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
1001+ D0B0 C9                                   ret
1002+ D0B1
1003+ D0B1 21 7B C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
1004+ D0B4 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
1005+ D0B6 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
1006+ D0B7 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
1007+ D0B8 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
1008+ D0BA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
1009+ D0BB 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
1010+ D0BC CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
1011+ D0BE C9                                   ret
1012+ D0BF
1013+ D0BF              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
1014+ D0BF
1015+ D0BF              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
1016+ D0BF              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
1017+ D0BF              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
1018+ D0BF              ;
1019+ D0BF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
1020+ D0BF              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
1021+ D0BF              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
1022+ D0BF              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
1023+ D0BF              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
1024+ D0BF
1025+ D0BF              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
1026+ D0BF 21 42 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1027+ D0C2 CD DA 94                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1028+ D0C5 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1029+ D0C6 7D                                   ld      a,l
1030+ D0C7 B0                                   or      b
1031+ D0C8 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1032+ D0CB 7D                                   ld      a,l
1033+ D0CC 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1034+ D0CF
1035+ D0CF 21 48 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1036+ D0D2 CD DA 94                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1037+ D0D5 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1038+ D0D6 7D                                   ld      a,l
1039+ D0D7 B0                                   or      b
1040+ D0D8 32 90 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1041+ D0DB 7D                                   ld      a,l
1042+ D0DC 32 8F C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1043+ D0DF
1044+ D0DF 21 4E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1045+ D0E2 CD DA 94                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1046+ D0E5 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1047+ D0E6 7D                                   ld      a,l
1048+ D0E7 B0                                   or      b
1049+ D0E8 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1050+ D0EB 7D                                   ld      a,l
1051+ D0EC 32 91 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1052+ D0EF C9                                   ret
1053+ D0F0
1054+ D0F0                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D0F0 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D0F1              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D0F1              ; EE29:
   4++D0F1
   5++D0F1              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D0F1              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D0F1              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D0F1              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D0F1              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D0F1              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D0F1              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D0F1              ;
  13++D0F1              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D0F1              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D0F1              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D0F1              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D0F1              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D0F1              ;
  19++D0F1              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D0F1              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D0F1              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D0F1              ;
  23++D0F1              ; so
  24++D0F1              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D0F1              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D0F1              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D0F1              ;
  28++D0F1              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D0F1              ;
  30++D0F1              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D0F1              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D0F1              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D0F1              ;
  34++D0F1
  35++D0F1
  36++D0F1
  37++D0F1 3A 82 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D0F4                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D0F4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D0F5 CA 21 D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  39++D0F8 2A 7B C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D0FB ED 5B 7E C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D0FF ED 4B 81 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D103 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D105                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D105 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D107 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D109                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D109 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D10B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D10D                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D10D CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D10F CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D111 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D112                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D112 A7          >                        and     a
  47++D113 C2 03 D1    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D116 22 7B C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D119 ED 53 7E C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D11D ED 43 81 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D121 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D123 32 E0 9D                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D126 C9                                   ret
  54++D127
  55++D127              ;;--BackFaceCull:
  56++D127              ;;--;debug:jp debug
  57++D127              ;;--; DEBUG  force for now
  58++D127              ;;--;                        ld     a,MaxVisibility                 ; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
  59++D127              ;;--;                        ld     (LastNormalVisible),a           ; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  60++D127              ;;--;
  61++D127              ;;--; DEBUG
  62++D127              ;;--                         ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4 &  return if no faces
  63++D127              ;;--                       ; break
  64++D127              ;;--                        call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
  65++D127              ;;--                        call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
  66++D127              ;;--                        call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  67++D127              ;;--                        call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
  68++D127              ;;--
  69++D127              ;;--.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
  70++D127              ;;--                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
  71++D127              ;;--; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
  72++D127              ;;--                        call    ScaleDrawcam
  73++D127              ;;--                        call    CopyDrawCamToScaled
  74++D127              ;;--.LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation  ; xx12 = xx15 . XX16
  75++D127              ;;--                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = xx15.xx16
  76++D127              ;;--.PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
  77++D127              ;;--                        ld      (varV),hl
  78++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
  79++D127              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  80++D127              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  81++D127              ;;--                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D127              ;;--                        xor     a
  83++D127              ;;--                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
  84++D127              ;;--ProcessNormalsLoop:     push    hl
  85++D127              ;;--                        push    bc
  86++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
  87++D127              ;;--                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
  88++D127              ;;--                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
  89++D127              ;;--.LL86:                  jp  .LL87 ; force testing of normals
  90++D127              ;;--                        jp      .FaceVisible
  91++D127              ;;--; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
  92++D127              ;;--.LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12
  93++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX17)
  94++D127              ;;--                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
  95++D127              ;;--.LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15
  96++D127              ;;--                        jp      .LL89
  97++D127              ;;--.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
  98++D127              ;;--                        srl     a
  99++D127              ;;--                        ld      (XX18),a
 100++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 101++D127              ;;--                        srl     a
 102++D127              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 103++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 104++D127              ;;--                        srl     a
 105++D127              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 106++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 107++D127              ;;--.LL92:                   ld      b,a
 108++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 109++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 110++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 111++D127              ;;--.LL93                   dec     b
 112++D127              ;;--                        jp      m, .LL94
 113++D127              ;;--.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 114++D127              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 115++D127              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 116++D127              ;;--                        dec     b
 117++D127              ;;--                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 118++D127              ;;--; Add normal to XX15
 119++D127              ;;--.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 120++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 121++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 122++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 123++D127              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 124++D127              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 125++D127              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 126++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 127++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 128++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 129++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 130++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 131++D127              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 132++D127              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 133++D127              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 134++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 135++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 136++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 137++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 138++D127              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 139++D127              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 140++D127              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 141++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 142++D127              ;;--; calculate dot product:
 143++D127              ;;--.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 144++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 145++D127              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 146++D127              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 147++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 148++D127              ;;--                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 149++D127              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 150++D127              ;;--                        ld      (varS),a
 151++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 152++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 153++D127              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 154++D127              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 155++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 156++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 157++D127              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 158++D127              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 159++D127              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 160++D127              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 161++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 162++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 163++D127              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 164++D127              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 165++D127              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 166++D127              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 167++D127              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 168++D127              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 169++D127              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 170++D127              ;;--                        test    $80
 171++D127              ;;--                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 172++D127              ;;--.FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 173++D127              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 174++D127              ;;--                        jp          ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 175++D127              ;;--.FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 176++D127              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAVisible
 177++D127              ;;--ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 178++D127              ;;--                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 179++D127              ;;--                        pop         bc
 180++D127              ;;--                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 181++D127              ;;--                        ld          a,4
 182++D127              ;;--                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 183++D127              ;;--                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 184++D127              ;;--                        dec         b
 185++D127              ;;--                        jp          nz,ProcessNormalsLoop
 186++D127              ;;--                        ret
 187++D127
 188++D127
 189++D127
 190++D127
 191++D127              ;;;;;                        call    CopyFaceToXX15                                          ;        Get Face data into XX12
 192++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 193++D127              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
 194++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 195++D127              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 196++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      nz, FaceVisible
 197++D127              ;;;;;.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
 198++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 199++D127              ;;;;;.ScaleNormal:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
 200++D127              ;;;;;                        JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
 201++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
 202++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
 203++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
 204++D127              ;;;;;.ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
 205++D127              ;;;;;                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
 206++D127              ;;;;;                        ShiftDERight1                       ;
 207++D127              ;;;;;                        ShiftBCRight1                       ;
 208++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
 209++D127              ;;;;;                        JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
 210++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
 211++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
 212++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
 213++D127              ;;;;;; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 214++D127              ;;;;;.ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
 215++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
 216++D127              ;;;;;    call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
 217++D127              ;;;;;    call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
 218++D127              ;;;;;;    call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
 219++D127              ;;;;;    call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
 220++D127              ;;;;;
 221++D127              ;;;;;
 222++D127              ;;;;;
 223++D127              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; copy DrawCam to Xx15
 224++D127              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation   ; Xx12 = XX15 (face normal) dot rotation matrix
 225++D127              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18              ; now XX18 = dot product
 226++D127              ;;;;;.ProcessNormals:        ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 227++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varV),hl
 228++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 229++D127              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 230++D127              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 231++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
 232++D127              ;;;;;                        xor     a
 233++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 234++D127              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 235++D127              ;;;;;                        push    bc
 236++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 237++D127              ;;;;;                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 238++D127              ;;;;;                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
 239++D127              ;;;;;.CheckFaceVisibility:   call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; Get Face data into XX12
 240++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(varXX17)                  ; if scale factor < 4 then skip next bit
 241++D127              ;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
 242++D127              ;;;;;.LargeScaleFactor:      call    CopyXX18toXX15
 243++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      .LL89
 244++D127              ;;;;;.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
 245++D127              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 246++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18),a
 247++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 248++D127              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 249++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 250++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 251++D127              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 252++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 253++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 254++D127              ;;;;;.LL92:                  ld      b,a
 255++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 256++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 257++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 258++D127              ;;;;;.LL93                   dec     b
 259++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      m, .LL94
 260++D127              ;;;;;.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 261++D127              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 262++D127              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 263++D127              ;;;;;                        dec     b
 264++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 265++D127              ;;;;;.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 266++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 267++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 268++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 269++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 270++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 271++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 272++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 273++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 274++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 275++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 276++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 277++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 278++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 279++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 280++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 281++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 282++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 283++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 284++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 285++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 286++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 287++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 288++D127              ;;;;;.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 289++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 290++D127              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 291++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 292++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 293++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 294++D127              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 295++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varS),a
 296++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 297++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 298++D127              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 299++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 300++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 301++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 302++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 303++D127              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 304++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 305++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 306++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 307++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 308++D127              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 309++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 310++D127              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 311++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 312++D127              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D127              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D127              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D127              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D127              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D127              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D127              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D127              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D127              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D127              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D127              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D127              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D127              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D127              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D127              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D127              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D127              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D127              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D127              ;;;;;
 333++D127
 334++D127
 335++D127
 336++D127 3A 14 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 337++D12A E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 338++D12C 20 44                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 339++D12E 2A 12 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 340++D131 7C                                   ld      a,h
 341++D132                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 341++D132 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 341++D134 D2 72 D1    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 342++D137 ED 5B 0C C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 343++D13B CD F4 B2                             call    compare16HLDE
 344++D13E 38 32                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 345++D140 ED 5B 0F C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 346++D144 CD F4 B2                             call    compare16HLDE
 347++D147 38 29                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 348++D149              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 348++D149 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348++D14B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349++D14D                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 349++D14D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D14F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D151                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D151 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D153 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D155 7C                                   ld      a,h
 352++D156 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 353++D158              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 353++D158 C2 78 D1    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 354++D15B                                      ; Check visbility distance
 355++D15B              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 356++D15B 7D                                   ld      a,l
 357++D15C 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 358++D15D CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 359++D15F CB 3F                                srl     a
 360++D161 CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D163 32 37 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 362++D166 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 363++D169 F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
 364++D16B E6 F7                                and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
 365++D16D 32 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 366++D170                                      ClearCarryFlag
 366++D170 B7          >                        or a
 367++D171 C9                                   ret
 368++D172              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 368++D172 21 38 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 368++D175 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 369++D177 C9                                   ret
 370++D178 3A 38 C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 371++D17B F6 48                                or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 372++D17D 32 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 373++D180 C9                                   ret
 374++D181
 375++D181
 376++D181              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 377++D181              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 377++D181 3A 1C C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 377++D184 A7          >                        and a
 377++D185 C8          >                        ret    z
 378++D186                                     ; break
 379++D186 CD C5 CB                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 380++D189 CD 6E 96                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 381++D18C CD 7B CE                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 382++D18F                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 383++D18F 3A 22 C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 384++D192 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 385++D194              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 386++D194 CD F1 D0                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 387++D197 CD 94 CE                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 388++D19A CD C5 95     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 389++D19D CD 0C CE                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 390++D1A0 21 E1 C4     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 391++D1A3 22 DB 9C                             ld      (varV),hl
 392++D1A6 3A 1C C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 393++D1A9 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 394++D1AB CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 395++D1AD 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 396++D1AE AF                                   xor     a
 397++D1AF 32 F0 D0                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 398++D1B2 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 399++D1B3 C5                                   push    bc
 400++D1B4 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 401++D1B5 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 402++D1B7 E5                                   push    hl
 403++D1B8 21 37 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 404++D1BB BE                                   cp      (hl)
 405++D1BC E1                                   pop     hl
 406++D1BD DA 02 D3                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 407++D1C0              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 408++D1C0 CD 75 D0     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 409++D1C3 3A E0 9D                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 410++D1C6 47                                   ld      b,a
 411++D1C7                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 411++D1C7 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 411++D1C9 DA 04 D2    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 412++D1CC CD 56 CE     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 413++D1CF C3 93 D2                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 414++D1D2 3A 7B C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 415++D1D5 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 416++D1D7 32 7B C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 417++D1DA 3A 81 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 418++D1DD CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 419++D1DF 32 81 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 420++D1E2 3A 7E C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 421++D1E5 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 422++D1E7 32 7E C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 423++D1EA 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 424++D1EC                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 424++D1EC 3A 87 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 424++D1EF CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 424++D1F1 32 87 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 425++D1F4                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 425++D1F4 3A 89 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 425++D1F7 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 425++D1F9 32 89 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 426++D1FC                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 426++D1FC 3A 8B C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 426++D1FF CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 426++D201 32 8B C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 427++D204              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 428++D204              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 429++D204 CD 31 CE                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 430++D207 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 431++D208 FA 27 D2                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 432++D20B              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 432++D20B 3A 87 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 432++D20E CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 432++D210 32 87 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 433++D213                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 433++D213 3A 89 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 433++D216 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 433++D218 32 89 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 434++D21B                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 434++D21B 3A 8B C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 434++D21E CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 434++D220 32 8B C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 435++D223 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 436++D224 F2 0B D2                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 437++D227              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 438++D227              ; Add normal to XX15
 439++D227              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 440++D227              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 441++D227              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 442++D227              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 443++D227              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 443++D227 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 443++D22A 32 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 444++D22D                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 444++D22D 3A 92 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 444++D230 32 DB 9D    >                        ld       (varS),a
 445++D233                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 445++D233 3A 81 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 445++D236 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 446++D239 3A 83 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 447++D23C CD 60 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 448++D23F DA D2 D1                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 449++D242 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 450++D245                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 450++D245 3A DB 9D    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 450++D248 32 8C C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 451++D24B                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 451++D24B 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 451++D24E 32 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 452++D251                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 452++D251 3A 8E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 452++D254 32 DB 9D    >                        ld       (varS),a
 453++D257                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 453++D257 3A 7B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 453++D25A 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 454++D25D 3A 7D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 455++D260 CD 60 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 456++D263 DA D2 D1                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 457++D266 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 458++D269                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 458++D269 3A DB 9D    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 458++D26C 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 459++D26F                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 459++D26F 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 459++D272 32 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 460++D275                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 460++D275 3A 90 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 460++D278 32 DB 9D    >                        ld       (varS),a
 461++D27B                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 461++D27B 3A 7E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 461++D27E 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 462++D281 3A 80 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 463++D284 CD 60 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 464++D287 DA D2 D1                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 465++D28A 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 466++D28D                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 466++D28D 3A DB 9D    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 466++D290 32 8A C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 467++D293              ; calculate dot product LL89
 468++D293              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 468++D293 3A 8D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 468++D296 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 469++D299 3A 87 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 470++D29C CD C7 B5                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 471++D29F 32 F5 9D                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 472++D2A2 3A 8E C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 473++D2A5 21 88 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 474++D2A8 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 475++D2A9 32 DB 9D                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 476++D2AC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 476++D2AC 3A 8F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 476++D2AF 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 477++D2B2 3A 89 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 478++D2B5 CD C7 B5                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 479++D2B8 32 D9 9D                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 480++D2BB                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 480++D2BB 3A F5 9D    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 480++D2BE 32 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 481++D2C1 3A 90 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 482++D2C4 21 8A C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 483++D2C7 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 484++D2C8 CD 60 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 485++D2CB 32 F5 9D                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 486++D2CE                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 486++D2CE 3A 91 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 486++D2D1 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 487++D2D4 3A 8B C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 488++D2D7 CD C7 B5                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 489++D2DA 32 D9 9D                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 490++D2DD                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 490++D2DD 3A F5 9D    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 490++D2E0 32 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 491++D2E3 3A 8C C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 492++D2E6 21 92 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 493++D2E9 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 494++D2EA CD 60 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 495++D2ED FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 496++D2EF 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 497++D2F1 3A DB 9D                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 498++D2F4 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 499++D2F7 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 500++D2F9 3A F0 D0     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 501++D2FC CD D9 CC                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 502++D2FF C3 08 D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 503++D302 3A F0 D0     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 504++D305 CD D0 CC                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 505++D308 21 F0 D0     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 506++D30B 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 507++D30C C1                                   pop         bc
 508++D30D E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 509++D30E 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 510++D310 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 511++D312 22 DB 9C                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 512++D315 05                                   dec         b
 513++D316 C2 B2 D1                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 514++D319 C9                                   ret
 515++D31A
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
1055+ D31A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1056+ D31A              ; Process edges
1057+ D31A              ; .....................................................
1058+ D31A              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
1059+ D31A ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1060+ D31A ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1061+ D31A ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1062+ D31A ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1063+ D31A ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1064+ D31A ~            NodeXPositive\1
1064+ D31A ~
1065+ D31A ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1066+ D31A ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1067+ D31A ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
1068+ D31A ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
1069+ D31A ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1070+ D31A ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1071+ D31A ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1072+ D31A ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1073+ D31A ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
1074+ D31A ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1075+ D31A ~            NodeNegative\1
1075+ D31A ~
1076+ D31A ~            LL52\1
1076+ D31A ~                                                              ;
1077+ D31A ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
1078+ D31A ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
1079+ D31A ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1080+ D31A ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1081+ D31A ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1082+ D31A ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
1082+ D31A ~
1083+ D31A ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1084+ D31A ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1085+ D31A ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1086+ D31A ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1087+ D31A ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1088+ D31A ~            SetAndMop\1
1088+ D31A ~
1089+ D31A ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1090+ D31A ~            FinishedThisNode\1
1091+ D31A                                  ENDM

1095+ D31A              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:

1099+ D325 FA 3B D3             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC

1103+ D329 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC

1119+ D349              NodeXNegSignChangeX:

1121+ D349 CD 0A B3             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign

1154+ D386              NodeXNegSignChangeY:

1166+ D394              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;

1168+ D397 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a

1177+ D3AD              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1178+ D3AD              NegativeNodeZ:
1179+ D3AD              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1180+ D3AD 2A 12 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1181+ D3B0 ED 4B 91 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................

1183+ D3B6                      ClearCarryFlag
1183+ D3B6 B7          >                        or a
1184+ D3B7 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1185+ D3B9 7D                   ld          a,l
1186+ D3BA 32 F5 9D             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low

1188+ D3BE 32 D8 9D             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high

1190+ D3C4              LL56Overflow:
1191+ D3C4 FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1192+ D3C6 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1193+ D3C8 3A F5 9D             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo

1194+ D3CD D0          >                        ret	 nc
1195+ D3CE              MakeNodeClose:
1196+ D3CE              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1197+ D3CE AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1198+ D3CF 32 D8 9D             ld          (varU),a                            ; U

1200+ D3D4 32 F5 9D             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1201+ D3D7 C9                   ret

1268+ D449 C3 5C D4             jp          StoreXPoint
1269+ D44C              NegativeXPoint:

1271+ D44C 3A DA 9D             ld          a,(varR)

1278+ D459 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1279+ D45B EB                   ex          de,hl

1287+ D466              ProcessYPoint:
1288+ D466 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
