1290+ D46A                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1290+ D46A 3A F5 9D    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1290+ D46D 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1291+ D470 3A 8A C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1292+ D473 21 D9 9D             ld          hl,varQ
1293+ D476 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1294+ D477                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1294+ D477 DA 80 D4    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1295+ D47A              SmallYPoint:
1296+ D47A CD 67 B7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1297+ D47D C3 83 D4             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1298+ D480              SmallYHop:
1299+ D480              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1300+ D480 CD 44 B7             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1301+ D483              SkipYScale:
1302+ D483              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1303+ D483 3A 8C C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1304+ D486 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1305+ D488 C2 9B D4             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1306+ D48B              PositiveYPoint:
1307+ D48B 3A DA 9D             ld          a,(varR)
1308+ D48E 6F                   ld          l,a
1309+ D48F 3A D8 9D             ld          a,(varU)
1310+ D492 67                   ld          h,a
1311+ D493 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1312+ D495 ED 31                add         hl,a
1313+ D497 EB                   ex          de,hl
1314+ D498 C3 AB D4             jp          LL50
1315+ D49B              NegativeYPoint:
1316+ D49B              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1317+ D49B 3A DA 9D             ld          a,(varR)
1318+ D49E 6F                   ld          l,a
1319+ D49F 3A D8 9D             ld          a,(varU)
1320+ D4A2 67                   ld          h,a
1321+ D4A3 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1322+ D4A5 06 00                ld          b,0
1323+ D4A7                      ClearCarryFlag
1323+ D4A7 B7          >                        or a
1324+ D4A8 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1325+ D4AA EB                   ex          de,hl
1326+ D4AB              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1327+ D4AB FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1328+ D4AE FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1329+ D4B1 FD 23                inc         iy
1330+ D4B3 FD 23                inc         iy
1331+ D4B5 C9                   ret
1332+ D4B6              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1333+ D4B6              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1334+ D4B6              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1335+ D4B6              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1336+ D4B6              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1337+ D4B6              CopyNodeToXX15:
1338+ D4B6                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1338+ D4B6 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1338+ D4B7 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1339+ D4BA 23                   inc         hl
1340+ D4BB                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1340+ D4BB 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1340+ D4BC 32 89 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1341+ D4BF 23                   inc         hl
1342+ D4C0                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1342+ D4C0 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1342+ D4C1 32 8B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1343+ D4C4 23                   inc         hl
1344+ D4C5              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1345+ D4C5              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1346+ D4C5 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1347+ D4C6 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1348+ D4C7 47                   ld          b,a
1349+ D4C8 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1350+ D4CA 32 88 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1351+ D4CD 78                   ld          a,b
1352+ D4CE E6 40                and         $40
1353+ D4D0 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1354+ D4D2 32 8A C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1355+ D4D5 78                   ld          a,b
1356+ D4D6 E6 20                and         $20
1357+ D4D8 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1358+ D4DA CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1359+ D4DC 32 8C C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1360+ D4DF 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1361+ D4E0 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1362+ D4E2 32 F5 9D             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1363+ D4E5 C9                   ret
1364+ D4E6
1365+ D4E6              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1366+ D4E6              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1367+ D4E6              ;..............................................................................................................................
1368+ D4E6              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1369+ D4E6              LL48GetScale:
1370+ D4E6 3A C7 9C             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1371+ D4E9 5F                   ld          e,a
1372+ D4EA CD B6 D4             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1373+ D4ED              LL48GetVertices:
1374+ D4ED              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1375+ D4ED                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1375+ D4ED BB          >                        cp      e
1375+ D4EE DA 2B D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1376+ D4F1              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1377+ D4F1                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1377+ D4F1 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1377+ D4F2 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1377+ D4F3 32 D6 9C    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1378+ D4F6 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1379+ D4F7 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1380+ D4F9 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1381+ D4FA                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1381+ D4FA 21 B3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1381+ D4FD ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1381+ D4FF 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1382+ D500 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1383+ D501                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1383+ D501 A7          >                        and     a
1383+ D502 C2 31 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1384+ D505              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1385+ D505 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1386+ D506 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1387+ D508 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1388+ D50A                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1388+ D50A A7          >                        and     a
1388+ D50B C2 31 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1389+ D50E              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1390+ D50E                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1390+ D50E 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1390+ D50F 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1390+ D510 32 D6 9C    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1391+ D513 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1392+ D514 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1393+ D516 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1394+ D517                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1394+ D517 21 B3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1394+ D51A ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1394+ D51C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1395+ D51D E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1396+ D51E                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1396+ D51E A7          >                        and     a
1396+ D51F C2 31 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1397+ D522              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1398+ D522 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1399+ D523 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1400+ D525 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1401+ D527                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1401+ D527 A7          >                        and     a
1401+ D528 C2 31 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1402+ D52B              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1403+ D52B 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1404+ D52E FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1405+ D530                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1406+ D530 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1407+ D531              NodeIsVisible:
1408+ D531              LL49:
1409+ D531 CD D8 D3             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1410+ D534 C9                   ret
1411+ D535
1412+ D535
1413+ D535              ProjectNodeToEye:
1414+ D535 ED 4B 8B C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1415+ D539 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1416+ D53A 32 D9 9D     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1417+ D53D 3A 87 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1418+ D540 CD FE B0     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1419+ D543 3A 88 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1420+ D546                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1420+ D546 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1420+ D548 C2 53 D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1421+ D54B              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1422+ D54B 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1423+ D54D 26 00            ld          h,0
1424+ D54F 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1425+ D550 C3 5A D5         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1426+ D553              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1427+ D553 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1428+ D555 26 00            ld          h,0
1429+ D557                  ClearCarryFlag
1429+ D557 B7          >                        or a
1430+ D558 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1431+ D55A              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1432+ D55A EB               ex          de,hl
1433+ D55B FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1434+ D55E FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1435+ D561              EyeProcessYPoint:
1436+ D561 ED 4B 8B C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1437+ D565 79           	ld			a,c
1438+ D566 32 D9 9D     	ld			(varQ),a
1439+ D569 3A 89 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1440+ D56C CD FE B0     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1441+ D56F 3A 8A C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1442+ D572                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1442+ D572 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1442+ D574 C2 7F D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1443+ D577              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1444+ D577 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1445+ D579                  ClearCarryFlag
1445+ D579 B7          >                        or a
1446+ D57A ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1447+ D57C C3 84 D5         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1448+ D57F              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1449+ D57F 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1450+ D581 26 00            ld          h,0
1451+ D583 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1452+ D584              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1453+ D584 EB               ex          de,hl
1454+ D585 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1455+ D588 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1456+ D58B C9               ret
1457+ D58C
1458+ D58C
1459+ D58C
1460+ D58C              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1461+ D58C              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1462+ D58C              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1463+ D58C              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1464+ D58C              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1465+ D58C              ; which can be simplified as:
1466+ D58C              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1467+ D58C              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1468+ D58C              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1469+ D58C              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1470+ D58C              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1471+ D58C              ;      Roll calculations:
1472+ D58C              ;
1473+ D58C              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1474+ D58C              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1475+ D58C              ;      Pitch calculations:
1476+ D58C              ;
1477+ D58C              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1478+ D58C              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1479+ D58C
1480+ D58C
1481+ D58C              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1482+ D58C                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D58C
   2++D58C              ; Full version
   3++D58C              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D58C              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D58C              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D58C              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D58C
   8++D58C
   9++D58C              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++D58C             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++D58C 3A EF 9C    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++D58F 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++D592             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++D592 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++D595 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D598             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++D598 3A 21 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D59B 32 D6 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++D59E 3A 22 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++D5A1 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++D5A3 CD 5A AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++D5A6 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++D5AA             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++D5AA 2A 21 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D5AD 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D5B0 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++D5B3 CD 5A AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++D5B6 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++D5BA C9                                   ret
  11++D5BB              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  11++D5BB             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  11++D5BB 3A EF 9C    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  11++D5BE 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  11++D5C1             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  11++D5C1 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  11++D5C4 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D5C7             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  11++D5C7 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D5CA 32 D6 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  11++D5CD 3A 16 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  11++D5D0 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  11++D5D2 CD 5A AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  11++D5D5 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  11++D5D9             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  11++D5D9 2A 15 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D5DC 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D5DF 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  11++D5E2 CD 5A AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  11++D5E5 ED 53 15 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  12++D5E9 C9                                   ret
  13++D5EA              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  13++D5EA             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  13++D5EA 3A EF 9C    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  13++D5ED 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  13++D5F0             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  13++D5F0 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  13++D5F3 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D5F6             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  13++D5F6 3A 1B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D5F9 32 D6 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  13++D5FC 3A 1C C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  13++D5FF EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  13++D601 CD 5A AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  13++D604 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  13++D608             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  13++D608 2A 1B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D60B 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D60E 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  13++D611 CD 5A AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  13++D614 ED 53 1B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  14++D618 C9                                   ret
  15++D619
  16++D619              ApplyMyPitchToNosev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  16++D619             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  16++D619 3A E1 9C    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  16++D61C 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  16++D61F             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  16++D61F 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  16++D622 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++D625             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  16++D625 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++D628 32 D6 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  16++D62B 3A 26 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  16++D62E EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  16++D630 CD 5A AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  16++D633 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  16++D637             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  16++D637 2A 25 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++D63A 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++D63D 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  16++D640 CD 5A AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  16++D643 ED 53 25 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  17++D647 C9                                   ret
  18++D648              ApplyMyPitchToSidev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  18++D648             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  18++D648 3A E1 9C    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  18++D64B 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  18++D64E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  18++D64E 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  18++D651 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++D654             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  18++D654 3A 19 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++D657 32 D6 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  18++D65A 3A 1A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  18++D65D EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  18++D65F CD 5A AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  18++D662 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  18++D666             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  18++D666 2A 19 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++D669 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++D66C 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  18++D66F CD 5A AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  18++D672 ED 53 19 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  19++D676 C9                                   ret
  20++D677              ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  20++D677             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  20++D677 3A E1 9C    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  20++D67A 32 D9 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  20++D67D             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  20++D67D 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  20++D680 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++D683             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  20++D683 3A 1F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++D686 32 D6 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  20++D689 3A 20 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  20++D68C EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  20++D68E CD 5A AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  20++D691 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  20++D695             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  20++D695 2A 1F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++D698 22 DA 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++D69B 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  20++D69E CD 5A AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  20++D6A1 ED 53 1F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  21++D6A5 C9                                   ret
  22++D6A6
  23++D6A6
  24++D6A6              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++D6A6 ~                                    push    bc
  26++D6A6 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++D6A6 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++D6A6 ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++D6A6 ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++D6A6 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++D6A6 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++D6A6 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++D6A6 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++D6A6 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++D6A6 ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++D6A6 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++D6A6 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++D6A6 ~                                    pop     bc
  39++D6A6 ~                                    ret
  40++D6A6 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++D6A6 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++D6A6 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++D6A6 ~                                    or      a
  44++D6A6 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++D6A6 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D6A6 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++D6A6 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D6A6 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++D6A6 ~                                    pop     bc
  50++D6A6 ~                                    ret
  51++D6A6 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++D6A6 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++D6A6 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++D6A6 ~                                    pop     bc
  55++D6A6 ~                                    ret
  56++D6A6                                      ENDM
  57++D6A6
  58++D6A6
  59++D6A6              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++D6A6 C5          >                        push    bc
  59++D6A7 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++D6A8 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++D6AB 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++D6AC 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++D6AD A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++D6AE FA BF D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++D6B1             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++D6B1 ED 5B D7 9C >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++D6B5 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++D6B8 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++D6B9 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++D6BC 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++D6BD C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D6BE C9          >                        ret
  59++D6BF             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++D6BF ED 5B D7 9C >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++D6C3 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++D6C6 B7          >                        or      a
  59++D6C7 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++D6C9 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++D6CB 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++D6CC 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++D6CF EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++D6D1 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D6D2 C9          >                        ret
  59++D6D3             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++D6D3 AF          >                    xor a
  59++D6D4 95          >                    sub l
  59++D6D5 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++D6D6 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++D6D7 94          >                    sub h
  59++D6D8 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++D6D9 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++D6DC 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++D6DD C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D6DE C9          >                        ret
  60++D6DF
  61++D6DF              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++D6DF C5          >                        push    bc
  61++D6E0 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++D6E1 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++D6E4 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++D6E5 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++D6E6 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++D6E7 FA F8 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++D6EA             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++D6EA ED 5B D7 9C >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++D6EE 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++D6F1 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++D6F2 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++D6F5 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++D6F6 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D6F7 C9          >                        ret
  61++D6F8             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++D6F8 ED 5B D7 9C >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++D6FC 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++D6FF B7          >                        or      a
  61++D700 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++D702 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++D704 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++D705 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++D708 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++D70A C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D70B C9          >                        ret
  61++D70C             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++D70C AF          >                    xor a
  61++D70D 95          >                    sub l
  61++D70E 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++D70F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++D710 94          >                    sub h
  61++D711 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++D712 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++D715 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++D716 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D717 C9          >                        ret
  62++D718
  63++D718              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++D718 C5          >                        push    bc
  63++D719 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++D71A 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++D71D 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++D71E 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++D71F A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++D720 FA 31 D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++D723             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++D723 ED 5B D7 9C >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++D727 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++D72A 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++D72B 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++D72E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++D72F C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D730 C9          >                        ret
  63++D731             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++D731 ED 5B D7 9C >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++D735 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++D738 B7          >                        or      a
  63++D739 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++D73B 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++D73D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++D73E 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++D741 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++D743 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D744 C9          >                        ret
  63++D745             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++D745 AF          >                    xor a
  63++D746 95          >                    sub l
  63++D747 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++D748 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++D749 94          >                    sub h
  63++D74A 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++D74B 22 D7 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++D74E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++D74F C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D750 C9          >                        ret
  64++D751
  65++D751              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++D751 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++D754              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++D754              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++D754              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++D754
  71++D754              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++D754              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++D754 3A F0 9C     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++D757 21 E3 9C                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++D75A B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++D75B CA 15 D8                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++D75E                                      ;break
  78++D75E              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++D75E 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++D75F 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++D762 CD B6 AE                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++D765 32 D8 9C                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++D768 22 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++D76B              ; A = Flip sign
  85++D76B 3A F2 9C                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++D76E 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++D771 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++D772              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++D772 CD DF D6                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++D775              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++D775 32 53 D7                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++D778 22 51 D7                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++D77B              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++D77B 3A E3 9C                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++D77E 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D77F CD B6 AE                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++D782 32 D8 9C                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++D785 22 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++D788              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++D788 3A 53 D7                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++D78B 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++D78C 3A E4 9C                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++D78F AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++D790              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++D790 CD 18 D7                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++D793 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++D796 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++D799              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++D799 3A E3 9C                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++D79C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++D79D CD B6 AE                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++D7A0 32 D8 9C                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++D7A3 22 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++D7A6              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++D7A6 3A 53 D7                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++D7A9 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++D7AC 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++D7AD 3A E4 9C                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++D7B0 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++D7B1 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++D7B2 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++D7B5 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++D7B6 F2 C5 D7                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++D7B9 2A D7 9C                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++D7BC ED 5B 51 D7                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++D7C0 B7                                   or      a
 127++D7C1 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++D7C2 C3 DF D7                             jp      .MV44
 129++D7C5 2A 51 D7     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++D7C8 ED 5B D7 9C                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++D7CC B7                                   or      a
 132++D7CD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++D7CF 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++D7D1                                      NegHL
 134++D7D1 AF          >                    xor a
 134++D7D2 95          >                    sub l
 134++D7D3 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++D7D4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++D7D5 94          >                    sub h
 134++D7D6 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++D7D7 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++D7DA EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++D7DC 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++D7DF              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++D7DF 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++D7E2 3A F0 9C                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++D7E5 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++D7E6 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++D7E9 CD B6 AE                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++D7EC 32 D8 9C                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++D7EF 22 D6 9C                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++D7F2 3A F1 9C                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++D7F5 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++D7F6 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++D7F9 AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++D7FA CD A6 D6                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++D7FD 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++D800 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++D803                                      ;break
 154++D803                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++D803
 156++D803 CD 8C D5                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++D806 CD BB D5                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++D809 CD EA D5                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++D80C CD 19 D6                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++D80F CD 48 D6                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++D812 CD 77 D6                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++D815 3A D5 9D     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++D818 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++D81A 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++D81B 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++D81E 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++D821 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++D822 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++D824 CD 3D B5                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++D827 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++D82A 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++D82D C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1483+ D82E                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D82E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++D82E              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++D82E 3A 35 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++D831 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++D832 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++D834 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++D835 32 40 C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++D838 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++D839 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++D83B 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++D83D FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++D83F 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++D841 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++D842 32 41 C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++D845 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++D846 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++D847 32 35 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++D84A 21 1B C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++D84D 22 BB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++D850 21 21 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++D853 22 BD 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++D856 CD 4B C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++D859 21 1D C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++D85C 22 BB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++D85F 21 23 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++D862 22 BD 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++D865 CD 4B C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++D868 21 1F C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++D86B 22 BB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++D86E 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++D871 22 BD 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++D874 CD 4B C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++D877 3A 34 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++D87A 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++D87B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++D87D 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++D87E 32 40 C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++D881 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++D882 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++D884 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++D885 FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++D887 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++D889 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++D88A 32 41 C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D88D 47                                   ld      b,a
  46++D88E B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  47++D88F 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  48++D892 21 1B C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  49++D895 22 BB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  50++D898 21 15 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  51++D89B 22 BD 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  52++D89E CD 4B C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  53++D8A1 21 1D C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  54++D8A4 22 BB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  55++D8A7 21 17 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  56++D8AA 22 BD 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  57++D8AD CD 4B C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  58++D8B0 21 1F C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  59++D8B3 22 BB 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  60++D8B6 21 19 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  61++D8B9 22 BD 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  62++D8BC CD 4B C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  63++D8BF C9                                   ret
  64++D8C0
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1484+ D8C0                          INCLUDE "./ModelRender/DrawLines.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
   1++D8C0
   2++D8C0              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++D8C0 00           DrawLinesCounter		db	0
   4++D8C1              ; Initial tests look OK
   5++D8C1              LL155:;
   6++D8C1              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.
   7++D8C1                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:
   8++D8C1 3E 65        DrawLines:              ld	a,$65 ; DEBUG
   9++D8C3 FD 6F                                ld		iyl,a							; set ixl to colour (assuming we come in here with a = colour to draw)
  10++D8C5 3A 03 C3                             ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)			; get number of lines
  11++D8C8                                      ReturnIfAIsZero   						; No lines then bail out.
  11++D8C8 A7          >                        and     a
  11++D8C9 C8          >                        ret     z
  12++D8CA FD 67                                ld		iyh,a			                ; number of lines still to draw
  13++D8CC 21 11 C2                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  14++D8CF              ;LL27:                                       ; counter Y, Draw clipped lines in XX19 ship lines heap
  15++D8CF 4E           DrawXX19ClippedLines:   ld      c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1
  16++D8D0 23                                   inc     hl
  17++D8D1 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X
  18++D8D2 23                                   inc     hl
  19++D8D3 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)                          ; c = varX1
  20++D8D4 23                                   inc     hl
  21++D8D5 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                          ; de = point2 Y,X
  22++D8D6 23                                   inc     hl
  23++D8D7 E5                                   push	hl
  24++D8D8 FD E5                                push    iy
  25++D8DA 60                                   ld      h,b
  26++D8DB 69                                   ld      l,c
  27++D8DC                ;  call    l2_draw_any_line                ; call version of LOIN that used BCDE
