  29++D8DE                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  29++D8DE ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  30++D8E2 CD D2 EA                             call    LineHLtoDE
  31++D8E5 FD E1                                pop     iy
  32++D8E7 E1                                   pop	    hl
  33++D8E8 FD 25                                dec     iyh
  34++D8EA 20 E3                                jr		nz,DrawXX19ClippedLines
  35++D8EC C9                                   ret                                     ; --- Wireframe end  \ LL118-1
  36++D8ED
# file closed: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
1485+ D8ED              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1486+ D8ED
1487+ D8ED              ; DIot seem to lawyas have Y = 0???
1488+ D8ED              ProcessDot:            ; break
1489+ D8ED CD C5 CB                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1490+ D8F0 CD 6E 96                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1491+ D8F3 CD 7B CE                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1492+ D8F6 CD 48 CD                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1493+ D8F9 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
1494+ D8FC 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
1495+ D8FF 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
1496+ D902 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
1497+ D905 AF                                   xor     a
1498+ D906 CD 94 95                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1499+ D909 CD FC CB                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1500+ D90C CD 79 CC                             call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1501+ D90F FD 21 D1 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1502+ D913 CD 35 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye
1503+ D916 C9                                   ret
1504+ D917
1505+ D917              ; .....................................................
1506+ D917              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1507+ D917              ; for each node:
1508+ D917              ;     see if node >
1509+ D917 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1510+ D918 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1511+ D91A 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1512+ D91C 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1513+ D91D              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
1513+ D91D AF          >                        xor a
1514+ D91E 32 03 C3                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1515+ D921 CD C5 CB                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1516+ D924 CD 6E 96                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1517+ D927 CD 7B CE                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1518+ D92A CD 48 CD                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1519+ D92D 21 29 C3                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1520+ D930 3A 18 C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1521+ D933 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1522+ D934 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1523+ D935 16 06                                ld      d,6
1524+ D937 CD 2E B1                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1525+ D93A 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1526+ D93B FD 21 D1 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1527+ D93F              LL48:
1528+ D93F C5           PointLoop:	            push	bc                                  ; save counters
1529+ D940 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1530+ D941 FD E5                                push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1531+ D943 78                                   ld      a,b
1532+ D944                                      ;break
1533+ D944 CD B6 D4                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1534+ D947 3A 88 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1535+ D94A CD 94 95                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1536+ D94D CD FC CB                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1537+ D950 CD 79 CC                             call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1538+ D953 FD E1                                pop		iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1539+ D955 CD 35 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1540+ D958                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1541+ D958                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1542+ D958 FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push	iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1543+ D95A E1                                   pop		hl
1544+ D95B 3E 04                                ld		a,4
1545+ D95D ED 31                                add		hl,a
1546+ D95F E5                                   push	hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1547+ D960 FD E1                                pop		iy								    ; and put it in iy again
1548+ D962 E1                                   pop		hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1549+ D963 3E 06                                ld		a,6
1550+ D965 ED 31                                add 	hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1551+ D967 C1                                   pop		bc                                  ; get counter back
1552+ D968 10 D5                                djnz	PointLoop
1553+ D96A              ; ......................................................
1554+ D96A                                      ClearCarryFlag
1554+ D96A B7          >                        or a
1555+ D96B C9                                   ret
1556+ D96C
1557+ D96C              ; ...........................................................
1558+ D96C CD 27 D1     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1559+ D96F 3A 38 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1560+ D972 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1561+ D974 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1562+ D975                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1562+ D975 CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1562+ D977 C2 B3 D9    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1563+ D97A              ;............................................................
1564+ D97A              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1564+ D97A CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1564+ D97C C8          >                        ret		z
1565+ D97D                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1565+ D97D CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1565+ D97F CA A6 D9    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw
1566+ D982              ;............................................................
1567+ D982 CD ED D8     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1568+ D985                                      SetMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsDotBitNbr ; set is a dot flag
1568+ D985 21 38 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1568+ D988 CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)
1569+ D98A ED 4B D1 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1570+ D98E ED 5B D3 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1571+ D992 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1572+ D993 B2                                   or      d                           ;
1573+ D994 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1574+ D995 7B                                   ld      a,e
1575+ D996 E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1576+ D998 C0                                   ret     nz
1577+ D999 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1578+ D99A 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1579+ D99C 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1580+ D99E                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1580+ D99E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1581+ D9A2 CD 5E E1                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1582+ D9A5 C9                                   ret
1583+ D9A6              ;............................................................
1584+ D9A6 CD 1D D9     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1585+ D9A9 CD 81 D1                             call    CullV2
1586+ D9AC CD 70 DB                             call    PrepLines
1587+ D9AF CD C1 D8                             call    DrawLines
1588+ D9B2 C9                                   ret
1589+ D9B3              ;............................................................
1590+ D9B3 CD 1D D9     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1591+ D9B6                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1591+ D9B6 21 38 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1591+ D9B9 CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1592+ D9BB 3A 3D C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1593+ D9BE C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1594+ D9C0 DA 82 DA                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1595+ D9C3 32 3D C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1596+ D9C6              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1596+ D9C6 3A 38 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1596+ D9C9 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1596+ D9CB C8          >                        ret		z
1597+ D9CC              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1597+ D9CC CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1597+ D9CE C2 82 D9    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1598+ D9D1 2A 12 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1599+ D9D4 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1600+ D9D5                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1600+ D9D5 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1600+ D9D7 DA DF D9    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1601+ D9DA 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1602+ D9DC C3 EA D9                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1603+ D9DF              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1603+ D9DF CB 25       >			   sla l
1603+ D9E1 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1604+ D9E3                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1604+ D9E3 CB 25       >			   sla l
1604+ D9E5 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1605+ D9E7                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1605+ D9E7 37          >                        scf
1606+ D9E8 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1607+ D9EA 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1608+ D9EC 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1609+ D9ED 3A 3D C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1610+ D9F0 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1611+ D9F1 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1612+ D9F3 CD 72 B0                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1613+ D9F6 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1614+ D9F7                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1614+ D9F7 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1614+ D9F9 DA 01 DA    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1615+ D9FC 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1616+ D9FE C3 0D DA                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1617+ DA01              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1617+ DA01 CB 23       >			   sla e
1617+ DA03 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1618+ DA05                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1618+ DA05 CB 23       >			   sla e
1618+ DA07 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1619+ DA09                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1619+ DA09 CB 23       >			   sla e
1619+ DA0B CB 12       >			   rl  d
1620+ DA0D 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1621+ DA0E 32 3E C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1622+ DA11 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1623+ DA13 3A 3D C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1624+ DA16 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1625+ DA18 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1626+ DA1A CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1627+ DA1C 21 8E DA                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1628+ DA1F ED 31                                add     hl,a
1629+ DA21 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1630+ DA22 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1631+ DA24 3A 3D C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1632+ DA27                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1632+ DA27 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1632+ DA29 CA 2E DA    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1632+ DA2C ED 44       >                        neg
1632+ DA2E             >.DoneABSa:
1633+ DA2E CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1634+ DA30 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1635+ DA32 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1636+ DA34 F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1637+ DA36 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1638+ DA38 3A 17 C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1639+ DA3B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1640+ DA3C 21 D1 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1641+ DA3F C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1642+ DA41 DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1643+ DA43 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1644+ DA44 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1645+ DA45 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1646+ DA46 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1647+ DA47 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1648+ DA48 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1649+ DA49 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1650+ DA4A DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1651+ DA4C FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1652+ DA4E                                          ;break
1653+ DA4E D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1654+ DA50 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1655+ DA51 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1656+ DA53 CD 96 DA                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1657+ DA56 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1658+ DA57                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1658+ DA57 A7          >                        and     a
1658+ DA58 C2 73 DA    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1659+ DA5B EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1660+ DA5C E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1661+ DA5D E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1662+ DA5E D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1663+ DA5F DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1664+ DA61 CD 96 DA                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1665+ DA64 D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1666+ DA65 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1667+ DA66                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1667+ DA66 A7          >                        and     a
1667+ DA67 C2 73 DA    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1668+ DA6A 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1669+ DA6B 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1670+ DA6C                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1670+ DA6C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1671+ DA70 CD 66 E1                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1672+ DA73 C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1673+ DA75 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1674+ DA77 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1675+ DA79 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1676+ DA7B 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1677+ DA7D ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1678+ DA7F 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1679+ DA81 C9                                   ret
1680+ DA82              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1681+ DA82 3A 2B C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1682+ DA85 CD ED A2                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1683+ DA88                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1683+ DA88 21 38 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1683+ DA8B CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1684+ DA8D C9                                   ret
1685+ DA8E
1686+ DA8E
1687+ DA8E FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1687+ DA92 6C 48 24 25
1688+ DA96                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1689+ DA96
1690+ DA96              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1691+ DA96              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1692+ DA96              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1693+ DA96              ; uses registers hl, de
1694+ DA96 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1695+ DA97 CD 79 A3                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1696+ DA9A E1                                   pop     hl
1697+ DA9B 17                                   rla                                 ;
1698+ DA9C 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1699+ DA9E 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1700+ DA9F ED 30                                mul
1701+ DAA1 5A                                   ld  e,d
1702+ DAA2 16 00                                ld  d,0
1703+ DAA4                                      ClearCarryFlag
1703+ DAA4 B7          >                        or a
1704+ DAA5 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1705+ DAA7 C9                                   ret
1706+ DAA8 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1707+ DAA9 ED 30                                mul
1708+ DAAB 5A                                   ld  e,d
1709+ DAAC 16 00                                ld  d,0
1710+ DAAE                                      ClearCarryFlag
1710+ DAAE B7          >                        or a
1711+ DAAF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1712+ DAB1 C9                                   ret
1713+ DAB2
1714+ DAB2              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points

1716+ DAB2 C9                                   ret
1717+ DAB3
1718+ DAB3              ; ......................................................
1719+ DAB3 3A 26 C3     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1720+ DAB6 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1721+ DAB8 C8                                   ret     z
1722+ DAB9 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1723+ DABC F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1724+ DABE E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1725+ DAC0 32 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1726+ DAC3                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1726+ DAC3 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1726+ DAC5 32 36 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1727+ DAC8                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1727+ DAC8 AF          >                        xor      a
1727+ DAC9 32 3C C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1728+ DACC 32 3E C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1729+ DACF 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1730+ DAD1 32 3D C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1731+ DAD4                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1732+ DAD4 C9                                   ret
1733+ DAD5
1734+ DAD5              ; in a = damage
1735+ DAD5 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1736+ DAD6 3A 26 C3                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1737+ DAD9 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1738+ DADB C8                                   ret     z
1739+ DADC 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1740+ DADF                                      ClearCarryFlag
1740+ DADF B7          >                        or a
1741+ DAE0 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1742+ DAE1 D2 E8 DA     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1743+ DAE4 CD B3 DA                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1744+ DAE7 C9                                   ret
1745+ DAE8 32 3C C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1746+ DAEB C9                                   ret
1747+ DAEC              ; need recovery for energy too
1748+ DAEC              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1749+ DAEC
1750+ DAEC              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1751+ DAEC              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1752+ DAEC              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1753+ DAEC              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1754+ DAEC              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1755+ DAEC              ;
1756+ DAEC              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1757+ DAEC              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1758+ DAEC              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1759+ DAEC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1760+ DAEC              AddLaserBeamLine:
1761+ DAEC              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1762+ DAEC              GetGunVertexNode:
1763+ DAEC 3A 15 C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1764+ DAEF 21 D1 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1765+ DAF2 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1766+ DAF4 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1767+ DAF7              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1768+ DAF7 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1769+ DAF8 23                   inc         hl
1770+ DAF9 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1771+ DAFA 23                   inc         hl
1772+ DAFB ED 43 87 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1773+ DAFF 0C                   inc         c
1774+ DB00 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1775+ DB01 04                   inc         b
1776+ DB02 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1777+ DB03              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1778+ DB03 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1779+ DB04 23                   inc         hl
1780+ DB05 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1781+ DB06 23                   inc         hl
1782+ DB07 ED 43 89 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1783+ DB0B              SetX2PointToXX15:
1784+ DB0B 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1785+ DB0E ED 43 8B C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1786+ DB12 3A 12 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1787+ DB15 4F                   ld          c,a
1788+ DB16              SetY2PointToXX15:
1789+ DB16 ED 43 8D C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1790+ DB1A 3A 0E C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1791+ DB1D                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1791+ DB1D CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1791+ DB1F CA 27 DB    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1792+ DB22              LL74DecX2:
1793+ DB22 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1794+ DB24 32 8B C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1795+ DB27              LL74SkipDec:
1796+ DB27 CD 6F C9             call        ClipLine                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1797+ DB2A 38 71                jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1798+ DB2C              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1799+ DB2C 2A DC 9D             ld          hl,(varU16)
1800+ DB2F 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1801+ DB32 77                   ld          (hl),a
1802+ DB33 23                   inc         hl
1803+ DB34 3A 89 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1804+ DB37 77                   ld          (hl),a
1805+ DB38 23                   inc         hl
1806+ DB39 3A 8B C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1807+ DB3C 77                   ld          (hl),a
1808+ DB3D 23                   inc         hl
1809+ DB3E 3A 8D C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1810+ DB41 77                   ld          (hl),a
1811+ DB42 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1812+ DB44 23                   inc         hl
1813+ DB45 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1814+ DB47 22 DC 9D             ld          (varU16),hl
1815+ DB4A C9                   ret

   1++DB4B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DB4B                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DB4B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DB4B              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DB4B 21 D1 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DB4E ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DB50 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DB51 11 87 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX1
   7++DB54 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DB56 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DB58 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DB5A ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DB5C C9                                   ret

   3++DB5D                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   1++DB5D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DB5D              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DB5D 21 D1 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DB60 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DB62 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DB63 11 8B C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DB66 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DB68 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DB6A ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DB6C ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DB6E C9                                   ret

   4++DB6F                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DB6F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DB6F              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DB6F ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DB6F ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DB6F ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DB6F                                  ENDM
   7++DB6F
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   5++DB6F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DB6F              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DB6F               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DB6F 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DB70
  10++DB70              PrepLines:
  11++DB70              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DB70
  13++DB70              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DB70              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DB70              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DB70              ;        or          8
  17++DB70              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DB70              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DB70              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DB70              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DB70              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DB70              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DB70              ;
  24++DB70              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DB70              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DB70                      ;break
  27++DB70                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DB70 AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DB71 32 03 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DB74                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DB74 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DB75 32 04 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DB78                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DB78 AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DB79 32 6F DB    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DB7C 3A 19 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DB7F DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DB81 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DB84 21 11 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DB87 22 DC 9D             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DB8A                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DB8A 3A 19 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DB8D 32 E0 9D    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DB90 3A 36 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DB93                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DB93 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DB95 CA 9D DB    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DB98 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DB9A 32 36 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DB9D              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DB9D              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DB9D              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DB9D              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DB9D              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DB9D 21 19 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DBA0                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DBA0 22 DB 9C             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DBA3 3A 14 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DBA6 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DBA7              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DBA7              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DBA7 2A DB 9C             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DBAA E5                   push        hl
  54++DBAB FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DBAD                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DBAD ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DBAD                      ENDIF
  58++DBAD 3A C7 9C             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DBB0 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DBB1              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DBB1 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DBB4                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DBB4 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DBB5 DA 07 DC    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DBB8              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DBB8              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DBB8              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DBB8 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DBBB 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DBBC E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DBBE                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DBBE 21 B3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DBC1 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DBC3 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DBC4              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DBC4                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DBC4 A7          >                        and     a
  71++DBC5 C2 D9 DB    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DBC8              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DBC8 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DBC9 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DBCB E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DBCD E5                   push        hl
  77++DBCE                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DBCE 21 B3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DBD1 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DBD3 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DBD4 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DBD5                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DBD5 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DBD6 CA 07 DC    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DBD9              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DBD9              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DBD9              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DBD9 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DBDC CD 4B DB             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DBDF FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DBE2 CD 5D DB             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DBE5 CD 6F C9             call        ClipLine
  88++DBE8 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DBEA              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DBEA ED 5B DC 9D          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DBEE 21 87 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DBF1                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DBF1 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DBF3 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DBF5 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DBF7 ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DBF9 ED 53 DC 9D          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DBFD 21 03 C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DC00 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DC01 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DC02                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DC02 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DC04 D2 1D DC    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DC07              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DC07              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DC07              LL78:
 101++DC07 2A DB 9C             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DC0A 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DC0C ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DC0E 22 DB 9C             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DC11 21 6F DB             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DC14 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DC15 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DC16                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DC16 21 E0 9D    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DC19 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DC1A C2 A7 DB    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DC1D              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DC1D              LL81:
 111++DC1D              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DC1D 3A 03 C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DC20 CB 27                sla         a
 114++DC22 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DC24 32 04 C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DC27              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DC27 C9                   ret
 118++DC28
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

 349+ F4D6              ;ShipFrontWeapons        DB EQ_FRONT_PULSE,  EQ_FRONT_PULSE,     EQ_FRONT_MINING,    EQ_FRONT_MINING
 350+ F4D6              ;ShipRearWeapons         DB EQ_REAR_PULSE,   EQ_REAR_PULSE,      EQ_REAR_MINING,     EQ_REAR_MINING

 352+ F4D6              ;ShipRightWeapons        DB EQ_RIGHT_PULSE,  EQ_RIGHT_PULSE,     EQ_RIGHT_MINING,    EQ_RIGHT_MINING
 353+ F4D6              ;                           c  y  s  t
 354+ F4D6              ;                           a  p  h  e                                            fi     P     Vi
 355+ F4D6              ;                           n  o  o  c                                            tt     o     ew
 356+ F4D6              ;                           B  s  w  h  price                  type               ed     s

 383+ F676              ShipEquipTableRowLen    EQU 16
 384+ F676              ShipEquipTableSize      EQU ($-ShipEquipmentList)/ShipEquipTableRowLen

 386+ F676              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 387+ F676 2B           GalaxyRandSeed			DB	43	            ; Just some start values
 388+ F677 20           GalaxyRandSeed1			DB	32	            ; Just some start values
 389+ F678 0C           GalaxyRandSeed2			DB	12	            ; Just some start values
 390+ F679 42           GalaxyRandSeed3			DB	66	            ; Just some start values
 391+ F67A              GalaxySeedRandom:
 392+ F67A              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 393+ F67A CD E7 A3     GetDigramGalaxySeed:    call	copy_galaxy_to_working
 394+ F67D 18 03                                jr		GetDigramWorkingSeed
 395+ F67F CD FF A3     GetDigramSystemSeed:    call	copy_system_to_working
 396+ F682 11 FD AB     GetDigramWorkingSeed:   ld		de,name_expanded    ; ">GetDigram a = digram seed"
 397+ F685 06 03                                ld		b,3
 398+ F687 3A CF 9E                             ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)
 399+ F68A E6 40                                and		$40
 400+ F68C 28 03                                jr		z,.SmallSizeName
 401+ F68E CD 1E AC     .LargeSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 402+ F691 CD 1E AC     .SmallSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 403+ F694 CD 1E AC                             call	NamingLoop
 404+ F697 CD 1E AC                             call	NamingLoop
 405+ F69A EB           .DoneName:              ex		de,hl
 406+ F69B 36 00                                ld		(hl),0
 407+ F69D EB                                   ex		de,hl
 408+ F69E C9                                   ret
 409+ F69F
 410+ F69F 11 76 F6     GalaxySetSeedFromHL:    ld      de,GalaxyRandSeed
 411+ F6A2              ; Uses registers a,b and hl
 412+ F6A2 B7           GalaxyDoRandom:         or      a                                               ; in 6502 this is called after a bcc instruction to will always be clear (see .detok2 and .dt6)
 413+ F6A3 3A 76 F6                             ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed)
 414+ F6A6 CB 17        .Seed0Rolled:           rl      a                                               ; r0 << 1
 415+ F6A8 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = reg x in 6502 so x = r0 << 1
 416+ F6A9 21 78 F6     .AddSeed2               ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed2                              ;
 417+ F6AC 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; a = r0 << 1 + r2
 418+ F6AD 32 76 F6     .SetRandSeed0:          ld		(GalaxyRandSeed),a					            ; set r0' = (r0 << 1) +  r2 + (r0 bit 7)
 419+ F6B0 78                                   ld      a,b
 420+ F6B1 32 78 F6     .SetRandSeed2:          ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; set r2' =  r0 << 1
 421+ F6B4 3A 77 F6     .GetRandSeed1:          ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed1)
 422+ F6B7 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = r1
 423+ F6B8 21 79 F6                             ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed3
 424+ F6BB 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; Adc from before may have set carry flag or may not, will be set if r0 << 1 + r2 + carry > 256
 425+ F6BC 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; set r1' = r1 + r3 + carry
 426+ F6BF 4F                                   ld      c,a
 427+ F6C0 78                                   ld      a,b
 428+ F6C1 32 79 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; set r3 = r1
 429+ F6C4 79                                   ld      a,c
 430+ F6C5 C9                                   ret
 431+ F6C6
 432+ F6C6              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 433+ F6C6 ED 31        galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de:add     hl,a
 434+ F6C8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 435+ F6CA 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch low byte
 436+ F6CB 47                                   ld      b,a
 437+ F6CC 23                                   inc     hl
 438+ F6CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch high byte
 439+ F6CE 68                                   ld      l,b
 440+ F6CF 67                                   ld      h,a
 441+ F6D0 7E           GalaxyCopyLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 442+ F6D1 FE 00                                cp      0
 443+ F6D3 28 05                                jr      z,.CopyDone
 444+ F6D5 12                                   ld      (de),a
 445+ F6D6 23                                   inc     hl
 446+ F6D7 13                                   inc     de
 447+ F6D8 18 F6                                jr      GalaxyCopyLoop
 448+ F6DA 12           .CopyDone:              ld      (de),a
 449+ F6DB C9                                   ret
 450+ F6DC              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 451+ F6DC 11 64 F1     galaxy_get_species:     ld      de,GalaxySpecies
 452+ F6DF 3E 28                                ld      a,"("
 453+ F6E1 12                                   ld      (de),a
 454+ F6E2 13                                   inc     de
 455+ F6E3 3A FC E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+4)
 456+ F6E6 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 457+ F6E8 20 0A                                jr      nz,.NonHuman
 458+ F6EA 21 62 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantHumanIx
 459+ F6ED AF                                   xor     a
 460+ F6EE CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 461+ F6F1 C3 4F F7                             jp      .galaxy_species_exit
 462+ F6F4 3A FD E8     .NonHuman:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 463+ F6F7 CB 3F                                srl     a
 464+ F6F9 CB 3F                                srl     a
 465+ F6FB E6 07                                and     $07
 466+ F6FD FE 03                                cp      3
 467+ F6FF 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc1
 468+ F701 21 34 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc1Ix
 469+ F704 CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 470+ F707 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 471+ F709 12                                   ld      (de),a
 472+ F70A 13                                   inc     de
 473+ F70B 3A FD E8     .NotDesc1:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 474+ F70E CB 3F                                srl     a
 475+ F710 CB 3F                                srl     a
 476+ F712 CB 3F                                srl     a
 477+ F714 CB 3F                                srl     a
 478+ F716 CB 3F                                srl     a
 479+ F718 FE 06                                cp      6
 480+ F71A 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc2
 481+ F71C 21 3A F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc2Ix
 482+ F71F CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 483+ F722 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 484+ F724 12                                   ld      (de),a
 485+ F725 13                                   inc     de
 486+ F726 3A F9 E8     .NotDesc2:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 487+ F729 47                                   ld      b,a
 488+ F72A 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 489+ F72D A8                                   xor     b
 490+ F72E E6 07                                and     $07
 491+ F730 F5                                   push    af
 492+ F731 FE 06                                cp      6
 493+ F733 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc3
 494+ F735 21 46 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc3Ix
 495+ F738 CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 496+ F73B 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 497+ F73D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 498+ F73E 13                                   inc     de
 499+ F73F F1           .NotDesc3:              pop     af
 500+ F740 47                                   ld      b,a
 501+ F741 3A FD E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 502+ F744 E6 03                                and     $03
 503+ F746 80                                   add     a,b
 504+ F747 E6 07                                and     $07
 505+ F749 21 52 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc4Ix
 506+ F74C CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 507+ F74F 3E 73        .galaxy_species_exit:   ld      a,"s"
 508+ F751 12                                   ld      (de),a
 509+ F752 13                                   inc     de
 510+ F753 3E 29                                ld      a,")"
 511+ F755 12                                   ld      (de),a
 512+ F756 13                                   inc     de
 513+ F757 AF                                   xor     a
 514+ F758 12                                   ld      (de),a
 515+ F759 C9                                   ret
 516+ F75A
 517+ F75A
 518+ F75A              ; To copy seed, loops from 3 to 0
 519+ F75A              ; copy seed X + 2 to target X
 520+ F75A              ; x = x -1
 521+ F75A
 522+ F75A              ; For lave we shoudl have "Lave is most famous for its vast rain forests and the Lavian tree grub"
 523+ F75A
 524+ F75A              GalaxyCapitaliseString: ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 525+ F75A 23                                   inc		hl
 526+ F75B 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 527+ F75C FE 00                                cp		0
 528+ F75E C8                                   ret		z
 529+ F75F FE 5B                                cp		'Z'+1
 530+ F761 30 F7                                jr		nc,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 531+ F763 FE 41                                cp		'A'
 532+ F765 38 F3                                jr		c,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 533+ F767 C6 20        .LowerCase:             add		a,'a'-'A'
 534+ F769 77                                   ld		(hl),a
 535+ F76A 18 EE                                jr		GalaxyCapitaliseString
 536+ F76C
 537+ F76C
 538+ F76C              GalaxyGoatSoup:         ;ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc                         ; Set the galaxy target variable
 539+ F76C                                      ;call    galaxy_system_under_cursor                      ; and set the galaxyworkingseed based on cursor
 540+ F76C                                      ;cp      $FF
 541+ F76C                                      ;jr      z,.NoSystemFound
 542+ F76C 3A D1 9E     .SeedGalaxy             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)                              ;
 543+ F76F 32 76 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed),a                              ; r0 = Seed C
 544+ F772 3A D2 9E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)                              ;
 545+ F775 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; r1 = Seeed D
 546+ F778 3A D3 9E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)                              ;
 547+ F77B 32 78 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; r2 = Seed E
 548+ F77E 3A D4 9E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)                              ;
 549+ F781 32 79 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; r3 = Seed F
 550+ F784 C9                                   ret

 552+ F785 3E 05        .MarkExtendedDesc:      ld      a,5                                             ;  ("{lower case}{justify}{single cap}[86-90] IS [140-144].{cr}{left align}"
 553+ F787 F5           .GalaxyExpandDesc:      push    af
 554+ F788 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = 6502 X reg
 555+ F789 C5                                   push    bc                                              ; save Y reg
 556+ F78A
 557+ F78A              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 558+ F78A              ; We enter here with BC = the Y and X Coordinates of the system to select in this galaxy
 559+ F78A              ; This is based on the docked BBC PDesc Pink Volcanoes version ratehr tha goat soup
 560+ F78A ED 43 5B E8  GalaxyPinkVolcano:      ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc                         ; Set the galaxy target variable
 561+ F78E CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor                      ; and set the galaxyworkingseed based on cursor
 562+ F791                                      ;cp      $FF
